Denovo omega 0.0
A de-novo optimum-binder molecule-design program.
  • graph
Molecule.hpp
1#ifndef HPP_MOLECULE
2#define HPP_MOLECULE 1
3#include <type_traits>

5#include<limits>

11#include "../Eigen337/Eigen/Core" //Can be removed (included in Atom.hpp)

19#include <unistd.h>
20#endif
21/*
22 *** Remaining Flags ***
23 BIG_MOLECULES - Allow loading molecules with over 99999 atoms
24 SERIAL - Run the program on a single thread (no MPI)
25 REALTIME - Slow down the simulation and incrase frame dumping rate to visualize growth
26 MACROMODE - Mode when the classes are mostly used from DNV-Macro functions
27 FRAGGROW - Allow growth using fragments also
28 PLACEHOLDERMOLECULES - Molecules are just placeholders for collections of atoms - Useful to perform analytics
29 NOINTERFACE - No Y/N/O interface when writing out files (deprecated)
30 NOZMQ - Switch off ZMQ library linkage
31 NOJSON - Switch off LibJSoN Support
32*/
33/*
34 *** Removed Flags (used constants) ***
35 USE_PHYSICS - Performs a weak gradient descent minimization for each molecule (Default: Yes)
36 QUIET - Suppress a lot of stdout output (Default: No)
37 VARIEDCOUNT - Use a varied counting mechanism (such as when counting residues instead of atoms for amino-acids). (Default: None - Count heavy atoms)
38*/
39
40//VERSION: Omega 3.0
41

45class AtomNotInMoleculeException : public exception {};

77class UnmatchingSMILESAndStructurePairException : public exception {};

104class System
105{
106 std::vector<Molecule*> mols;
107 Grid* myGrid=nullptr;
108 tensor3D_double* LJGrid=nullptr;
109 const quickgeom::Container* restrbox=nullptr;
110public:
111 Eigen::Vector3d gridOffset;
112 int grid_width;
113 int grid_height;
114 int grid_depth;
115 int grid_resolution;
116 const ForceField* ff;
117 double temp=298;
118public:
120 System(const ForceField& cff) :ff(&cff) {myGrid=nullptr; mols=std::vector<Molecule*>();}
124 System(const System& sys) : ff(sys.ff)
125 {
126 mols=sys.mols;
127 gridOffset=sys.gridOffset;
128 grid_width=sys.grid_width;
129 grid_height=sys.grid_height;
130 grid_depth=sys.grid_depth;
131 grid_resolution=sys.grid_resolution;
132 myGrid=sys.myGrid;
133 restrbox=sys.restrbox;
134 temp=sys.temp;
135 }
136
140 void addMolecule(Molecule* m) {mols.push_back(m);}

150 void generateGrid(int,int,int,double);
154 inline void setForceField(const ForceField* ffd) {ff=ffd;}
156 inline void setTemperature(const double& t) {temp=t;}
160 inline void setContainer(const quickgeom::Container* cnt) {restrbox=cnt;}
161 inline const quickgeom::Container* getContainer() const {return restrbox;}
163 inline bool occupied(int x,int y,int z) const {return (bool)((myGrid)?(*myGrid)(x,y,z):false);}
168 inline const std::vector<Molecule*>& getMolecules() const {return mols;}
173 inline std::vector<Molecule*>& getMolecules() {return mols;}
177 inline System clone() const;
181 System clone(std::vector<Molecule*> omit) const;
185 inline System clone(Molecule* omit) const {std::vector<Molecule*> tmp; tmp.push_back(omit); return clone(tmp);}
187 Eigen::Vector3i getClosestFreeSpace(int x,int y,int z,int maxtries);

224//Extra math functions
225static const double beta = 2.493;
226inline double boltzmannFactor(const double& energy,const double& temp) {return ::pow(2.71828,(-::beta*energy/(temp/298.0)));}
227template<class T> const T& weighedSelect(const std::vector<T>& objects,const std::vector<double>& cumu_weights,int devid=0)
228{
229 double rv=RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,1.00)*cumu_weights[cumu_weights.size()-1];
230 for(int i=0;i<cumu_weights.size();i++)
231 {
232 if(cumu_weights[i]>rv) return objects[i];
233 }
234 return objects[objects.size()-1];
235}
236template<class T> std::pair<T,double>& weighedSelectBoltzmann(std::vector<std::pair<T,double>>& list,const double& t,int devid=0)
237{
238 std::pair<T,double>& r=list[0];
239 for (size_t i = 1; i < list.size(); i++)
240 {
241 if(RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<1>(list[i])-get<1>(r),t)) r=list[i];
242 }
243 return r;
244}
245template<class T,class U> std::pair<T,std::pair<double,U>>& weighedSelectBoltzmannFirst(std::vector<std::pair<T,std::pair<double,U>>>& list,const double& t,int devid=0)
246{
247 std::pair<T,std::pair<double,U>>& r=list[0];
248 for (size_t i = 1; i < list.size(); i++)
249 {
250 if(RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<0>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<0>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];
251 //else {if(throwarandompoint(0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<1>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<1>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];}
252 //if(throwarandompoint(0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<iv>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<iv>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];
253 }
254 return r;
255}
256template<class T,class U> std::pair<T,std::pair<U,double>>& weighedSelectBoltzmannSecond(std::vector<std::pair<T,std::pair<U,double>>>& list,const double& t,int devid=0)
257{
258 std::pair<T,std::pair<U,double>>& r=list[0];
259 for (size_t i = 1; i < list.size(); i++)
260 {
261 //if(iv) {if(throwarandompoint(0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<0>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<0>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];}
262 if(RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<1>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<1>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];
263 //if(throwarandompoint(0,1)<boltzmannFactor(get<iv>(get<1>(list[i]))-get<iv>(get<1>(r)),t)) r=list[i];
264 }
265 return r;
266}
267//Energy functions
269inline double calculateLJEnergy(const double& s1,const double& s2,const double& e1,const double& e2,const double& r,const double& dev=0)
270{
271 if(r>ENLJRCUT) return 0;
272 //return 4*sqrt(e1*e2)*(pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,12)-pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,6));
273 return 4*sqrt(e1*e2)*(pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,12)*(1+(156*dev*dev)/(r*r))-pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,6)*(1+(42*dev*dev)/(r*r)));
274}
276inline double calculateElectrostaticPotential(const double& q1,const double& q2,const double& r,const double& dev=0)
277{
278 if(r>ENELRCUT) return 0;
279 #ifndef STEP_DIELECTRIC
280 return ((DIEL*q1*q2)/r)*(1+(dev*dev)/(2*r*r));
281 #else
282 return ((((r<DIELST)?DIELB:DIELT)*q1*q2)/r)*(1+(dev*dev)/(2*r*r));
283 #endif
284}
285//Force functions: Note that this force is in unconverted (raw) units. The unit obtained from here is 10^12 N/mol. The reason is that dividing with mass (in a.m.u) directly provides acceleration in nm/s^2
286inline double calculateLJForce(const double& s1,const double& s2,const double& e1,const double& e2,const double& r)
287{
288 if(r>ENLJRCUT) return 0;
289 return -(4*sqrt(e1*e2)*(pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,12)*(12/r)-pow(((s1+s2)/2.0)/r,6)*(6/r)));
290}
291inline double calculateElectrostaticForce(const double& q1,const double& q2,const double& r)
292{
293 if(r>ENELRCUT) return 0;
294 return -((DIEL*q1*q2)/(r*r));
295}
296
297//Extra ease of access methods
298 //std::pair
299/*template<class T,class U> inline U getSecond(std::pair<T,U> p,const U& u)
300{
301 if((get<0>(p))==u) return (get<1>(p));
302 else if((get<1>(p))==u) return (get<0>(p));
303 else {cout <<"Warning: None in pair (getSecond: ~Line 50 in Molecule.cpp)";}
304}*/
305//Template comparisons
306template<class T,class U> std::pair<U,T> swap(const std::pair<T,U>& p) {return make_pair((get<1>(p)),(get<0>(p)));}

338 static std::vector<std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,std::pair<double,double>>>> getAllAllowedPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,Atom* natom,const System& ff,int num=10,int tries=10,bool restr=false,const Category* aromcat=nullptr,int devid=0);
340 static std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,double>> getAllowedPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,Atom* natom,const System& ff,int num=10,int tries=10,bool restr=false,const Category* aromcat=nullptr,int devid=0);
342 static inline double getLJInteraction(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) {return calculateLJEnergy(a1->seek_sigma(),a2->seek_sigma(),a1->seek_epsilon(),a2->seek_epsilon(),a2->distanceFrom(a1),(a1->posdev+a2->posdev)/2);}
344 static inline double getLJForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) {return calculateLJForce(a1->seek_sigma(),a2->seek_sigma(),a1->seek_epsilon(),a2->seek_epsilon(),a2->distanceFrom(a1));}
346 static inline double getElectrostaticEnergy(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) {return calculateElectrostaticPotential(a1->seek_charge(),a2->seek_charge(),a2->distanceFrom(a1),(a1->posdev+a2->posdev)/2);}
348 static inline double getElectrostaticForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) {return calculateElectrostaticForce(a1->seek_charge(),a2->seek_charge(),a2->distanceFrom(a1));}
352 static inline double getElectrostaticEnergy(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,double r) {return calculateElectrostaticPotential(a1->seek_charge(),a2->seek_charge(),r,(a1->posdev+a2->posdev)/2);}
356 static inline double getElectrostaticForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,double r) {return calculateElectrostaticForce(a1->seek_charge(),a2->seek_charge(),r);}
360 static inline double getLJInteraction(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,double r) {return calculateLJEnergy(a1->seek_sigma(),a2->seek_sigma(),a1->seek_epsilon(),a2->seek_epsilon(),r,(a1->posdev+a2->posdev)/2);}
364 static inline double getLJForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,double r) {return calculateLJForce(a1->seek_sigma(),a2->seek_sigma(),a1->seek_epsilon(),a2->seek_epsilon(),r);}
366 static inline double getNonbondingPotential(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) {return getLJInteraction(a1,a2)+getElectrostaticEnergy(a1,a2);}
368 static inline double getNonbondingPotential(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,double r)
369 {
370 //if(r>ENRCUT) return 0;
371 return getLJInteraction(a1,a2,r)+getElectrostaticEnergy(a1,a2,r);
372 }

375 static std::vector<std::pair<std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>,double>> getAllAllowedFragmentPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,MolecularFragment* frag,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> handle,const System& ff,int num=10,int tries=10,bool restr=false,const Category* aromcat=nullptr,int devid=0);
376 static std::pair<Pose,std::pair<double,double>> getAllowedFragmentPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> frag,const System& s,int num=20,int tries=10,bool restr=false,const Category* aromcat=nullptr,int devid=0);

390 static void makeCheckpoint(const std::string& fn,const std::vector<System>& syses,bool includeprot=false)
391 {
392 std::ofstream fs; fs.open(fn);

398 static std::vector<System> loadFromCheckpoint(const std::string& cptfile,const ForceField& ff);
400 static std::vector<Molecule*> loadManyGROMolecules(std::istream& inf,const ForceField& ff,bool eval=false,bool warnf=false);
401}
402static ostream& operator<<(ostream& os,const chemtools::Rule& r)
403{
404 os << "RULE("<<r.getCentre()<<"): ";
405 os << "On group: {"; for(const std::string& s : r.getRuleGroup()) os << s <<" "; os <<"}\t";
406 os << "min: "<<r.getMin();
407 if(r.getMax()<5) os<<", max: "<<r.getMax();
408 if(r.angp) os << " with expected angle: "<<r.getAngle();
409 if(r.dihp) os << " with expected dihedral: "<<r.getDihedral();
410 return os;
411}

477class Molecule
478{
479protected:
480 AtomSet oldatoms,oldfreeatoms; std::vector<std::vector<int>> oldbonds;
481 std::vector<int> valencies;
482 std::vector<Atom*> atoms,freeatoms;
483 std::vector<std::vector<int>> bonds;
484 std::vector<std::vector<unsigned short int>> orders;
485 std::vector<std::vector<Atom*>> cycles,oldcycles;
486public:
487 int HC=0;
488 int oldHC;
489 int HAC=0;
490 int oldHAC=0;
491 #ifdef MACROMODE
492 Eigen::Vector3d storedCOG,storedCOM,storedNormal;
493 bool hasCOGstored=false,hasCOMstored=false;
494 bool cogtype=true,comtype=true;
495 Atom* headatom=nullptr; Atom* orighead=nullptr;
496 int branchID=-1;
497 std::vector<Atom*> headtrace,origheadtrace,branches;
498 std::string cresname="DNV";
499 int cresID=1;
500 #endif
501 int type=0;
502 int ID=-1;
503 bool trialmode=false;
504 double myBE=0;
505 double myHBE=0;
506 double errBE=0;
507 double errHBE=0;
508 double oldbe;
509 double oldhbe;
510 double olderrbe;
511 double olderrhbe;
512 double pE=0;
513 #ifdef FRAGGROW
514 std::vector<MolecularFragment*> componentFrags;
515 #endif
516
517protected:
519 Molecule() {}
520public:
522 Molecule(Atom* a);
525 Molecule(std::vector<Atom*>);
527 Molecule(std::vector<Atom*>,std::vector<std::vector<int>> b);
529 Molecule(int n);
538 Molecule(const Molecule* o);
545 Molecule(std::istream& f,bool eval=false,bool cpt=false,const ForceField* ff=nullptr);
550 Molecule(const char *file,bool eval=false);
560 Molecule(const std::string& infile,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format="pdb",bool eval=false,bool warnf=false,char chain='A');
562 Molecule(std::istream& infile,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format="pdb",bool eval=false,bool warnf=false,char chain='A');
564 ~Molecule();

567 void loadMoleculeFromTXT(std::istream& f,bool eval=false,bool cpt=false,const ForceField* ff=nullptr);
568 void loadFromInputStream(std::istream& infile,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format="pdb",bool eval=false,bool warnf=false,char chain='A');
569
571 inline int getSize() const {return atoms.size();}
575 inline int getEffectiveSize() const
576 {
577 if(VARIEDCOUNT) return HAC;
578 else return atoms.size()-HC;
579 }
581 inline const Atom* getAtom(int n) const {return atoms[n];}
585 inline const Atom* getLastAtom() const {return atoms[atoms.size()-1];}
586 inline Atom* getLastAtom() {return atoms[atoms.size()-1];}
588 inline double getMass() const
589 {
590 double m=0;
591 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) m+=atoms[i]->seek_mass();
592 return m;
593 }
594
599 inline const std::vector<Atom*>& getAtoms() const {return atoms;}
604 inline const std::vector<std::vector<int>>& getBonds() const {return bonds;}
606 inline Atom* getAtom(int x) {return atoms[x];}
610 int indexOf(Atom* p) const {for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {if(atoms[i]==p) return i;} return -1;}
611 #ifdef MACROMODE
615 int indexOf(const std::string& p) const {for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {if(atoms[i]->toString()==p) return i;} return -1;}
616 #endif
618 inline double binding_energy() const {return myBE;}
620 inline double hotspot_binding_energy() const {return myHBE;}
621private:
622 inline void set_binding_energy(double e) {myBE=e;}
623 inline void set_hotspot_binding_energy(double e) {myHBE=e;}
624protected:
628 inline void addBE(double x) {myBE+=x;}
632 inline void addHBE(double x) {myHBE+=x;}
633public:
637 inline void addAtom(Atom* a) {atoms.push_back(a); bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>()); a->setMolecule(this);}
638 friend Molecule* merge(const Molecule* m1,const Molecule* m2);
646 void calculateBondOrders(ForceField& ff,bool assume_complete=false,bool assign_valence=false)
647 {
648 if(!ff.hasCategory("aromatic")) throw NoAromaticCategoryException();
649 const Category& aromcat=ff.getCategory("aromatic");
650 orders=std::vector<std::vector<unsigned short int>>();
651 std::vector<int> exB;
652 bool rep=false;
653 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {std::vector<unsigned short int> aord; for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++) aord.push_back(0); orders.push_back(aord); exB.push_back(0);}
654 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
655 {
656 std::vector<Atom*> a1bonds=this->getBondedAtoms(atoms[i]);
657 for(int j=0;j<a1bonds.size();j++)
658 {
659 if(orders[i][j]!=0 && !rep) continue;
660 Atom* ca=a1bonds[j];
661 int ind=indexOf(ca);
662 std::vector<Atom*> a2bonds=this->getBondedAtoms(ca);
663 int ord=1;
664 if(assume_complete)
665 {
666 ord=(min(1-exB[i]+(ff.getDefaultConnectivity(atoms[i])-a1bonds.size()),1-exB[ind]+(ff.getDefaultConnectivity(ca)-a2bonds.size())));
667 exB[i]+=(ord-1);
668 exB[ind]+=(ord-1);
669 }
670 else
671 {
672 int exv1,exv2;
673 switch(atoms[i]->toString()[0])
674 {
675 case 'P':
676 exv1=1;
677 break;
678 case 'S':
679 exv1=2;
680 break;
681 default:
682 exv1=0;
683 }
684 switch(ca->toString()[0])
685 {
686 case 'P':
687 exv2=1;
688 break;
689 case 'S':
690 exv2=2;
691 break;
692 default:
693 exv2=0;
694 }
695 //int exv1=(atoms[i]->toString()[0]=='S' || atoms[i]->toString()[0]=='P')?1:0,exv2=(ca->toString()[0]=='S' || ca->toString()[0]=='P')?1:0;
696 cout << atoms[i]->toString() << ","<<atoms[ind]->toString() << "\t" << (1+(3-atoms[i]->getHybridization())+exv1)<<"("<<(-exB[i])<<")" << "," << (1+(3-ca->getHybridization())+exv2)<<"("<<(-exB[ind])<<")" << "\n";
697 ord=min(1+(3-atoms[i]->getHybridization())+exv1-exB[i],1+(3-ca->getHybridization())+exv2-exB[ind]);
698 if(!atoms[i]->getHybridization() || !atoms[ind]->getHybridization() || (aromcat.contains(atoms[i]) && atoms[ind]->getStandardValency()>1) || (aromcat.contains(atoms[ind]) && atoms[i]->getStandardValency()>1)) ord=1;
699 //if(atoms[i]->getStandardValency()<ord || ca->getStandardValency()<ord) ord=min(atoms[i]->getStandardValency(),ca->getStandardValency());
700 exB[i]+=(ord-1);
701 exB[ind]+=(ord-1);
702 }
703 orders[i][j]=ord;
704 for(int k=0;k<a2bonds.size();k++) {if(a2bonds[k]==atoms[i]) orders[ind][k]=ord;}
705 }
706 if(rep) rep=false;
707 else
708 {
709 if(atoms[i]->getStandardValency()==1 || atoms[i]->getHybridization()==3 || aromcat.contains(atoms[i])) continue;
710 int s=0;
711 /*if(atoms[i]->toString()[0]=='N') s++;
712 else if(atoms[i]->toString()[0]=='N') s+=2;*/
713 for(int t=0;t<orders[i].size();t++) s+=orders[i][t];
714 cout << atoms[i]->toString() << ":"<< s <<" "<< ff.getDefaultConnectivity(atoms[i]) << "\n";
715 if(s<ff.getDefaultConnectivity(atoms[i]))
716 {
717 rep=true;
718 for(int j=0;j<a1bonds.size();j++)
719 {
720 int ind=indexOf(a1bonds[j]);
721 exB[ind]=0;
722 for(int t=0;t<orders[ind].size();t++)
723 {
724 orders[ind][t]=1;
725 for(int u=0;u<orders[bonds[ind][t]].size();u++) if(bonds[bonds[ind][t]][u]==ind) {orders[bonds[ind][t]][u]=1; break;}
726 }
727 }
728 i--;
729 }
730 }
731 }
732 if(assign_valence)
733 {
734 int s=0;
735 for(int i=0;i<orders.size();i++)
736 {
737 s=0;
738 for(int j=0;j<orders[i].size();j++) s+=orders[i][j];
739 //cout << atoms[i]->toString() << "\t"<<(s-(int)orders[i].size())<<" "<<atoms[i]->seek_valency()<<"\n";
740 atoms[i]->setValency(ff.getDefaultConnectivity(atoms[i])-s);
741 }
742 calculateFreeAtoms();
743 }
744 }
746 void calculateBondOrders2(ForceField& ff,bool assume_complete=false,bool assign_valence=false)
747 {
748 if(!ff.hasCategory("aromatic")) throw NoAromaticCategoryException();
749 const Category& aromcat=ff.getCategory("aromatic");
750 orders=std::vector<std::vector<unsigned short int>>();
751 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
752 {
753 orders.push_back(std::vector<unsigned short int>());
754 for(int j : bonds[i]) orders[i].push_back(0);
755 }
756 bool done=false,edit=false,trigger=false,trigger2=false;
757 int fails=3;
758 while(!done)
759 {
760 done=true;
761 edit=false;
762 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
763 {
764 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
765 {
766 if(orders[i][j]) continue;
767 done=false;
768 Atom* c1=atoms[i];
769 Atom* c2=atoms[bonds[i][j]];
770 if(!c1->getHybridization() || !c2->getHybridization() || (c1->getHybridization()==3 && c2->getHybridization()==3) || (c1->getHybridization()==3 && c1->toString()[0]!='S' && c1->toString()[0]!='P') || (c2->getHybridization()==3 && c2->toString()[0]!='S' && c2->toString()[0]!='P'))
771 {
772 orders[i][j]=1; edit=true;
773 for(int k=0;k<bonds[bonds[i][j]].size();k++) {if(bonds[bonds[i][j]][k]==i) {orders[bonds[i][j]][k]=orders[i][j]; break;}}
774 continue;
775 }
776 else
777 {
778 cout << "Checking: "<<atoms[i]->toString()<<" with "<<c2->toString()<<"\tOrders: "<<orders[i]<<"\t";
779 bool valid=true;
780 int vacan=0,vacan2=0;
781 for(int k=0;k<orders[i].size();k++)
782 {
783 if(orders[i][k]>1) valid=false;
784 else if(!orders[i][k]) vacan++;
785 }
786 for(int k=0;k<orders[bonds[i][j]].size();k++)
787 {
788 if(orders[bonds[i][j]][k]>1) valid=false;
789 else if(!orders[bonds[i][j]][k]) vacan2++;
790 }
791 cout << ((valid)?"Valid, ":"Invalid, ") << vacan<<", "<<vacan2<<"\t"<<"p1: "<<((valid && c1->getHybridization()!=3) || c1->toString()[0]=='P' || c1->toString()[0]=='S' || c2->toString()[0]=='S')<<"\n";
792 if((valid && c1->getHybridization()!=3) && ((vacan==1 || vacan2==1 || trigger) && ((!aromcat.contains(c1) || c1->toString()[0]=='C') && (!aromcat.contains(c2) || c2->toString()[0]=='C')) || trigger2))
793 {
794 cout << atoms[i]->toString()<<" with "<<atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()<<" makes it here\n";
795 orders[i][j]=4-c1->getHybridization(); if(orders[i][j]<=1) orders[i][j]=2; edit=true;
796 for(int k=0;k<bonds[bonds[i][j]].size();k++) {if(bonds[bonds[i][j]][k]==i) {orders[bonds[i][j]][k]=orders[i][j]; break;}}
797 }
798 else if(!valid && (c1->toString()[0]!='S' && c2->toString()[0]!='S'))
799 {
800 orders[i][j]=1; edit=true;
801 for(int k=0;k<bonds[bonds[i][j]].size();k++) {if(bonds[bonds[i][j]][k]==i) {orders[bonds[i][j]][k]=orders[i][j]; break;}}
802 continue;
803 }
804 else if((vacan==1 && c2->toString()[0]=='S') || (vacan2==1 && c1->toString()[0]=='S'))
805 {
806 if(c1->toString()[0]=='S' && c1->getStandardValency()==4) orders[i][j]=4-c2->getHybridization();
807 else if(c2->toString()[0]=='S' && c2->getStandardValency()==4) orders[i][j]=4-c1->getHybridization();
808 else orders[i][j]=1;
809 for(int k=0;k<bonds[bonds[i][j]].size();k++) {if(bonds[bonds[i][j]][k]==i) {orders[bonds[i][j]][k]=orders[i][j]; break;}}
810 continue;
811 }
812 }
813 }
814 }
815 if(!edit)
816 {
817 if(!trigger) trigger=true;
818 else
819 {
820 if(trigger2)
821 {
822 fails--;
823 if(!fails) break;
824 }
825 trigger2=true;
826 }
827 }
828 else {fails=3; trigger2=trigger=false;}
829 }
830 cout << "Final orders:\n";
831 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
832 {
833 cout <<atoms[i]->toString()<<"("<<i<<")"":\t";
834 for(int j=0;j<orders[i].size();j++) cout << atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()<<"("<<bonds[i][j]<<")"<<"-"<<orders[i][j]<<" ";
835 cout << "\n";
836 }
837 cout << "Ended order data\n";
838 }
842 void markCyclizedAtoms()
843 {
844 std::vector<int> traced;
845 int stI=0;
846 while(bonds[stI].size()<=1)
847 {
848 stI++;
849 if(stI>=bonds.size()) break;
850 }
851 if(stI>=bonds.size()) return;
852 std::vector<int> travpath;
853 traverseMarkCyclicAtoms(stI,travpath);
854 }
859 int calculateNRot(const ForceField* ff=nullptr,bool mod=false)
860 {
861 const Category* cat=(ff && ff->hasCategory("amidic"))?&(ff->getCategory("amidic")):nullptr;
862 //if(cat) cout << "Found category: 'amidic'\n";
863 int nrot=0;
864 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
865 {
866 if(atoms[i]->getStandardValency()<2 || atoms[i]->getHybridization()<2) continue; //Consider changing valency limit to 3 (Does C-O bond in R-C(R')-OH actually have a degree of freedom)
867 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
868 {
869 if(atoms[bonds[i][j]]->getStandardValency()<2 || atoms[i]->getHybridization()<2 || (mod && atoms[i]->getHybridization()<3 && atoms[bonds[i][j]]->getHybridization()<3) || (cat && ((cat->contains(atoms[i]) && atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()[0]=='N') || (cat->contains(atoms[bonds[i][j]]) && atoms[i]->toString()[0]=='N')) ) ) continue;
870 bool all1=true,all2=true;
871 for(const auto& v : cycles)
872 {
873 all1=true; all2=true;
874 for(const Atom* ta : v)
875 {
876 if(ta==atoms[i]) all1=false;
877 else if(ta==atoms[bonds[i][j]]) all2=false;
878 }
879 if(!all1 && !all2) {/*cout << "\t" << atoms[i]->toString() << " - " << atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()<<"\n";*/ break;}
880 }
881 if(!all1 && !all2) continue;
882 //cout << atoms[i]->toString() << " - " << atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()<<"\n";
883 nrot++;
884 }
885 }
886
887 return nrot/2;
888 }
889private:
890 void traverseMarkCyclicAtoms(int ind,std::vector<int>& visited,std::vector<int> path=std::vector<int>(),int skip=-1)
891 {
892 path.push_back(ind);
893 visited.push_back(ind);
894 std::vector<int> nTs=bonds[ind];
895 if(nTs.size()<=1) return;
896 for(int n : nTs)
897 {
898 if(n==skip) continue;
899 if(contains(path,n))
900 {
901 int i;
902 std::vector<Atom*> psh;
903 for(i=path.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
904 {
905 psh.push_back(atoms[path[i]]);
906 atoms[path[i]]->setCyclized(true);
907 if(path[i]==n) break;
908 }
909 cycles.push_back(psh);
910 std::vector<int> npath; for(int j=0;j<i;j++) npath.push_back(path[j]);
911 path=npath;
912 continue;
913 }
914 if(contains(visited,n)) continue;
915 else traverseMarkCyclicAtoms(n,visited,path,ind);
916 }
917 }
918public:
920 void printStructureTree()
921 {
922 for(int i=0;i<bonds.size();i++)
923 {
924 cout << atoms[i]->toString()<<":\t";
925 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
926 {
927 cout <<atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString()<<"("<<orders[i][j]<<"), ";
928 }
929 cout << "\n";
930 }
931 }

933 /*void scamGasteigerConvergence(ForceField& ff,double cutoff=0.01,int convlimit=10,double total_charge=0)
934 {
935 std::vector<double> oldcharges;
936 for(Atom* a : atoms) oldcharges.push_back(0);
937 for(int i=0;i<convlimit;i++)
938 {
939 std::vector<double> charges=oldcharges;
940 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
941 {
942 Atom* a=atoms[i];
943 std::vector<Atom*> bats=this->getBondedAtoms(a);
944 for(int j=0;j<bats.size();j++)
945 {
946 int ind=indexOf(bats[j]);
947 charges[i]-=ff.getScamGasteigerParameter(a)*(1+oldcharges[i]);
948 charges[ind]-=ff.getScamGasteigerParameter(bats[j])*(1+oldcharges[ind]);
949 }
950 }
951 oldcharges=charges;
952 }
953 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) atoms[i]->setCharge(oldcharges[i]);
954 }*/
958 inline void sealAll()
959 {
960 for(Atom* a : freeatoms) a->seal();
961 freeatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
962 }
968 inline void free(Atom* a,int val=-1)
969 {
970 assert(val); //val!=0
971 if(!contains(atoms,a)) throw AtomNotInMoleculeException();
972 if(!contains(freeatoms,a)) freeatoms.push_back(a);
973 if(val<0) val=a->seek_valency();
974 if(val==0) val=1;
975 a->setValency(val);
976 }
978 void calculateFreeAtoms()
979 {
980 freeatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
981 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {if(atoms[i]->seek_valency()) freeatoms.push_back(atoms[i]);}
982 }
983
984 //Grid
986 virtual void loadGrid(System& s) {s.grid().fill_with_zero();}
987
988 //Back to atoms
994 const std::vector<Atom*> getBondedAtoms(Atom* src) const
995 {
996 std::vector<Atom*> res;
997 //cout << src->toString()<<": getBondedAtoms() was called on this\n";
998 int ind=indexOf(src);
999 if(ind==-1)
1000 {
1001 cout << src->toString() << "("<<(long)src<<") not in: "; for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) cout << atoms[i]->toString()<<"("<<(long)atoms[i]<<"),"; cout << "\n"; throw AtomNotInMoleculeException();
1002 }
1003 for(int i : bonds[ind]) res.push_back(atoms[i]);
1004 return res;
1005 }
1006 /*std::vector<Atom*> getBondedAtoms(Atom* src)
1007 {
1008 std::vector<Atom*> res;
1009 int ind=indexOf(src);
1010 if(ind==-1) throw AtomNotInMoleculeException();
1011 for(int i : bonds[ind]) res.push_back(atoms[i]);
1012 return res;
1013 }*/
1014
1018 inline void startTrials()
1019 {
1020 if(trialmode) throw AlreadyInTrialModeException();
1021 oldatoms=atoms; oldbonds=bonds; oldfreeatoms=freeatoms; oldHC=HC;
1022 if(VARIEDCOUNT) oldHAC=HAC;
1023 oldbe=myBE; oldhbe=myHBE; olderrbe=errBE; olderrhbe=errHBE; oldcycles=cycles; valencies=std::vector<int>(); for(Atom* a : oldatoms) valencies.push_back(a->seek_valency());
1024 trialmode=true;
1025 }
1029 inline void rollback(const System& s);
1033 void miniRollback(const ForceField& ff)
1034 {
1035 cout << atoms.size() << " in the beginning\n";
1036 for(Atom* a : oldatoms)
1037 {
1038 cout << a->toString() << ","; cout << "\n";
1039 }
1040 std::vector<Atom*> newatoms;
1041 std::vector<std::vector<int>> newbonds;
1042 std::vector<std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> bonddata;
1043 for(Atom* a : atoms) {bonddata.push_back(make_pair(a,getBondedAtoms(a)));}
1044 cout << "Bond data loaded\n";
1045 std::vector<Atom*> waste;
1046 bool passed=false;
1047 while(true)
1048 {
1049 cout << "Loop: "<<atoms.size() << " atoms\n";
1050 newatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
1051 newbonds=std::vector<std::vector<int>>();
1052 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1053 {
1054 if(contains(oldatoms,atoms[i]) || ff.isSatisfied(atoms[i],getBondedAtoms(atoms[i])))
1055 {
1056 newatoms.push_back(atoms[i]);
1057 newbonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
1058 }
1059 else
1060 {
1061 waste.push_back(atoms[i]);
1062 cout << atoms[i]->toString()<<" connected to:\t";
1063 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
1064 {
1065 cout <<atoms[bonds[i][j]]->toString();cout<<"\n";
1066 }
1067 }
1068 }
1069 if(newatoms.size()==atoms.size()) break;
1070 cout << "\\Loop: "<<newatoms.size()<< " atoms\n";
1071 int K=0;
1072 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1073 {
1074 if(!contains(newatoms,atoms[i])) continue;
1075 for(int j : bonds[i]) {if(contains(newatoms,atoms[j])) newbonds[K].push_back(j);}
1076 K++;
1077 }
1078 atoms=newatoms;
1079 bonds=newbonds;
1080 }
1081 for(Atom* a : waste)
1082 {
1083 //if(a) cout << "Deleting: "<< a->toString()<<"\n";
1084 delete a;
1085 }
1086 cout << "Atoms fixed \tand\t";
1087 /*for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) newbonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
1088 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1089 {
1090 for(int j=i+1;j<atoms.size();j++)
1091 {
1092 if(contains(findByKey(bonddata,atoms[i]),atoms[j])) newbonds[i].push_back(j);
1093 if(contains(findByKey(bonddata,atoms[j]),atoms[i])) newbonds[j].push_back(i);
1094 }
1095 }
1096 bonds=newbonds;*/
1097 cout << "Bonds assigned\n";
1098 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1099 {
1100 if(contains(oldatoms,atoms[i])) continue;
1101 if(!bonds[i].size())
1102 {
1103 delete atoms[i];
1104 atoms.erase(atoms.begin()+i);
1105 bonds.erase(bonds.begin()+i);
1106 i--;
1107 }
1108 }
1109 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) atoms[i]->setValency(atoms[i]->getStandardValency()-bonds[i].size());
1110 cout << "Valencies set\n";
1111 freeatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
1112 HC=0;
1113 if(VARIEDCOUNT) HAC=0;
1114 for(Atom* a : atoms)
1115 {
1116 if(a->canBond()) freeatoms.push_back(a);
1117 if(a->isHydrogen()) HC++;
1118 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(a)) HAC++;
1119 }
1120 cout << atoms.size() << " atoms left\n";
1121 //for(Atom* a : atoms) cout << a->toString() << ","; cout << "\n";
1122 trialmode=false;
1123 }
1127 inline void commit() {trialmode=false;}
1128
1129 //Simple random method
1134 inline Atom* getRandomBondableAtom() const
1135 {
1136 if(!freeatoms.size()) return nullptr;
1137 return randomSelect(freeatoms);
1138 }
1139
1143 void makeBond(Atom* a1,Atom* a2)
1144 {
1145 assert(a1!=a2);
1146 int i1=indexOf(a1),i2=indexOf(a2);
1147 if(i1==-1 || i2==-1) throw AtomNotInMoleculeException();
1148 #ifndef PLACEHOLDERMOLECULES
1149 if(!a1->canBond() || !a2->canBond()) throw NoValencyAvailableException();
1150 #endif
1151 bonds[i1].push_back(i2);
1152 bonds[i2].push_back(i1);
1153 a1->addBond(); a2->addBond();
1154 if(!a1->canBond()) freeatoms.erase(std::remove(freeatoms.begin(), freeatoms.end(), a1), freeatoms.end());
1155 if(!a2->canBond()) freeatoms.erase(std::remove(freeatoms.begin(), freeatoms.end(), a2), freeatoms.end());
1156 }
1157
1164 bool bondAtom(Atom* natm,Atom* src)
1165 {
1166 //Atom* nacpy=natm;
1167 if(!natm->canBond() || !src->canBond()) return false;
1168 if(natm->isHydrogen()) HC++;
1169 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(natm)) HAC++;
1170 int sI=indexOf(src);
1171 atoms.push_back(natm);
1172 bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>(1,sI));
1173 bonds[sI].push_back(atoms.size()-1);
1174 src->addBond(); natm->addBond();
1175 if(natm->canBond()) freeatoms.push_back(natm);
1176 if(!src->canBond()) freeatoms.erase(std::remove(freeatoms.begin(), freeatoms.end(), src), freeatoms.end());
1177 return true;
1178 }
1179
1181 std::vector<Atom*> bondFragment(MolecularFragment* nfrag,int ind,Atom* src);
1182
1184 inline virtual std::pair<double,double> calculateNonBondingEnergy(Atom* dummy,bool write=false);
1185
1187 void samplegrowimpartial(const System& s,int n,int trials=15)
1188 {
1189 int t=0;
1190 while(getEffectiveSize()<n)
1191 {
1192 if(t>trials)
1193 {
1194 cout << "Too many failures: \n";
1195 break;
1196 }
1197 Atom* gP=getRandomBondableAtom();
1198 auto nbs=s.ff->getAllowedBonds(gP);
1199 BondData nb=randomSelect(nbs);
1200 Atom* nat=nb.getSecond(gP,*s.ff);
1201 //std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> alposes=
1202 //if(!alposes.size()) {t++; continue;}
1203 Eigen::Vector3d pos;
1204 try{pos=get<0>(chemtools::getAllowedPositions(gP,this,nat,s,15,5)); t=0;}
1205 catch(NoPositionAvailableException ex) {t++; continue;}
1206 nat->setPosition(pos);
1207 bondAtom(nat,gP);
1208 for(Atom* a : atoms)
1209 {
1210 cout << a->toString() << "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1211 }
1212 cout << "\t";
1213 for(Atom* a : freeatoms)
1214 {
1215 cout << a->toString() << "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1216 }
1217 cout <<"\n";
1218 }
1219 }
1221 inline double getHotspotEnergy(const System& s,double v=0);
1223 bool attempt(const System& s,Atom* gP,Atom* nat,Atom*& nxt,int trials=10,bool restr=false,int nps=0,int devid=0);
1224
1225 #ifdef FRAGGROW
1227 bool attemptFragment(const System& s,Atom* gP,std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> nat,Atom*& pivat,int trials=10,bool restr=false,int nps=0,int devid=0);
1228 #endif
1229 //bool join(const System& s,Atom* gP,Atom* nat,Atom*& nxt,bool acc,const std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,double>>& penv);
1230
1234 bool reduce(const System& s,int trials=15,bool forced=false,int devid=0); //Acceptable
1235
1237 void samplegrowunrigid(const System& s,int n,int trials=15)
1238 {
1239 int t=0;
1240 startTrials();
1241 cout << "Samplegrow begins\n";
1242 while(getEffectiveSize()<n)
1243 {
1244 if(t>trials)
1245 {
1246 cout << "Too many failures: \n";
1247 break;
1248 }
1249 Atom* gP=getRandomBondableAtom();
1250 if(!gP)
1251 {
1252 cout << "Out of valencies\n";
1253 break;
1254 }
1255 cout << gP->toString()<<"("<<gP->seek_valency()<<") chosen\n";
1256 Atom* nat=s.ff->selectAtomByRule(gP,getBondedAtoms(gP));
1257 //if(!alposes.size()) {t++; continue;}
1258 Atom* nxt;
1259 if(!attempt(s,gP,nat,nxt)) {t++; continue;}
1260 bondAtom(nat,gP);
1261 if(nxt)
1262 {
1263 cout << nat->toString()<< "-"<<nxt->toString()<<"\n";
1264 makeBond(nxt,nat);
1265 }
1266 t=0;
1267 for(Atom* a : atoms)
1268 {
1269 cout << a->toString() << "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1270 }
1271 cout << "\t";
1272 for(Atom* a : freeatoms)
1273 {
1274 cout << a->toString() << "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1275 }
1276 cout <<"\n";
1277 }
1278 ofstream prf; prf.open("prereduction.pdb",ios::out);
1279 dumpMol(prf);
1280 prf.close();
1281 reduce(s);
1282 ofstream rf; rf.open("postreduction.pdb",ios::out);
1283 dumpMol(rf);
1284 rf.close();
1285 miniRollback(*s.ff);
1286 }
1288 bool completeAttempt(ostream& logfile,const System& s,Atom* src,int trials=25,int nupper=90,int level=0,int levellim=LEVELLIMIT,bool restr=false,bool superseed=false,bool reseed=false,bool deseed=false,Molecule*& common_newroot=NULLMOL,int common_seedlength=0,int devid=0)
1289 {
1290 if(getEffectiveSize()>nupper) return false;
1291 if(level>levellim)
1292 {
1293 cout << "Size limit pre-trial reached\n";
1294 return false;
1295 }
1296 //if(!trialmode) startTrials();
1297 cout <<"For(ATOM): "<< src->toString() << "\n";
1298 logfile <<"For(ATOM): "<< src->toString() << "\n";
1299 Atom* nat=nullptr;
1300 try {nat=s.ff->selectAtomByRule(src,getBondedAtoms(src));}
1301 catch(RuleConstraintsPreventBondsException ex) {std::cout << "Rule constraints prevent bonding!\n"; nat=nullptr;}
1302 if(!nat) {std::cout << "Warning: no atom found\n"; if(logfile) logfile << "No atom to bond to: "<<src->toString()<<"\n"; return false;}
1303 if(nat->seek_valency()>=2) {if(RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,1)<CYCPROB || (src->mustCycl && !src->isCyclized()) || (s.ff->hasCategory("ring") && s.ff->getCategory("ring").contains(nat))) nat->mustCycl=true;}
1304 //ADD Cyclization to atom-types here
1305 cout << "Trial: "<<nat->toString()<<"\t";
1306 logfile << "Trial: "<<nat->toString()<<"\t";
1307 Atom* nxt=nullptr;
1308 if(!attempt(s,src,nat,nxt,trials,restr,0,devid)) {delete nat; return false;}
1309 bondAtom(nat,src);
1310 if(nxt)
1311 {
1312 cout << nat->toString()<< "-"<<nxt->toString()<<"\n";
1313 logfile<<"CYCLIZED: " << nat->toString()<< "-"<<nxt->toString()<<"\n";
1314 makeBond(nxt,nat);
1315 /*cout << "Writing: cyclized.pdb\n";
1316 dumpMol("cyclized.pdb");*/
1317 int cycl1=indexOf(nat),cycl2=indexOf(nxt),indx;
1318 std::vector<int> psv=std::vector<int>(1,cycl1),ats; psv.push_back(cycl2);
1319 for(Atom* a : getBondedAtoms(nxt))
1320 {
1321 if(a==nat) continue;
1322 indx=indexOf(a);
1323 cout << indx << " is being tried for cycle\n";
1324 try
1325 {
1326 //cout << cycl1 <<","<<indx<<","<<psv<<"\n";
1327 ats=quickLocate(cycl1,indx,psv);
1328 cout << ats << " in the beginning\n";
1329 cout <<"Cycle("<<cycl1<<","<<cycl2<<")\n";
1330 logfile <<"Cycle("<<cycl1<<","<<cycl2<<") completed\n";
1331 for(int k =0;k<ats.size();k++)
1332 {
1333 atoms[ats[k]]->setCyclized(true);
1334 cout << atoms[ats[k]]->toString() <<"\t"; cout << atoms[ats[k]]->isCyclized() << ","; atoms[ats[k]]->cycl=true; cout << atoms[ats[k]]->isCyclized() <<"\n";
1335 }
1336 cout << ats << "in the end\n";
1337 std::vector<Atom*> psh; for(const int& ti : ats) psh.push_back(atoms[ti]);
1338 cycles.push_back(psh);
1339 }
1340 catch(NoPathPossibleException ex) {}
1341 }
1342 }
1343 cout << "\n";
1344 if(superseed && getSize()==common_seedlength+1) common_newroot=new Molecule(this);
1345 #ifdef REALTIME
1346 this->dumpMol("realtime.pdb",s.ff);
1347 usleep(REALTIME);
1348 #endif
1349 while(!s.ff->isSatisfied(nat,getBondedAtoms(nat)))
1350 {
1351 if(!nat->canBond()) return false;
1352 if(!completeAttempt(logfile,s,nat,trials,nupper,level+1,levellim,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,common_newroot,common_seedlength,devid)) return false;
1353 }
1354 if(s.ff->hasCategory("completion") && s.ff->getCategory("completion").contains(nat))
1355 {
1356 while(nat->canBond()) {if(!completeAttempt(logfile,s,nat,trials,nupper,level+1,levellim,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,common_newroot,common_seedlength,devid)) return false;}
1357 }
1358 describeStructure(logfile);
1359 describeStructure();
1360 /*startTrials();
1361 commit();*/
1362 cout << "Allowing commit of: "<<src->toString()<<"\n";
1363 return true;
1364 }
1365 /*bool completeAtom(const System& s,Atom* src,int trials=15,nupper=90)
1366 {
1367 while(src->canBond()) {completeAttempt(s,src,trials,nupper);}
1368 }*/
1379 void samplegrow(ostream& logfile,const System& s,int n,int trials=15,int nupper=90,int levellim=LEVELLIMIT,bool restr=false,bool superseed=false,bool reseed=false,bool deseed=false,Molecule*& common_newroot=NULLMOL,int common_seedlength=0,int devid=0)
1380 {
1381 #ifdef REALTIME
1382 this->dumpMol("seed.pdb",s.ff);
1383 #endif
1384 int t=0;
1385 cout << "samplegrow(rigid) begins\n";
1386 logfile << "samplegrow(rigid) begins\n";
1387 bool acc=true;
1388 Atom* gP=nullptr;
1389 while(getEffectiveSize()<n)
1390 {
1391 acc=true;
1392 startTrials();
1393 if(t>trials)
1394 {
1395 cout << "Too many failures: \n"; logfile << "Too many failures: \n";
1396 break;
1397 }
1398 if(superseed && common_newroot && freeatoms.size() && this->getEffectiveSize()==common_newroot->getEffectiveSize()) gP=this->freeatoms[freeatoms.size()-1];
1399 else gP=getRandomBondableAtom();
1400 if(!gP)
1401 {
1402 cout << "Out of valencies\n";
1403 logfile << "Ended: Out of valencies\n";
1404 commit();
1405 break;
1406 }
1407 cout << "New begin: "; describeStructure();
1408 if(completeAttempt(logfile,s,gP,ATTEMPTTRIALS,nupper,0,levellim,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,common_newroot,common_seedlength,devid))
1409 {
1410 cout << "Commiting: "<<gP->toString()<<"\n";
1411 commit(); t=0;
1412 }
1413 else
1414 {
1415 cout << "Rollback\n";
1416 //this->dumpMol("pre_rolledback.pdb");
1417 rollback(s);
1418 #ifdef REALTIME
1419 this->dumpMol("rolledback.pdb",s.ff);
1420 this->dumpMol("realtime.pdb",s.ff);
1421 usleep(REALTIME*2);
1422 #endif
1423 t++;
1424 cout << "Rolled back: ";
1425 logfile << "Rolled back: ";
1426 this->describeStructure(logfile);
1427 }
1428 }
1429 if(this->getEffectiveSize()<n) return; //Don't waste optimization time on "small" molecules which will be rejected mostly anyway.
1430 //this->dumpMol("pre_reduction.pdb");
1431 if(USE_PHYSICS)
1432 {
1433 physics::optimizeMolecule(this,*s.ff,250);
1434 cout << "Short Geomtery-optimized molecule!\n";
1435 }
1436 try
1437 {
1438 this->reduce(s,trials,true,devid);
1439 if(FORCE_CHARGES) this->uniformChargeAdjustments(this->getNetCharge(*s.ff));
1440 }
1441 catch(AtomNotInMoleculeException ex) {this->dumpMol("pre_reduction.pdb"); std::cout << "Crashed with AtomNotInMoleculeException\n"; throw std::exception();}
1442 if(USE_PHYSICS)
1443 {
1444 //physics::gradientDescentPhysics(this);
1445 physics::optimizeMolecule(this,*s.ff);
1446 cout << "Well Geomtery-optimized molecule!\n";
1447 }
1448 }
1449
1450 #ifdef FRAGGROW
1451 MolecularFragment* completeAttemptFragment(ostream& logfile,const System& s,Atom* src,const FragmentSet& fs,int trials=25,int nupper=90,int level=0,int levellim=LEVELLIMIT,bool restr=false,int devid=0);
1452
1456 void fragmentgrow(ostream& logfile,const System& s,const FragmentSet& frags,int n,int trials=25,int nupper=120,int levellim=LEVELLIMIT,bool restr=false,double autoseed=0,int devid=0)
1457 {
1458 int t=0;
1459 cout << "fragmentgrow(rigid) begins\n";
1460 logfile << "fragmentgrow(rigid) begins\n";
1461 bool acc=true;
1462 Atom* gP=nullptr;
1463 MolecularFragment* accfrag;
1464 while(getEffectiveSize()<n)
1465 {
1466 acc=true;
1467 startTrials();
1468 if(t>trials)
1469 {
1470 cout << "Too many failures: \n"; logfile << "Too many failures: \n";
1471 break;
1472 }
1473 gP=getRandomBondableAtom();
1474 if(!gP)
1475 {
1476 cout << "Out of valencies\n";
1477 logfile << "Ended: Out of valencies\n";
1478 commit();
1479 break;
1480 }
1481 cout << "New begin: "; describeStructure();
1482 //completeAttemptFragment(ostream& logfile,const System& s,Atom* src,const FragmentSet& fs,int trials,int nupper,int level,int levellim,bool restr,int common_seedlength,int devid)
1483 bool nextstep=false;
1484 if(throwarandompoint(0,1)<autoseed) nextstep=completeAttempt(logfile,s,gP,ATTEMPTTRIALS,nupper,0,levellim,restr,false,false,false,NULLMOL,0,devid);
1485 else
1486 {
1487 accfrag=completeAttemptFragment(logfile,s,gP,frags,ATTEMPTTRIALS,nupper,0,levellim,restr,devid);
1488 nextstep=(accfrag)?true:false;
1489 //if(!nextstep) {this->dumpMol("nofragleft.pdb",s.ff); nextstep=completeAttempt(logfile,s,gP,ATTEMPTTRIALS,nupper,0,levellim,restr,false,false,false,NULLMOL,0,devid);} //TODO: Optionally remove this forced DeNovo addition
1490 if(nextstep) componentFrags.push_back(accfrag);
1491 }
1492 if(nextstep)
1493 {
1494 cout << "Commiting: "<<gP->toString()<<"\n";
1495 commit(); t=0;
1496 }
1497 else
1498 {
1499 cout << "Rollback\n";
1500 rollback(s);
1501 #ifdef REALTIME
1502 this->dumpMol("rolledback.pdb",s.ff);
1503 this->dumpMol("realtime.pdb",s.ff);
1504 usleep(REALTIME*2);
1505 #endif
1506 t++;
1507 cout << "Rolled back: ";
1508 logfile << "Rolled back: ";
1509 this->describeStructure(logfile);
1510 }
1511 }
1512 if(this->getEffectiveSize()<n-2) return; //Might not be needed for fragment-based case
1513 //this->dumpMol("pre_reduction.pdb");
1514
1515 // The simple physics-based optimization is below (same as Molecule::samplegrow())
1516 if(USE_PHYSICS)
1517 {
1518 this->dumpMol("preopt_fraggrown.pdb",s.ff);
1519 physics::optimizeMolecule(this,*s.ff,250);
1520 cout << "Short Geomtery-optimized molecule!\n";
1521 }
1522 try
1523 {
1524 this->reduce(s,trials,true,devid);
1525 if(FORCE_CHARGES) this->uniformChargeAdjustments(this->getNetCharge(*s.ff));
1526 }
1527 catch(AtomNotInMoleculeException ex) {this->dumpMol("pre_reduction.pdb"); std::cout << "Crashed with AtomNotInMoleculeException\n"; throw std::exception();}
1528 if(USE_PHYSICS)
1529 {
1530 //physics::gradientDescentPhysics(this);
1531 physics::optimizeMolecule(this,*s.ff);
1532 cout << "Well Geomtery-optimized molecule!\n";
1533 }
1534 }
1535 #endif
1539 void uniformChargeAdjustments(double tchg=0)
1540 {
1541 double chg=0; for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) chg+=atoms[i]->seek_charge();
1542 if(!QUIET)
1543 {
1544 cout << "Net charge on system: "<<chg<<"\n";
1545 cout << "Setting net charge on system to "<<tchg<<" by uniform charge modification\n";
1546 }
1547 chg=(tchg-chg)/atoms.size();
1548 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) atoms[i]->setCharge(atoms[i]->seek_charge()+chg);
1549 }
1553 inline double getNetCharge(const ForceField& ff) const
1554 {
1555 double nc=0;
1556 for(Atom* at : atoms) nc+=at->getFormalCharge();
1557 return nc;
1558 }
1559
1563 void describeStructure(std::ostream& outs=std::cout) const
1564 {
1565 for(Atom* a : atoms) outs << a->toString()<<((a->mustCycl)?"*":"")<<((a->isCyclized())?"$":"")<< "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1566 outs << "\t";
1567 for(Atom* a : freeatoms) outs << a->toString() << "("<<a->seek_valency()<<")";
1568 outs <<"\n";
1569 }
1570
1576 std::vector<int> quickLocate(int latind,int startatin,std::vector<int> passed)
1577 {
1578 //std::vector<int> passed=passin;
1579 passed.push_back(startatin);
1580 for(const int& j : bonds[startatin])
1581 {
1582 if(j==latind) return passed;
1583 if(contains(passed,j)) continue;
1584 try {return quickLocate(latind,j,passed);}
1585 catch(NoPathPossibleException ex) {continue;}
1586 }
1587 throw NoPathPossibleException();
1588 }
1589
1590 //Output from Molecule to file
1594 void dumpMol(const std::string& fn,const ForceField* ff=nullptr) const
1595 {
1596 cout << "Dumping to: "<<fn<<"\n";
1597 ofstream of; of.open(fn,ios::out);
1598 dumpMol(of,ff);
1599 of.close();
1600 }
1602 void dumpMol(ofstream& f,const ForceField* ff=nullptr) const; //assume open
1603
1607 void dumpMolAsTxt(ostream& f,bool cpt=false) const
1608 {
1609 f<<atoms.size()<<"\n"; for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) f << *(atoms[i]) << "\n";
1610 if(cpt)
1611 {
1612 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {for(const int bmi : bonds[i]) f <<" "<< bmi; f << "\n";}
1613 f << this->myBE <<" "<<this->myHBE<<"\n";
1614 }
1615 }
1617 inline void dumpMolAsTxt(const std::string& f,bool cpt=false) const {ofstream of; of.open(f,ios::out); this->dumpMolAsTxt(of,cpt); of.close();}
1618 inline void dumpMolAsMol2(const std::string& f,ForceField* ff=nullptr,bool no_orders=false,bool calculate_orders=false,const std::string& name="DNV")
1619 {
1620 ofstream of; of.open(f);
1621 dumpMolAsMol2(of,ff,no_orders,calculate_orders,name);
1622 }
1626 void dumpMolAsGRO(std::ostream& os,int stI=1,bool head=true,const std::string& header="DNV GRO molecule output") const
1627 {
1628 if(head)
1629 {
1630 os << header << "\n";
1631 os <<" "<< this->getSize() << "\n";
1632 }
1633 char rnum[10],x[10],y[10],z[10],atn[10],ind[10];
1634 char rnam[10]; sprintf(rnam,"%4s",atoms[0]->getResidue().c_str());
1635 for(Atom* a : atoms)
1636 {
1637 sprintf(rnum,"%d",a->getResidueNumber());
1638 sprintf(atn,"%+4s",a->toString().c_str());
1639 sprintf(ind,"%d",stI++);
1640 sprintf(x,"%.3f",a->seek_x());
1641 sprintf(y,"%.3f",a->seek_y());
1642 sprintf(z,"%.3f",a->seek_z());
1643 char line[100];
1644 sprintf(line,"%+5s%+5s%+5s%+5s %+7s %+7s %+7s\n",rnum,rnam,atn,ind,x,y,z);
1645 os << line;
1646 }
1647 }
1656 void dumpMolAsMol2(std::ostream& os,ForceField* ff=nullptr,bool no_orders=false,bool calculate_orders=false,const std::string& name="DNV")
1657 {
1658 if(no_orders || !ff) calculate_orders=false;
1659 std::string globalrecs="@<TRIPOS>MOLECULE\n"+name+"\n",atomrecs="@<TRIPOS>ATOM\n",bondrecs="@<TRIPOS>BOND\n";
1660 int bondcount=0,conK=0;
1661 const Category* aromcat=nullptr;
1662 const Category* halocat=nullptr;
1663 if(ff)
1664 {
1665 aromcat=ff->hasCategory("aromatic")?&ff->getCategory("aromatic"):nullptr;
1666 halocat=ff->hasCategory("halogen")?&ff->getCategory("halogen"):nullptr;
1667 }
1668 if(!orders.size() && calculate_orders) this->calculateBondOrders2(*ff);
1669 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1670 {
1671 char atstr[100];
1672 char fch=atoms[i]->toString()[0];
1673 std::string symb=(halocat && halocat->contains(atoms[i]))?((fch=='C'?"Cl":(fch=='B'?"Br":std::string(1,fch)))):std::string(1,fch);
1674 if(aromcat && aromcat->contains(atoms[i]))
1675 {
1676 if(fch=='O') symb+=".2";
1677 else symb+=".ar";
1678 }
1679 else
1680 {
1681 if(atoms[i]->getHybridization()) symb+="."+to_string(atoms[i]->getHybridization());
1682 }
1683 char x[10],y[10],z[10];
1684 sprintf(x,"%4.4f",atoms[i]->seek_x()*10);
1685 sprintf(y,"%4.4f",atoms[i]->seek_y()*10);
1686 sprintf(z,"%4.4f",atoms[i]->seek_z()*10);
1687 sprintf(atstr," %4d %4s %9s %9s %9s %5s 1 DNV %1.4f\n",i+1,atoms[i]->toString().c_str(),x,y,z,symb.c_str(),atoms[i]->seek_charge());
1688 atomrecs+=atstr;
1689 bondcount+=bonds[i].size();
1690 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
1691 {
1692 if(bonds[i][j]<i) continue;
1693 char bstr[60];
1694 std::string btype="1";
1695 if(!no_orders)
1696 {
1697 if(aromcat && aromcat->contains(atoms[i]) && aromcat->contains(atoms[bonds[i][j]])) btype="ar";
1698 else {if(orders.size() && orders[i][j]!=1) btype=to_string(orders[i][j]);}
1699 }
1700 sprintf(bstr," %4d %4d %4d %4s\n",++conK,i+1,bonds[i][j]+1,btype.c_str());
1701 bondrecs+=bstr;
1702 }
1703 }
1704 globalrecs+=to_string(atoms.size())+" "+to_string(bondcount/2)+" 0 0 0\n";
1705 if(binding_energy()) os << "#REMARK "<<binding_energy()<<"\t"<<hotspot_binding_energy()<<"\t"<<pE<<"\t"<<errBE<<"\t"<<errHBE<<"(error not impletemented yet -- Last two columns)\n";
1706 for(const auto& ring : cycles)
1707 {
1708 os << "#REMARK CYCLE "<<ring.size()<<" with atoms: ";
1709 for(Atom* a : ring) os << indexOf(a) <<" ";
1710 os<< "\n";
1711 }
1712 os << globalrecs<<atomrecs<<bondrecs<<"\n";
1713 }
1714
1716 float getSolvationEnergyEstimate()
1717 {
1718 float solv=0;
1719 for(Atom* a : atoms) solv+=a->getSolvationCorrection();
1720 return solv;
1721 }
1722
1723
1724 //Geometry
1729 Eigen::Vector3d getCentreOfGeometry(bool inch=false) const
1730 {
1731 Eigen::Vector3d COG(0,0,0);
1732 for(Atom* a : getAtoms())
1733 {
1734 if(!inch && a->isHydrogen()) continue;
1735 COG+=a->getPosition();
1736 }
1737 if(inch) COG/=getSize();
1738 else COG/=getEffectiveSize();
1739 return COG;
1740 }
1742 Eigen::Vector3d getCentreOfMass(bool inch=true) const
1743 {
1744 Eigen::Vector3d COM(0,0,0);
1745 double mass=0;
1746 for(Atom* a : getAtoms())
1747 {
1748 if(!inch && a->isHydrogen()) continue;
1749 COM+=a->getPosition()*a->seek_mass();
1750 mass+=a->seek_mass();
1751 }
1752 COM/=mass;
1753 return COM;
1754 }
1755 #ifdef MACROMODE
1756 inline Eigen::Vector3d getStoredCentreOfMass(bool inch=true)
1757 {
1758 if(comtype!=inch || !hasCOMstored) {storedCOM=getCentreOfMass(inch); hasCOMstored=true; comtype=inch;}
1759 return storedCOM;
1760 }
1761 inline Eigen::Vector3d getStoredCentreOfGeometry(bool inch=true)
1762 {
1763 if(cogtype!=inch || !hasCOGstored) {storedCOG=getCentreOfGeometry(inch); hasCOGstored=true; cogtype=inch;}
1764 return storedCOG;
1765 }
1766 inline void storeNormalVector(const Eigen::Vector3d& v) {storedNormal=v;}
1767 inline const Eigen::Vector3d& getStoredNormalVector() const {return storedNormal;}
1768 #endif
1770 double getMomentOfInertia(bool inch=true) const
1771 {
1772 Eigen::Vector3d COM=getCentreOfMass(inch);
1773 double MOI=0;
1774 for(Atom* a : getAtoms())
1775 {
1776 if(!inch && a->isHydrogen()) continue;
1777 Eigen::Vector3d R=(a->getPosition()-COM); double r=R.dot(R);
1778 MOI+=a->seek_mass()*r*r;
1779 }
1780 return MOI;
1781 }
1786 std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,Eigen::Vector3d> getContainer() const
1787 {
1788 Eigen::Vector3d minC,maxC,temp;
1789 if(getSize()<=0) return make_pair(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0),Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0));
1790 minC=atoms[0]->getPosition(); maxC=atoms[0]->getPosition();
1791 for(int i=1;i<atoms.size();i++)
1792 {
1793 temp=atoms[i]->getPosition();
1794 minC(0)=min(temp(0),minC(0));
1795 minC(1)=min(temp(1),minC(1));
1796 minC(2)=min(temp(2),minC(2));
1797
1798 maxC(0)=max(temp(0),maxC(0));
1799 maxC(1)=max(temp(1),maxC(1));
1800 maxC(2)=max(temp(2),maxC(2));
1801 }
1802 return make_pair(minC,maxC);
1803 }
1807 static double squareDistance(std::vector<double> plane)
1808 {
1809 double d=0,n=plane[0]*plane[0]+plane[1]*plane[1]+plane[2]*plane[2];
1810 for(Atom* a : currMol->atoms) d+=sqr(plane[0]*a->seek_x()+plane[1]*a->seek_y()+plane[2]*a->seek_z()-plane[3]);
1811 return d/n;
1812 }
1818 std::vector<double> bestPlaneOfFit(double err=1e-5) const {currMol=this; return quickmath::gradientDescentFit(squareDistance,4,err);}
1820 inline void translateMolecule(const Eigen::Vector3d& v) {for(Atom* a : atoms) a->setPosition(a->getPosition()+v);}
1825 void rotateMolecule(const Eigen::Vector3d& n,Eigen::Vector3d com=Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0))
1826 {
1827 if(com(0)==0 && com(1)==0 && com(2)==0) com=this->getCentreOfMass();
1828 auto rmat=quickgeom::getRotationMatrix(n/n.norm(),n.norm());
1829 for(Atom* a : atoms)
1830 {
1831 Eigen::Vector3d r=a->getPosition()-com;
1832 r=rmat*r;
1833 a->setPosition(com+r);
1834 }
1835 }
1840 bool rotateDihedralTo(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,Atom* a3,Atom* a4,double dih)
1841 {
1842 int i1=-1,i2=-1,i3=-1,i4=-1;
1843 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1844 {
1845 if(atoms[i]==a1) i1=i;
1846 else if(atoms[i]==a2) i2=i;
1847 else if(atoms[i]==a3) i3=i;
1848 else if(atoms[i]==a4) i4=i;
1849 }
1850 if(i1>=0 && i2>=0 && i3>=0 && i4>=0) return rotateDihedralTo(i1,i2,i3,i4,dih);
1851 else {cout << "In rotateDihedralTo(): Atom chosen is not in given Molecule\n"; cout << i1<<","<<i2<<","<<i3<<","<<i4<<"\n"; throw AtomNotInMoleculeException();}
1852 }
1854 bool rotateDihedralTo(int i1,int i2,int i3,int i4,double dih)
1855 {
1856 std::pair<std::vector<Atom*>,std::vector<Atom*>> sides=splitByBridge(i2,i3);
1857 double adih=chemtools::getDihedral(atoms[i1],atoms[i2],atoms[i3],atoms[i4]);
1858 Eigen::Vector3d orient=atoms[i3]->getPosition()-atoms[i2]->getPosition(); orient*=(adih-dih)/orient.norm();
1859 Molecule* tempm=nullptr; Atom* refa;
1860 bool ch=get<0>(sides).size()<get<1>(sides).size();
1861 if(ch) {tempm=new Molecule(get<0>(sides)); refa=atoms[i2];}
1862 else {tempm=new Molecule(get<1>(sides)); refa=atoms[i3];}
1863 if(!ch) tempm->rotateMolecule(orient,refa->getPosition());
1864 else tempm->rotateMolecule(-orient,refa->getPosition());
1865 if(ch) {for(int i=0;i<tempm->getSize();i++) (get<0>(sides))[i]->setPosition(tempm->getAtom(i)->getPosition());}
1866 else {for(int i=0;i<tempm->getSize();i++) (get<1>(sides))[i]->setPosition(tempm->getAtom(i)->getPosition());}
1867 delete tempm;
1868 return true;
1869 }
1870
1874 double calculateInternalEnergy(const ForceField& ff) const
1875 {
1876 double inte=0;
1877 double ange=0,dihe=0,ofe=0,lje=0;
1878 std::vector<Atom*> visited;
1879 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1880 {
1881 if(atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) continue; //Comment to calculate H-H interactios as well.
1882 visited.push_back(atoms[i]);
1883 std::vector<Atom*> bndats=this->getBondedAtoms(atoms[i]);
1884 std::vector<Atom*> nearat=bndats;
1885 for(Atom* ca : bndats)
1886 {
1887 if(ca->isHydrogen()) continue;
1888 std::vector<Atom*> sbndats=this->getBondedAtoms(ca);
1889 for(Atom* sca : sbndats)
1890 {
1891 if(sca->isHydrogen() || sca==atoms[i]) continue;
1892 nearat.push_back(sca);
1893 std::vector<Atom*> tbndats=this->getBondedAtoms(ca);
1894 for(Atom* tca : tbndats)
1895 {
1896 if(tca==atoms[i]) continue;
1897 if(tca->isHydrogen()) continue; //Comment to calculate 1-4s for Hydrogen as well
1898 ofe+=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(tca,atoms[i])/2;
1899 nearat.push_back(tca);
1900 }
1901 }
1902 }
1903 for(Atom* fa : atoms)
1904 {
1905 if(fa->isHydrogen()) continue; //Comment to calculate LJs for hydrogen as well
1906 if(fa==atoms[i] || contains(nearat,fa)) continue;
1907 double ae=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(fa,atoms[i]);
1908 cout << atoms[i]->toString()<<" "<<atoms[i]->getPosition().transpose() << " "<<fa->toString()<<" "<<fa->getPosition().transpose() << "\t"<<ae<<"\n";
1909 lje+=ae;
1910 }
1911 }
1912 ange/=2; dihe/=2; lje/=2; ofe/=2;
1913 cout << "Angle energy: "<<ange<<"\n";
1914 cout << "Dihedral energy: "<<dihe<<"\n";
1915 cout << "LJ Energy: "<< lje<<"\n";
1916 cout << "1-4 Energy: "<<ofe<<"\n";
1917 return ange+dihe+lje+ofe;
1918 }
1920 std::pair<std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>,std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>> calculateActingForces(Molecule* lig) const
1921 {
1922 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> forces,poses;
1923 Eigen::Vector3d com=lig->getCentreOfMass();
1924 for(Atom* a : lig->getAtoms())
1925 {
1926 Eigen::Vector3d frc(0,0,0);
1927 for(Atom* p : this->getAtoms())
1928 {
1929 Eigen::Vector3d r=p->bondVectorFrom(a); double n=r.norm();
1930 frc+=(chemtools::getLJForce(p,a,n)/n)*r+(chemtools::getElectrostaticForce(p,a,n)/n)*r;
1931 }
1932 poses.push_back((a->getPosition()-com).cross(frc));
1933 forces.push_back(frc);
1934 }
1935 return make_pair(forces,poses);
1936 }
1937
1938 inline bool inSameCycle(Atom* a1,Atom* a2) const
1939 {
1940 bool f1=false,f2=false;
1941 for(auto cd : cycles)
1942 {
1943 f1=false;f2=false;
1944 for(Atom* tg : cd)
1945 {
1946 if(tg==a1) {f1=true; if(f2) break;}
1947 if(tg==a2) {f2=true; if(f1) break;}
1948 }
1949 if(f1 && f2) return true;
1950 }
1951 return false;
1952 }
1953
1957 std::vector<std::pair<int,int>> getAllBridgeHeads()
1958 {
1959 std::vector<std::pair<int,int>> ret;
1960 this->markCyclizedAtoms();
1961 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
1962 {
1963 if(atoms[i]->getStandardValency()<2) continue;
1964 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
1965 {
1966 if(bonds[i][j]>i) continue;
1967 if(atoms[bonds[i][j]]->getStandardValency()<2) continue;
1968 if(!inSameCycle(atoms[i],atoms[bonds[i][j]])) ret.push_back(make_pair(i,bonds[i][j]));
1969 }
1970 }
1971 return ret;
1972 }
1973 std::pair<std::vector<Atom*>,std::vector<Atom*>> splitByBridge(int a1,int a2)
1974 {
1975 if(!contains(bonds[a1],a2)) throw NoSuchBondException();
1976 std::vector<Atom*> f1,f2;
1977 std::vector<int> visited(1,a1);
1978 bool end=false;
1979 while(!end)
1980 {
1981 end=true;
1982 int sl=visited.size();
1983 for(int j=0;j<sl;j++)
1984 {
1985 int ci=visited[j];
1986 for(int i=0;i<bonds[ci].size();i++)
1987 {
1988 if(bonds[ci][i]==a2 || contains(visited,bonds[ci][i])) continue;
1989 visited.push_back(bonds[ci][i]);
1990 end=false;
1991 }
1992 }
1993 }
1994 for(int i : visited) f1.push_back(atoms[i]);
1995 end=false;
1996 visited=std::vector<int>(); visited.push_back(a2);
1997 while(!end)
1998 {
1999 end=true;
2000 int sl=visited.size();
2001 for(int j=0;j<sl;j++)
2002 {
2003 int ci=visited[j];
2004 for(int i=0;i<bonds[ci].size();i++)
2005 {
2006 if(bonds[ci][i]==a1 || contains(visited,bonds[ci][i])) continue;
2007 visited.push_back(bonds[ci][i]);
2008 end=false;
2009 }
2010 }
2011 }
2012 for(int i : visited) f2.push_back(atoms[i]);
2013 return make_pair(f1,f2);
2014 //return make_pair(createSubmolecule(f1),createSubmolecule(f2));
2015 }
2016
2017private:
2018 std::vector<Atom*> parseForSMILES2(int atind,std::string& smiles,std::vector<std::string>& atomnames,const std::vector<int>& hcounts,std::vector<int>& visited,std::vector<Atom*>& atorder,int& ringID,int fromind=-1) const
2019 {
2020 visited.push_back(atind);
2021 atorder.push_back(atoms[atind]);
2022 smiles+="&"+to_string(atind)+"$";
2023 int endI=bonds[atind].size()-1;
2024 for(int i=0;i<bonds[atind].size();i++) {if(atoms[bonds[atind][i]]->isHydrogen()) continue; endI=i;}
2025 for(int i=0;i<bonds[atind].size();i++)
2026 {
2027 int cI=bonds[atind][i];
2028 if(cI==fromind) continue;
2029 if(atoms[cI]->isHydrogen()) continue;
2030 if(contains(visited,cI))
2031 {
2032 if(cI>atind) continue;
2033 //cout << "It is already visited: "<<atoms[cI]->toString()<<"("<<cI<<")-"<<atoms[atind]->toString()<<"("<<i<<")"<<"\n";
2034 if(ringID>10) {atomnames[cI]+="%"; atomnames[atind]+="%";}
2035 atomnames[cI]+=to_string(ringID);
2036 switch(orders[atind][i])
2037 {
2038 case 2:
2039 atomnames[atind]+="=";
2040 break;
2041 case 3:
2042 atomnames[atind]+="#";
2043 break;
2044 }
2045 atomnames[atind]+=to_string(ringID++);
2046 }
2047 else
2048 {
2049 if(i!=endI) smiles+="(";
2050 switch(orders[atind][i])
2051 {
2052 case 2:
2053 smiles+="=";
2054 break;
2055 case 3:
2056 smiles+="#";
2057 break;
2058 }
2059 parseForSMILES2(cI,smiles,atomnames,hcounts,visited,atorder,ringID,atind);
2060 if(i!=endI) smiles+=")";
2061 }
2062 }
2063 return atorder;
2064 }
2065public:
2070 void dropSingleAtom(int din)
2071 {
2072 std::vector<int> conA=bonds[din];
2073 for(int& c : conA)
2074 {
2075 int i=0;
2076 for(;i<bonds[c].size();i++) {if(bonds[c][i]==din) break;}
2077 bonds[c].erase(bonds[c].begin()+i);
2078 atoms[c]->setValency(atoms[c]->seek_valency()+1);
2079 if(!contains(freeatoms,atoms[c])) freeatoms.push_back(atoms[c]);
2080 }
2081 bonds.erase(bonds.begin()+din);
2082 myBE-=atoms[din]->getEnergyContribution();
2083 myHBE-=atoms[din]->getHotspotEnergyContribution();
2084 if(atoms[din]->isHydrogen()) HC--;
2085 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(atoms[din])) HAC--;
2086 atoms.erase(atoms.begin()+din);
2087 for(std::vector<int>& bv : bonds)
2088 {
2089 for(int& i : bv) {if(i>=din) i--;}
2090 }
2091 }
2096 void makePruneFragment(int n,int devid=0)
2097 {
2098 cout << "Begin. n="<<n<<"\n";
2099 std::vector<std::vector<int>> hydats;
2100 std::vector<int> terms,termconns;
2101 bool terminal=true;
2102 int termholder=-1;
2103 std::vector<int> hydatis;
2104 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
2105 {
2106 if(atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) {hydatis.push_back(i); continue;}
2107 std::vector<int> hyd;
2108 terminal=true;
2109 termholder=-1;
2110 for(const int& bai : bonds[i])
2111 {
2112 if(atoms[bai]->isHydrogen()) hyd.push_back(bai);
2113 else
2114 {
2115 if(termholder==-1) termholder=bai;
2116 else {terminal=false; break;}
2117 }
2118 }
2119 if(terminal)
2120 {
2121 if(termholder==-1) cout << "WARN: holder not found!!!\n";
2122 terms.push_back(i); hydats.push_back(hyd); termconns.push_back(termholder);
2123 }
2124 }
2125 if(!terms.size())
2126 {
2127 if(hydatis.size())
2128 {
2129 cout << "NOTE: Prune fragment generation will only remove hydrogen atoms now. No heavy-atom terminals to prune.\n";
2130 int rhi=randomSelect(hydatis,devid);
2131 this->dropSingleAtom(rhi);
2132 n--;
2133 if(n>0) makePruneFragment(n,devid);
2134 else this->dumpMol("prunefrag.pdb");
2135 return;
2136 }
2137 else {cout << "WARN: Prune fragment generation failed. No terminals to prune. Stopping.\n"; describeStructure(); return;}
2138 }
2139 cout << "Terminals:\n"; for(int i=0;i<terms.size();i++) cout<<terms[i]<<":"<< atoms[terms[i]]->toString()<<"\n";
2140 int rS=(int)RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,terms.size());
2141 cout << "Chose rS="<<rS<<" i.e. "<<terms[rS]<<":"<<atoms[terms[rS]]->toString()<<"\n";
2142 std::vector<int> erasure(1,terms[rS]); for(const int& hai : hydats[rS]) erasure.push_back(hai);
2143 int i=-1;
2144 for(i=0;i<bonds[termconns[rS]].size();i++)
2145 {
2146 if(bonds[termconns[rS]][i]==terms[rS]) break;
2147 }
2148 cout << "Using bonds of "<<termconns[rS]<<":"<<atoms[termconns[rS]]->toString()<<"\n";
2149 if(i>=bonds[termconns[rS]].size()) cout << "Failed to find bond for "<<terms[rS]<<" in: "<<bonds[termconns[rS]]<<"\n";
2150 cout << terms[rS] << ":"<<atoms[terms[rS]]->toString()<<"\t"<<i<<"\n";
2151 bonds[termconns[rS]].erase(bonds[termconns[rS]].begin()+i);
2152 if(!atoms[termconns[rS]]->seek_valency()) freeatoms.push_back(atoms[termconns[rS]]);
2153 atoms[termconns[rS]]->setValency(atoms[termconns[rS]]->seek_valency()+1);
2154 HC-=hydats[rS].size();
2155 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(atoms[terms[rS]])) HAC--;
2156 for(int i=0;i<erasure.size();i++)
2157 {
2158 myBE-=atoms[erasure[i]]->getEnergyContribution();
2159 myHBE-=atoms[erasure[i]]->getHotspotEnergyContribution();
2160 for(int deli=0;deli<freeatoms.size();deli++) {if(freeatoms[deli]==atoms[erasure[i]]) {freeatoms.erase(freeatoms.begin()+deli);break;}}
2161 delete atoms[erasure[i]];
2162 atoms.erase(atoms.begin()+erasure[i]);
2163 bonds.erase(bonds.begin()+erasure[i]);
2164 for(int p=i+1;p<erasure.size();p++) {if(erasure[p]>erasure[i]) erasure[p]--;}
2165 for(std::vector<int>& bv : bonds)
2166 {
2167 for(int j=0;j<bv.size();j++) {if(bv[j]>erasure[i]) bv[j]--;}
2168 }
2169 }
2170 describeStructure();
2171 n--;
2172 if(n>0) makePruneFragment(n);
2173 else this->dumpMol("prunefrag.pdb");
2174 }
2176 Molecule* createSubmolecule(const std::vector<Atom*>& ats)
2177 {
2178 std::vector<int> relpos; std::vector<std::vector<int>> bdset; for(int i=0;i<ats.size();i++) bdset.push_back(std::vector<int>());
2179 int backrelpos[atoms.size()+1]; for(int i=0;i<=atoms.size();i++) backrelpos[i]=-1;
2180 for(int i=0;i<ats.size();i++)
2181 {
2182 int aI=this->indexOf(ats[i]);
2183 relpos.push_back(aI);
2184 backrelpos[aI]=i;
2185 }
2186 //cout << "Relative positions established\n";
2187 for(int i=0;i<relpos.size();i++)
2188 {
2189 for(int j=0;j<bonds[relpos[i]].size();j++)
2190 {
2191 if(backrelpos[bonds[relpos[i]][j]]!=-1) bdset[i].push_back(backrelpos[bonds[relpos[i]][j]]);
2192 }
2193 }
2194 std::vector<Atom*> finats; for(Atom* a : ats) finats.push_back(new Atom(*a));
2195 Molecule* ret=new Molecule(finats,bdset);
2196 return ret;
2197 }
2203 std::pair<std::string,std::vector<Atom*>> getSMILES2(const ForceField* ff=nullptr,bool daylight=false) const
2204 {
2205 if(daylight && (!ff || !ff->hasCategory("aromatic"))) throw NoAromaticCategoryException();
2206 if(!orders.size()) throw BondOrdersUncalculatedException();
2207 const Category *aromcat=&(ff->getCategory("aromatic")),*halocat=nullptr; if(ff->hasCategory("halogen")) halocat=&(ff->getCategory("halogen"));
2208 std::string SMILES="";
2209 int K=0,ringID=1;
2210 for(K=0;K<atoms.size();K++) if(!atoms[K]->isHydrogen()) break;
2211 std::vector<int> hcount,visited;
2212 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
2213 {
2214 int hC=0;
2215 if(atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) {hcount.push_back(0); continue;}
2216 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++) {if(atoms[bonds[i][j]]->isHydrogen()) hC++;}
2217 hcount.push_back(hC);
2218 }
2219 std::vector<std::string> atomnames;
2220 for(Atom* a : atoms)
2221 {
2222 if(halocat && halocat->contains(a))
2223 {
2224 if(a->toString()[0]=='C') atomnames.push_back("Cl");
2225 else if(a->toString()[0]=='B') atomnames.push_back("Br");
2226 else atomnames.push_back(std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
2227 }
2228 else atomnames.push_back(std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
2229 if(a->getFormalCharge())
2230 {
2231 int atnind=indexOf(a); if(hcount[atnind]) atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+="H"+((hcount[atnind]==1)?"":to_string(hcount[atnind]));
2232 if(a->getFormalCharge()>0) atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]="["+atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+"+"+to_string((int)a->getFormalCharge())+"]";
2233 else atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]="["+atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+to_string((int)a->getFormalCharge())+"]";
2234 }
2235 }
2236
2237 std::vector<Atom*> neworder;
2238 parseForSMILES2(K,SMILES,atomnames,hcount,visited,neworder,ringID);
2239 if(!QUIET) cout << "Raw SMILES: "<<SMILES<<"\n";
2240
2241 //Replacing atom references by actual node data
2242 for(int i=atoms.size()-1;i>=0;i--)
2243 {
2244 if(!atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) cout << atoms[i]->toString() << "\t"<<atomnames[i]<<"\n";
2245 else continue;
2246 std::string oldsmiles="";
2247 while(oldsmiles!=SMILES)
2248 {
2249 oldsmiles=SMILES;
2250 stringfx::replace(SMILES,"&"+to_string(i)+"$",atomnames[i]);
2251 }
2252 }
2253
2254 //Return the result
2255 if(!QUIET) cout << "New order: \n";
2256 for(Atom* a : neworder) cout << a->toString() <<"("<<this->indexOf(a)<<")"<< "\n";
2257 return make_pair(SMILES,neworder);
2258 }
2259
2260 //Backup - Rewriting of SMILES generation (still works, mostly)
2261 /*std::string produceSMILES2(int cai,std::vector<Atom*>& order,std::vector<int>& visited,std::vector<std::string>& names,int ringID=0,const std::vector<int>& branches=std::vector<int>(),int lastI=-1) const
2262 {
2263 Atom* ca=atoms[cai];
2264 order.push_back(ca); visited.push_back(cai);
2265 std::string smiles=names[cai];
2266 cout << cai << " named "<<ca->toString()<<"\n";
