2268 for(int ii=0;ii<bonds[cai].size();ii++)
2269 {
2270 if(bonds[cai][ii]==lastI) continue;
2271 if(atoms[bonds[cai][ii]]->isHydrogen()) continue;
2272 br++;
2273 if(contains(visited,bonds[cai][ii]))
2274 {
2275 if(cai<bonds[cai][ii]) continue; //Avoid double-labelling
2276 std::string add=to_string(++ringID);
2277 if(ringID>=10) add="%"+add;
2278 names[cai]+=add;
2279 names[bonds[cai][ii]]+=add;
2280 continue;
2281 }
2282 smiles=smiles+"(";
2283 switch(orders[cai][ii])
2284 {
2285 case 2:
2286 smiles=smiles+"=";
2287 break;
2288 case 3:
2289 smiles=smiles+"#";
2290 break;
2291 }
2292 smiles=smiles+produceSMILES2(bonds[cai][ii],order,visited,names,ringID,branches,cai);
2293 smiles=smiles+")";
2294 }
2295 return smiles;
2296 }
2297
2298 std::pair<std::string,std::vector<Atom*>> getSMILES2(const ForceField* ff=nullptr,bool daylight=false) const
2299 {
2300 //Assume bond-orders have been assigned
2301 const Category *aromcat=&(ff->getCategory("aromatic")),*halocat=nullptr; if(ff->hasCategory("halogen")) halocat=&(ff->getCategory("halogen"));
2302 std::vector<std::string> atomnames;
2303 std::vector<int> hcount,visited,branches;
2304 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
2305 {
2306 int hC=0;
2307 if(atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) {hcount.push_back(0); continue;}
2308 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++) {if(atoms[bonds[i][j]]->isHydrogen()) hC++;}
2309 hcount.push_back(hC);
2310 }
2311 for(Atom* a : atoms)
2312 {
2313 if(halocat && halocat->contains(a))
2314 {
2315 if(a->toString()[0]=='C') atomnames.push_back("Cl");
2316 else if(a->toString()[0]=='B') atomnames.push_back("Br");
2317 else atomnames.push_back(std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
2318 }
2319 else if(daylight && aromcat && aromcat->contains(a)) atomnames.push_back(std::string(1,a->toString()[0]+32)); //Lower case
2320 else atomnames.push_back(std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
2321 if(a->getFormalCharge())
2322 {
2323 int atnind=indexOf(a); if(hcount[atnind]) atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+="H"+((hcount[atnind]==1)?"":to_string(hcount[atnind]));
2324 if(a->getFormalCharge()>0) atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]="["+atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+"+"+to_string((int)a->getFormalCharge())+"]";
2325 else atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]="["+atomnames[atomnames.size()-1]+to_string((int)a->getFormalCharge())+"]";
2326 }
2327 }
2328 for(Atom* a : atoms) {if(!a->isHydrogen()) branches.push_back(0);}
2329 int K=0;
2330 Atom* stat=atoms[K++]; while(stat->isHydrogen() && K<atoms.size()) stat=atoms[K++];
2331 visited.push_back(K-1);
2332 cout << "Starting at K="<<K<<"\n";
2333 std::vector<Atom*> dumpatorder;
2334 this->produceSMILES2(K-1,dumpatorder,visited,atomnames,0,branches);
2335 std::cout << "Round 1 complete\n";
2336 visited=std::vector<int>();
2337 std::vector<Atom*> atorder;
2338 std::string res=this->produceSMILES2(K-1,atorder,visited,atomnames,0,branches);
2339 return make_pair(res,atorder);
2340 }*/
2341
2342
2344 inline int getAID(Atom* a) const {return getAID(indexOf(a));}
2346 inline int getAID(int atno) const {return atoms[atno]->seek_mass()+bonds[atno].size()*3;}
2347 inline std::vector<int>& hashatomcomplete(Atom* at) const {return hashatomcomplete(indexOf(at));}
2349 std::vector<int>& hashatomcomplete(int ind) const
2350 {
2351 //cout << "Hashatom complete called: "<<ind<<"\t"<<atoms[ind]->toString()<<"\n";
2352 std::vector<int> myhash(1,getAID(ind));
2353 /*if(bonds[ind].size()<=1)
2354 {
2355 if(!atoms[bonds[ind][0]]->hashvector.size()) hashatomcomplete(bonds[ind][0]);
2356 for(int& i : atoms[bonds[ind][0]]->hashvector) myhash.push_back(i);
2357 return (atoms[ind]->hashvector=myhash);
2358 }*/
2359 std::vector<int> visited(1,ind);
2360 std::vector<int> depcue(1,ind);
2361 while(visited.size()<atoms.size())
2362 {
2363 std::vector<int> nvis;
2364 for(const int& ai : depcue)
2365 {
2366 for(const int& nai : bonds[ai])
2367 {
2368 if(contains(visited,nai)) continue;
2369 if(bonds[nai].size()<=1)
2370 {
2371 visited.push_back(nai);
2372 break;
2373 }
2374 nvis.push_back(nai);
2375 }
2376 }
2377 int dN=0;
2378 for(const int& ni : nvis) {dN+=getAID(ni); visited.push_back(ni);}
2379 myhash.push_back(dN);
2380 depcue=nvis;
2381 }
2382 return (atoms[ind]->hashvector=myhash);
2383 }
2385 long int hashatom(Atom* a)
2386 {
2387 std::vector<Atom*> bnd=this->getBondedAtoms(a);
2388 long int myhash=(long int)(a->toString()[0])*10000;
2389 for(Atom* n : bnd)
2390 {
2391 if(bnd.size()==1)
2392 {
2393 if(!n->hashvalue) hashatom(n);
2394 myhash+=n->hashvalue;
2395 }
2396 myhash+=(int)(n->toString()[0]*10)*(this->getBondedAtoms(n).size());
2397 std::vector<Atom*> sobnd=this->getBondedAtoms(n);
2398 for(Atom* n2 : sobnd)
2399 {
2400 int nb=bonds[indexOf(n2)].size();
2401 if(nb==1) continue;
2402 if(n2==a) continue;
2403 myhash+=(long int)(n2->toString()[0])*nb;
2404 }
2405 }
2406 a->hashvalue=myhash;
2407 return myhash;
2408 }
2410 long int getFirstOrderHash()
2411 {
2412 if(!atoms.size()) return 0;
2413 long int hash=0;
2414 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) {hash+=hashatom(atoms[i]);}
2415 return hash;
2416 }
2421 std::vector<int> getCompleteHash(bool heavy=false) const
2422 {
2423 std::vector<int> fhash;
2424 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
2425 {
2426 cout << atoms[i]->toString() << "\n";
2427 if(!atoms[i]->hashvector.size()) hashatomcomplete(i);
2428 }
2429 for(Atom* a : atoms)
2430 {
2431 if(heavy && a->isHydrogen()) continue;
2432 for(int i=0;i<a->hashvector.size();i++)
2433 {
2434 if(fhash.size()>i) fhash[i]+=a->hashvector[i];
2435 else fhash.push_back(a->hashvector[i]);
2436 }
2437 }
2438 return fhash;
2439 }
2441 double getGraphDistance(const Molecule* m2,double base=0.8) const
2442 {
2443 std::vector<int> hash1=this->getCompleteHash(true),hash2=m2->getCompleteHash(true);
2444 int hA=0;
2445 double baseline=0,avcon=0;
2446 if(getEffectiveSize()<m2->getEffectiveSize())
2447 {
2448 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
2449 {
2450 if(atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) continue;
2451 hA++;
2452 baseline+=atoms[i]->seek_mass();
2453 avcon+=bonds[i].size();
2454 }
2455 baseline/=hA;
2456 avcon/=hA;
2457 }
2458 else
2459 {
2460 for(int i=0;i<m2->atoms.size();i++)
2461 {
2462 if(m2->atoms[i]->isHydrogen()) continue;
2463 hA++;
2464 baseline+=m2->atoms[i]->seek_mass();
2465 avcon+=m2->bonds[i].size();
2466 }
2467 baseline/=hA;
2468 avcon/=hA;
2469 }
2470 cout << "Baseline: "<<(baseline+12)<<"\n";
2471 cout << "Avcon: "<<avcon<<"\n";
2472 baseline=(baseline+12)*avcon/2;
2473 return normalizedVectorDifference(hash1,hash2,this->getEffectiveSize(),m2->getEffectiveSize(),base);
2474 }
2476 static double normalizedVectorDifference(const std::vector<int>& hash1,const std::vector<int>& hash2,int s1,int s2,double base=0.8)
2477 {
2478 //std::vector<int> diff;
2479 double eN=0,nN=(pow(1/base,min(hash1.size(),hash2.size())-1)-1)/(1/base-1);
2480 for(int i=0;i<min(hash1.size(),hash2.size());i++)
2481 {
2482 eN+=(1-(abs(hash1[i]-hash2[i])/max(hash1[i],hash2[i])))*pow(base,-i);
2483 //if(i!=0) nN+=min(s1,s2)*(baseline)*pow(base,-i); else nN+=min(s1,s2)*(baseline)/4;/* nN+=max(hash1[i],hash2[i])*pow(base,-i);*/
2484 }
2485 /*if(hash1.size()>hash2.size()) for(int i=diff.size();i<hash1.size();i++) {diff.push_back(hash1[i]); nN+=hash1[i]*pow(base,-i);}
2486 else for(int i=diff.size();i<hash2.size();i++) {diff.push_back(hash2[i]); nN+=hash2[i]*pow(base,-i);}*/
2487 //for(int i=0;i<diff.size();i++) eN+=diff[i]*pow(base,-i);
2488 cout <<min(hash1.size(),hash2.size())<<":\t"<<s1<<","<<s2<<"\t"<<eN<<","<<nN<<"\n";
2489 return eN/nN;
2490 }
2491
2493 inline Pose extractPose()
2494 {
2495 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> ret;
2496 for(Atom* a : atoms) ret.push_back(a->getPosition());
2497 return ret;
2498 }
2499 inline void assignPose(const Pose& p)
2500 {
2501 for(int i=0;i<p.size();i++) atoms[i]->setPosition(p[i]);
2502 }
2503 std::vector<Pose> getAllDihedralPosesFrom(const std::vector<std::vector<Atom*>>& dihats,const ForceField& ff,int sh=0)
2504 {
2505 if(!dihats.size()) return std::vector<Pose>(1,this->extractPose());
2506 std::vector<Pose> ret;
2507 std::vector<Atom*> curdih=dihats[sh];
2508 std::vector<double> pars=ff.getDihedralParametersFailsafe(curdih[0],curdih[1],curdih[2],curdih[3]);
2509 std::vector<double> muldih=ForceField::expandMultiplicity(pars[0],pars[2]);
2510 cout <<dihats.size()<<":\t"<< sh << " - "<<muldih.size()<<"\n";
2511 for(int i=0;i<muldih.size();i++)
2512 {
2513 this->rotateDihedralTo(curdih[0],curdih[1],curdih[2],curdih[3],muldih[i]);
2514 if(sh<dihats.size()-1)
2515 {
2516 std::vector<Pose> np=getAllDihedralPosesFrom(dihats,ff,sh+1);
2517 for(Pose p : np) ret.push_back(p);
2518 }
2519 else ret.push_back(this->extractPose());
2520 }
2521 cout << ret.size()<< " poses finally\n";
2522 return ret;
2523 }
2524};
2525
2526class MolecularFragment : public Molecule
2527{
2528protected:
2529 std::vector<std::vector<int>> supports;
2530 std::vector<int> hands;
2531 Eigen::Vector3d myCOG=Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0);
2532 std::vector<Pose> rotatedPoses;
2533 std::string fragmentlabel="";
2534public:
2535 MolecularFragment(std::istream& f,bool eval,bool cpt,const ForceField* ff=nullptr,const std::vector<int>& handles=std::vector<int>(),int prec=10,bool dihman=true) : Molecule(f,eval,cpt,ff)
2536 {
2537 hands=handles;
2538 if(!handles.size()) {for(Atom* a : freeatoms) hands.push_back(indexOf(a));}
2539 myCOG=this->getCentreOfGeometry();
2540 calcSupports();
2541 calcRotatedPoses(*ff,prec,dihman);
2542 }
2543 MolecularFragment(const std::string& f,const std::string& fmt,const ForceField& ff,bool eval,const std::vector<int>& handles=std::vector<int>(),int prec=10,bool dihman=true) : Molecule(f,ff,fmt,eval)
2544 {
2545 hands=handles;
2546 if(!handles.size()) {for(Atom* a : freeatoms) hands.push_back(indexOf(a));}
2547 myCOG=this->getCentreOfGeometry();
2548 calcSupports();
2549 calcRotatedPoses(ff,prec,dihman);
2550 }
2551private:
2552 void calcSupports()
2553 {
2554 supports=std::vector<std::vector<int>>();
2555 for(int i=0;i<hands.size();i++)
2556 {
2557 std::vector<int> sv;
2558 for(int& a1i : bonds[hands[i]])
2559 {
2560 if(bonds[a1i].size()>1)
2561 {
2562 sv.push_back(a1i);
2563 for(int& a2i : bonds[a1i])
2564 {
2565 if(a2i!=hands[i])
2566 {
2567 sv.push_back(a2i);
2568 break;
2569 }
2570 }
2571 break;
2572 }
2573 }
2574 supports.push_back(sv);
2575 }
2576 }
2577 void calcRotatedPoses(const ForceField& ff,int prec=10,bool dihman=true)
2578 {
2579 prec++;
2580 std::vector<std::pair<int,int>> brids=this->getAllBridgeHeads();
2581 std::vector<std::vector<Atom*>> dihseq;
2582 if(dihman)
2583 {
2584 for(auto p : brids)
2585 {
2586 Atom *a2=atoms[get<0>(p)],*a3=atoms[get<1>(p)];
2587 Atom *a1=nullptr,*a4=nullptr;
2588 std::vector<Atom*> dihats;
2589 for(Atom* ax : this->getBondedAtoms(a2))
2590 {
2591 if(ax->isHydrogen() || ax==a3) continue;
2592 else {a1=ax; break;}
2593 }
2594 for(Atom* ax : this->getBondedAtoms(a3))
2595 {
2596 if(ax->isHydrogen() || ax==a2) continue;
2597 else {a4=ax; break;}
2598 }
2599 if(a1 && a4) {dihats.push_back(a1); dihats.push_back(a2); dihats.push_back(a3); dihats.push_back(a4); dihseq.push_back(dihats); cout <<a1->toString()<<"-"<<a2->toString()<<"-"<<a3->toString()<<"-"<<a4->toString()<<"\n";}
2600 }
2601 }
2602 rotatedPoses=std::vector<Pose>(1,this->extractPose());
2603 double DEL=(2*PI/prec);
2604 Eigen::Vector3d xN(1,0,0),yN(0,1,0),zN(0,0,1);
2605 for(int i=1;i<prec;i++)
2606 {
2607 this->rotateMolecule(xN*DEL);
2608 for(int j=1;j<prec;j++)
2609 {
2610 this->rotateMolecule(yN*DEL);
2611 for(int k=1;k<prec;k++)
2612 {
2613 this->rotateMolecule(zN*DEL);
2614 if(dihman)
2615 {
2616 std::vector<Pose> dihposes=this->getAllDihedralPosesFrom(dihseq,ff);
2617 for(Pose p : dihposes) {rotatedPoses.push_back(p);}
2618 }
2619 else rotatedPoses.push_back(this->extractPose());
2620 }
2621 this->rotateMolecule(zN*DEL);
2622 rotatedPoses.push_back(this->extractPose());
2623 }
2624 this->rotateMolecule(yN*DEL);
2625 rotatedPoses.push_back(this->extractPose());
2626 }
2627 }
2628public:
2629 void setLabel(const std::string& lab) {fragmentlabel=lab;}
2630 std::string getLabel() const {return fragmentlabel;}
2631
2632 void alignByAtom(Atom* at,const Eigen::Vector3d& v)
2633 {
2634 Eigen::Vector3d trans=at->getPosition()-v;
2635 for(Atom* a : atoms) a->setPosition(a->getPosition()+trans);
2636 }
2638 inline void rotateFragmentAboutAtom(const Eigen::Vector3d& n,Atom* centre) {this->rotateMolecule(n,centre->getPosition());}
2639 void alignFragmentToPose(Atom* o,Atom* s,Atom* t,const Eigen::Vector3d& ro,const Eigen::Vector3d& rs,const Eigen::Vector3d& rt)
2640 {
2641 alignByAtom(o,ro);
2642 Eigen::Vector3d ni=s->bondVectorTo(o).cross(s->bondVectorTo(t)),nf=Eigen::Vector3d(ro-rs).cross(Eigen::Vector3d(rt-rs));
2643 rotateFragmentAboutAtom(quickgeom::getRotation(ni,nf),o);
2644 }
2645 std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> getHandleAtom(Atom* ref=nullptr)
2646 {
2647 int hai; std::vector<int> sv;
2648 if(!ref)
2649 {
2650 int ri=throwarandompoint(0,hands.size());
2651 hai=hands[ri];
2652 sv=supports[ri];
2653 }
2654 else
2655 {
2656 std::vector<int> al;
2657 std::vector<std::vector<int>> spts;
2658 for(int i=0;i<hands.size();i++)
2659 {
2660 if(atoms[hands[i]]->toString()==ref->toString()) {al.push_back(hands[i]); spts.push_back(supports[i]);}
2661 }
2662 if(al.size())
2663 {
2664 int ri=throwarandompoint(0,al.size());
2665 hai=al[ri];
2666 sv=spts[ri];
2667 }
2668 else return make_pair((Atom*)nullptr,std::vector<Atom*>());
2669 }
2670 std::vector<Atom*> alist; for(int& ind : sv) alist.push_back(atoms[ind]);
2671 return make_pair(atoms[hai],alist);
2672 }
2673 std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> getHandleAt(int i)
2674 {
2675 std::vector<Atom*> hsup; for(int& r : supports[i]) hsup.push_back(atoms[r]);
2676 return make_pair(atoms[i],hsup);
2677 }
2678 const std::vector<Pose>& getAllPoses() const {return rotatedPoses;}
2679 std::vector<Pose> produceRandomPoses(int num,Atom* cha,Eigen::Vector3d fixed,int devid=0)
2680 {
2681 std::vector<Pose> poses;
2682 int ai=indexOf(cha);
2683 while(poses.size()<num)
2684 {
2685 int posind=(int)RNG::throwarandompoint(devid,0,rotatedPoses.size());
2686 Pose rP=rotatedPoses[posind];
2687 Eigen::Vector3d delV=fixed-rP[ai];
2688 Pose fP; for(int i=0;i<rP.size();i++) fP.push_back(rP[i]+delV);
2689 poses.push_back(fP);
2690 }
2691 return poses;
2692 }
2693};
2694
2695//Defining Molecule class member functions here
2696Molecule::Molecule(Atom* a) : Molecule() {
2697 atoms.push_back(a);
2698 freeatoms=atoms;
2699 bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
2700 if(a->isHydrogen()) HC++;
2701 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(a)) HAC++;
2702}
2703Molecule::Molecule(std::vector<Atom*> ats) : Molecule() {
2704 atoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2705 for(Atom* a : ats) atoms.push_back(new Atom(*a));
2706 for(int i=0;i<ats.size();i++) bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
2707 for(Atom* a : atoms)
2708 {
2709 if(a->isHydrogen()) HC++;
2710 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(a)) HAC++;
2711 }
2712}
2713Molecule::Molecule(std::vector<Atom*> ats,std::vector<std::vector<int>> bs)
2714{
2715 atoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2716 for(Atom* a : ats) atoms.push_back(new Atom(*a));
2717 bonds=bs;
2718 freeatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2719 int K=0;
2720 for(Atom* a : atoms)
2721 {
2722 if(a->isHydrogen()) HC++;
2723 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(a)) HAC++;
2724 a->setValency(a->getStandardValency()-bonds[K].size());
2725 if(a->canBond()) freeatoms.push_back(a);
2726 K++;
2727 }
2728}
2729
2730Molecule::Molecule(int n) : Molecule() {
2731 atoms=AtomSet(n);
2732 bonds=std::vector<std::vector<int>>(n);
2733}
2734
2735Molecule::Molecule(const Molecule* o) : Molecule()
2736{
2737 for(int i=0;i<o->getSize();i++) atoms.push_back(new Atom(*(o->atoms[i])));
2738 for(Atom* a : atoms) {if(a->seek_valency()) freeatoms.push_back(a);}
2739 bonds=o->bonds;
2740 type=o->type;
2741 myBE=o->myBE;
2742 myHBE=o->myHBE;
2743 HC=o->HC;
2744 if(VARIEDCOUNT) HAC=o->HAC;
2745}
2746
2747Molecule::Molecule(const char* file,bool eval)
2748{
2749 ifstream f;
2750 f.open(file,ios::in);//opening file containing the data set
2751 if(!f) {cout << "Requested file: "<<file<<"\n"; throw UnableToOpenFileException();}
2752 loadMoleculeFromTXT(f,eval,false);
2753 f.close();//file closed
2754}
2755Molecule::Molecule(std::istream& f,bool eval,bool cpt,const ForceField* ff) : Molecule() {loadMoleculeFromTXT(f,eval,cpt,ff);}
2756void Molecule::loadMoleculeFromTXT(std::istream& f,bool eval,bool cpt,const ForceField* ff)
2757{
2758 //std::cout.precision(std::numeric_limits<double>::max_digits10);
2759 if(!f) {cout <<"In Molecule::loadMoleculeFromTXT:\t"<<"Bad inputstream provided\n"; throw GeneralIOException(); }
2760 int N;
2761 f>>N;//first number in the file contains the number of atoms
2762 HC=0; //Hydrogen count
2763 if(VARIEDCOUNT) HAC=0;
2764 //atoms=new Atom*[N];
2765 atoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2766 bonds=std::vector<std::vector<int>>();
2767 freeatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2768 orders=std::vector<std::vector<unsigned short int>>();
2769 for(int i=0;i<N;++i)//copying atom co-ordinates and other information from file
2770 {
2771 int v;
2772 double x,y,z,wt,c,s,e,r;
2773 std::string id;
2774 f>>id>>x>>y>>z>>v>>wt>>c>>s>>e>>r;
2775 //Atom* tat=new Atom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0,v,wt,c,s,e,r);
2776 #ifdef PLACEHOLDERMOLECULES
2777 Atom* tat=new Atom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0,v,wt,c,s,e,r);
2778 #else
2779 Atom* tat=(ff)?ff->getAtom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0):new Atom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0,v,wt,c,s,e,r);
2780 #endif
2781 //tat=new Atom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0,v,wt,c,s,e,r);
2782 //if(ff->getCategory("ring").contains(tat)) {tat->mustCycl=true; tat->setCyclized();}
2783 atoms.push_back(tat);
2784 bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
2785 if(tat->isHydrogen()) HC++;
2786 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(tat)) HAC++;
2787 //delete[] id;
2788 }
2789 std::string bonddat;
2790 getline(f,bonddat);
2791 if(eval)
2792 {
2793 if(cpt)
2794 {
2795 for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
2796 {
2797 getline(f,bonddat);
2798 //std::vector<int> bdat;
2799 std::stringstream ss(bonddat);
2800 int bn;
2801 while(!ss.eof())
2802 {
2803 ss >> bn;
2804 cout << bn << " ";
2805 if(!contains(bonds[i],bn)) makeBond(atoms[i],atoms[bn]);
2806 if(ss.eof()) break;
2807 }
2808 //bonds.push_back(bdat);
2809 cout << " as bonddat\n";
2810 }
2811 }
2812 #ifndef PLACEHOLDERMOLECULES
2813 for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
2814 for(int j=i+1;j<N;j++)
2815 if(atoms[i]->distanceFrom(atoms[j])<=(atoms[i]->seek_radius()+atoms[j]->seek_radius())/2.0 && atoms[i]->canBond() && atoms[j]->canBond()) makeBond(atoms[i],atoms[j]);
2816 #endif
2817 for(Atom* a : atoms) {if(a->seek_valency()) freeatoms.push_back(a);}
2818 }
2819 else
2820 {
2821 std::string bin;
2822 if(cpt) {for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) getline(f,bin);}
2823 }
2824 if(cpt)
2825 {
2826 std::string eners; getline(f,eners);
2827 cout << eners << " was read for energy\n";
2828 std::stringstream ens(eners);
2829 ens >> myBE >> myHBE;
2830 }
2831 this->describeStructure();
2832}
2833Molecule::Molecule(const std::string& infile,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format,bool eval,bool warnf,char chain)
2834{
2835 ifstream inf; inf.open(infile,ios::in);
2836 if(!inf) {cout << "Requested file: "<<infile<<" was not found/could not be opened for reading\n"; throw FileNotFoundException();}
2837 loadFromInputStream(inf,ff,format,eval,warnf,chain);
2838 inf.close();
2839}
2840Molecule::Molecule(std::istream& infile,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format,bool eval,bool warnf,char chain) {loadFromInputStream(infile,ff,format,eval,warnf,chain);}
2841void Molecule::loadFromInputStream(std::istream& inf,const ForceField& ff,const std::string& format,bool eval,bool warnf,char chain)
2842{
2843 if(format!="pdb" && format!="gro" && format!="mol2") {cout << "Error! Unknown format: "<<format<<"\n"; throw UnknownFileFormatException();}
2844 if(!inf) {cout <<"In Molecule::loadFromInputStream:\t"<<"Bad inputstream provided\n"; throw GeneralIOException(); }
2845 type=1;
2846 std::string line;
2847 int resn,atno=0;
2848 atoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
2849 std::string atnm,rnam;
2850 double xx,yy,zz,chg;
2851 int N=0;
2852 HC=0;
2853 if(VARIEDCOUNT)
2854 {
2855 HAC=0;
2856 if(!VCLIST) {cerr << "ERR: "<<"Chosen varied counting but VCLIST is not set!\n"; throw VariedCountListNotSetException();}
2857 }
2858 char mode=(char)0;
2859 #ifndef BIG_MOLECULES
2860 int atomnumbers[100000];
2861 #else
2862 cout << "Big molecule mode!\n";
2863 int atomnumbers[1000000];
2864 int offset=0;
2865 #endif
2866 std::vector<int> connected;
2867 orders=std::vector<std::vector<unsigned short int>>();
2868 while(true)
2869 {
2870 getline(inf,line);
2871 if(inf.eof()) break;
2872 if(eval && stringfx::indexOf("CONECT",line)==0)
2873 {
2874 line.erase(line.find_last_not_of(" \n\r\t")+1);
2875 if(!QUIET) cout << line << "\n";
2876 stringstream ss(line);
2877 ss >> atnm;
2878 int ind1,ind2; ss >> ind1;
2879 std::vector<int> blist;
2880 while(true)
2881 {
2882 ss >> ind2;
2883 blist.push_back(ind2);
2884 if(ss.tellg()==-1) break;
2885 }
2886 for(int i : blist)
2887 {
2888 if(atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]]->canBond() && atoms[atomnumbers[i]]->canBond() && !contains(connected,atomnumbers[i]))
2889 {
2890 makeBond(atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]],atoms[atomnumbers[i]]);
2891 if(!QUIET) cout << atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]]->toString() << " at index "<<atomnumbers[ind1]<<" bonds to "<<atoms[atomnumbers[i]]->toString()<< " at index "<<atomnumbers[i]<<"\n";
2892 }
2893 }
2894 connected.push_back(atomnumbers[ind1]);
2895 }
2896 if((format=="pdb" && stringfx::indexOf("ATOM",line)!=0 && stringfx::indexOf("HETATM",line)!=0) || (format=="gro" && (line[0]!=' ' && line[0]>'9' && line[0]<'0')) || (format=="mol2" && line[0]=='#')) continue;
2897 if(format=="pdb")
2898 {
2899 resn=std::stoi(line.substr(23,4));
2900 atno=std::stoi(line.substr(7,4));
2901 atnm=stringfx::trim(line.substr(12,4));
2902 rnam=stringfx::trim(line.substr(17,4));
2903 xx=std::stod(line.substr(31,7))/10;
2904 yy=std::stod(line.substr(38,7))/10;
2905 zz=std::stod(line.substr(46,7))/10;
2906 }
2907 else if(format=="gro")
2908 {
2909 if(line.length()<40) continue;
2910 resn=std::stoi(line.substr(0,5));
2911 atnm=stringfx::trim(line.substr(10,5));
2912 atno=std::stoi(line.substr(15,5));
2913 #ifdef BIG_MOLECULES
2914 if(atno==99999)
2915 {
2916 atno+=offset;
2917 offset+=100000;
2918 }
2919 #endif
2920 rnam=stringfx::trim(line.substr(5,5));
2921 xx=std::stod(line.substr(21,8));
2922 yy=std::stod(line.substr(30,8));
2923 zz=std::stod(line.substr(37,8));
2924 if(!QUIET)
2925 {
2926 cout << resn <<" ";
2927 cout << atnm <<" ";
2928 cout << rnam <<" ";
2929 cout << xx <<" ";
2930 cout << yy <<" ";
2931 cout << zz <<"\n";
2932 }
2933 }
2934 else if(format=="mol2")
2935 {
2936 cout <<"("<<mode<<") "<< line << "\n";
2937 if(line[0]=='@')
2938 {
2939 if(line.find("MOLECULE")!=std::string::npos) mode='M';
2940 else if(line.find("ATOM")!=std::string::npos) mode='A';
2941 else if(line.find("BOND")!=std::string::npos) mode='B';
2942 else mode='S';
2943 continue;
2944 }
2945 if(mode=='S' || !mode || line.length()<12) continue;
2946 switch(mode)
2947 {
2948 case 'M': continue;
2949 case 'A':
2950 atno=std::stoi(line.substr(3,4));
2951 atnm=stringfx::trim(line.substr(8,4));
2952 xx=std::stod(line.substr(18,8));
2953 yy=std::stod(line.substr(28,8));
2954 zz=std::stod(line.substr(38,8));
2955 rnam=stringfx::trim(line.substr(58,4));
2956 chg=std::stod(line.substr(69));
2957 break;
2958 case 'B':
2959 int ign;
2960 stringstream ss(line);
2961 ss >> ign;
2962 std::string btp;
2963 int ind1,ind2,ord=1; ss >> ind1 >> ind2 >> btp;
2964 if(atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]]->canBond() && atoms[atomnumbers[ind2]]->canBond())
2965 {
2966 try {ord=std::stoi(btp);} catch(exception e) {}
2967 makeBond(atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]],atoms[atomnumbers[ind2]]);
2968 cout << "Orders: "<<orders.size() << "\n";
2969 orders[atomnumbers[ind1]].push_back(ord);
2970 orders[atomnumbers[ind2]].push_back(ord);
2971 if(!QUIET) cout << atoms[atomnumbers[ind1]]->toString() << " at index "<<atomnumbers[ind1]<<" bonds to "<<atoms[atomnumbers[ind2]]->toString()<< "\n";
2972 }
2973 continue;
2974 }
2975 }
2976 try
2977 {
2978 Residue rsd=ff.getResidue(rnam);
2979 std::pair<std::string,double> act=rsd.getActualWithCharge(atnm);
2980 atnm=get<0>(act);
2981 chg=get<1>(act);
2982 if(chg) mode='A';
2983 else {if(format!="mol2") mode=(char)0;}
2984 }
2985 catch(ResidueNotFoundException ex)
2986 {
2987 if(!warnf)
2988 cout << "Warning: Residue '"<<resn<<"("<<rnam<<")': match not found. Assuming the molecule is not a regular protein/DNA molecule. (You will not see further warnings)\n";
2989 warnf=true;
2990 if(format!="mol2") mode=(char)0;
2991 }
2992 #ifndef PLACEHOLDERMOLECULES
2993 Atom* match=nullptr;
2994 for(Atom* a : ff.getAtomTypes())
2995 {
2996 if(stringfx::indexOf(a->toString(),atnm)!=0) continue;
2997 if(!match || a->toString().length()>match->toString().length()) match=a;
2998 }
2999 if(!match)
3000 {
3001 cout << "Atom type match not found for: "<<line<<"for atom type:"<<atnm<<"\n";
3002 continue;
3003 }
3004 atoms.push_back(ff.getAtom(match->toString(),xx,yy,zz));
3005 #else
3006 atoms.push_back(new Atom(atnm,xx,yy,zz,4));
3007 #endif
3008 if(mode=='A')
3009 {
3010 atoms[atoms.size()-1]->setCharge(chg);
3011 orders.push_back(std::vector<unsigned short int>());
3012 }
3013 if(atoms[atoms.size()-1]->isHydrogen()) HC++;
3014 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(atoms[atoms.size()-1])) HAC++;
3015 atoms[atoms.size()-1]->setResidue(rnam);
3016 atoms[atoms.size()-1]->setResidueNumber(resn);
3017 bonds.push_back(std::vector<int>());
3018 atomnumbers[atno]=N++;
3019 //if(contains(hotspotreses,resn)) {hotspotatoms.push_back(atoms[atoms.size()-1]); HN++;}
3020 //cout << line <<"\t"<<line.length()<<"\n";
3021 }
3022 //N=atoms.size();
3023 if(!QUIET) cout << N<<" atoms read into molecule under format: "<<format<<"\n";
3024 if(eval)
3025 {
3026 //cout << "Note: CONECT Records (if any) are omitted\n";
3027 for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
3028 {
3029 if(contains(connected,i)) continue;
3030 for(int j=i+1;j<N;j++)
3031 if(atoms[i]->distanceFrom(atoms[j])<=(atoms[i]->seek_radius()+atoms[j]->seek_radius())/2.0 && atoms[i]->canBond() && atoms[j]->canBond()) makeBond(atoms[i],atoms[j]);
3032 }
3033 for(Atom* a : atoms) {if(a->seek_valency()) freeatoms.push_back(a);}
3034 }
3035}
3036Molecule::~Molecule() {for(Atom* a : atoms) delete a;}
3037
3038inline std::pair<double,double> Molecule::calculateNonBondingEnergy(Atom* dummy,bool write)
3039{
3040 double eOT=0;
3041 if(write) cout << "Size: "<<this->getSize()<<"\n";
3042 for(int i=0;i<this->getSize();i++)
3043 {
3044 if(write)
3045 {
3046 cout << (long)(atoms[i]);
3047 cout << "\t'"<<atoms[i]->toString()<<"'\n";
3048 }
3049 eOT+=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(dummy,atoms[i]);
3050 }
3051 return make_pair(eOT,0);
3052}
3053
3054//Simplicity of energy calculation
3055inline double required_energy(const Molecule* m) {return m->binding_energy();}
3056//Added classes
3064class Protein : public Molecule
3065{
3066protected:
3067 std::vector<Atom*> hotspotatoms;
3068 int HN;
3069 double hsbe=0;
3070protected:
3071 Protein() : Molecule() {}
3072public:
3073 //Protein() : Molecule() {}
3075 Protein(const Molecule* m) : Molecule(m) {type=1; HN=0;} //Protein
3077 Protein(const std::string& str) : Molecule(str.c_str()) {type=1; HN=0;} //Protein
3081 Protein(const std::string& protfile,const std::string& hostspotfile) : Protein(protfile) {loadHotspot(hostspotfile);}
3088 Protein(const std::string& infile,const ForceField& ff,std::vector<int> hotspotreses,const std::string& format="pdb") : Molecule(infile,ff,format,false)
3089 {
3090 type=1;
3091 hotspotatoms=std::vector<Atom*>();
3092 for(Atom* a : atoms) {if(contains(hotspotreses,a->getResidueNumber())) hotspotatoms.push_back(a);}
3093 HN=hotspotatoms.size();
3094 }
3095
3097 virtual inline int getHotspotAtomCount() const {return HN;}

3102 cout << "Filling Protein grid\n";
3103 Eigen::Vector3i gp;

3110 //if(myGrid.get(gp(0),gp(1),gp(2))) cout << "Warning: Grid overlap at "<<gp(0)<<","<<gp(1)<<","<<gp(2)<<"\n";
3111 s.grid().modify(gp(0),gp(1),gp(2),1);
3112 }

3127 void loadHotspot(const std::string& hostspotfile)
3128 {
3129 ifstream f;
3130 f.open(hostspotfile,ios::in);//opening file containing the data set
3131 f>>HN;//first number in the file contains the number of atoms
3132 hotspotatoms=std::vector<Atom*>(HN);// hotspotatoms.reserve(HN);
3133 //hotspotatoms=new Atom*[HN];
3134 int i=0,v;
3135 double x,y,z,wt,c,s,e,r;
3136 for(;i<HN;++i)//copying atom co-ordinates and other information from file
3137 {
3138 char *id=new char[8];
3139 f>>id>>x>>y>>z>>v>>wt>>c>>s>>e>>r;
3140 hotspotatoms[i]=new Atom(id,x/10.0,y/10.0,z/10.0,v,wt,c,s,e,r);
3141 }
3142 }
3143 /* @brief Load the average deviatons from equilibrium for error calculation and more accurate calculation of potentials
3144 @details The average deviation of each residue is loaded into each Atom (See Atom::posdev). This is used for calculating first-order deviation terms for error and adding second-order deviation terms to the value
3145 */
3146 virtual void loadDevations(const std::vector<int>& resnums,const std::vector<double>& devs)
3147 {
3148 for(Atom* a : getAtoms())
3149 {
3150 for(int i=0;i<resnums.size();i++)
3151 {
3152 if(resnums[i]==a->getResidueNumber())
3153 {
3154 a->setPositionDeviation(devs[i]);
3155 break;
3156 }
3157 }
3158 }
3159 }
3160 /*Atom* generateSeed(const Eigen::Vector3d& O,const System& p,Atom* type=nullptr,double RC=1.0)
3161 {
3162
3163 }*/
3174 std::vector<Atom*> generateSeeds(const System& p,const std::vector<Atom*>& seedtypes=std::vector<Atom*>(),int maxseed=1,double RC=1.0,bool allowH=true,bool dense=false,double densval=0.005)
3175 {
3176 const ForceField& ff=*p.ff;
3177 Eigen::Vector3d cog(0,0,0); //Centre of geometry
3178 for(int i=0;i<HN;i++)
3179 cog=cog+hotspotatoms[i]->getPosition();
3180 cog/=HN;
3181 Eigen::Vector3d fpos; double fen;
3182 fpos=cog;
3183 std::vector<Atom*> seeds;
3184 bool fnd=false;
3185 if(!QUIET) cout << "Using seed dispersion of "<<((dense)?densval:0.075)<<" per ring\n";
3186 for(double rc=0.1;rc<RC+0.1;rc+=(dense)?densval:0.075) //increments of 0.075A lengths (for radial check)
3187 {
3188 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> vecs;
3189 /*if(dense)*/ vecs=quickgeom::getRandomVectorsInShell(cog,rc,2*maxseed);
3190 //else vecs=quickgeom::getRandomVectorsInShell(cog,rc,maxseed/6);
3191 for(Eigen::Vector3d& v : vecs)
3192 {
3193 Atom* testa=(seedtypes.size())?new Atom(*randomSelect(seedtypes)):((!allowH)?ff.getRandomNonHAtomByType():ff.getRandomAtomByType());
3194 testa->setPosition(v);
3195 if(!p.strongWVCheck(testa)) {delete testa; continue;}
3196 if(get<0>(this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(testa))>0) {delete testa; continue;} // || boltzmannFactor(hsbe,p.temp)>throwarandompoint(0,1)) continue;
3197 if(p.ff->hasCategory("ring") && p.ff->getCategory("ring").contains(testa)) testa->mustCycl=true;
3198 seeds.push_back(new Atom(*testa));
3199 if(seeds.size()>=maxseed)
3200 {
3201 if(!QUIET)
3202 {
3203 for(Atom* a : seeds)
3204 cout << a->toString()<<"\t"<<a->getPosition().transpose()<<"\n";
3205 }
3206 return seeds;//{fnd=true; break;}
3207 }
3208 }
3209 if(fnd) break;
3210 }
3211 if(!seeds.size())
3212 {
3213 cout << "Failed to generate seed in "<<RC<<" nm radius from: "<<cog(0)<<" "<<cog(1)<<" "<<cog(2)<<" - the COG (Centre of Geometry)\n";
3214 return std::vector<Atom*>();
3215 }
3216 /*for(auto& a : seeds)
3217 cout << get<0>(a)->toString()<<"\t"<<(get<1>(a)) << "\n";
3218 beta=1100;
3219 //for(int i=0;i<maxseed;i++) fseeds.push_back(get<0>(weighedSelectBoltzmann(seeds,p.temp)));
3220 beta=4.17;*/
3221 return seeds;
3222 }
3223
3227 virtual std::pair<double,double> calculateNonBondingEnergy(Atom* dummy,bool write=false) override
3228 {
3229 double r=get<0>(Molecule::calculateNonBondingEnergy(dummy,write));
3230 double thsbe=0;
3231 for(int i=0;i<HN;i++) thsbe+=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(dummy,hotspotatoms[i]);
3232 return make_pair(r,thsbe);
3233 }
3237 virtual std::pair<double,double> calculateNonBondingEnergy(Molecule* drug,bool write=false)
3238 {
3239 drug->myBE=0;
3240 drug->myHBE=0;
3241 for(Atom* a :drug->getAtoms())
3242 {
3243 const std::pair<double,double>& p=a->setEnergyContribution(calculateNonBondingEnergy(a,write));
3244 drug->myBE+=get<0>(p);
3245 drug->myHBE+=get<1>(p);
3246 }
3247 return make_pair(drug->myBE,drug->myHBE);
3248 }
3250 inline double getHotspotBindingEnergy() {return hsbe;}
3252 inline const std::vector<Atom*>& getHotspotAtoms() const {return hotspotatoms;}
3254 inline std::vector<Atom*> getHotspotAtoms() {return hotspotatoms;}
3255
3264 #ifndef FRAGGROW
3265 std::vector<System> generateLigands(const ForceField& ff,int n,int sizemin,const std::string& logfilename="dnv_protgen.log",std::vector<Atom*> seedtypes=std::vector<Atom*>(),int seednum=10,bool dense=false,double rmax=2,double ecut=1,int osccount=5,int tottries=250,int tries_per_lig=45,double temp=298,const std::string& seedfile="seeds.pdb",bool restr=false,bool superseed=false,bool reseed=false,bool deseed=false,const quickgeom::Container* contbox=nullptr,Molecule* initmol=nullptr,bool prune=false,int prunedepth=3)
3266 {
3267 System tempS(ff); tempS.temp=temp;
3268 tempS.addMolecule(this);
3269 std::vector<Molecule*> rmols;
3270 std::vector<Atom*> seeds=generateSeeds(tempS,seedtypes,seednum,rmax,dense);
3271 std::vector<double> startbes,starthbes;
3272 for(int i=0;i<seeds.size();i++)
3273 {
3274 const auto& p=this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(seeds[i]);
3275 startbes.push_back(get<0>(p)); seeds[i]->setEnergyContribution(startbes[startbes.size()-1]);
3276 starthbes.push_back(get<1>(p)); seeds[i]->setHotspotEnergyContribution(starthbes[starthbes.size()-1]);
3277 Molecule* fmol=new Molecule(new Atom(*seeds[i]));
3278 fmol->myBE=startbes[startbes.size()-1];
3279 fmol->myHBE=startbes[starthbes.size()-1];
3280 rmols.push_back(fmol);
3281 }
3282 Molecule* seedm=new Molecule(0);
3283 for(Atom* a : seeds) seedm->addAtom(a);
3284 seedm->dumpMol(seedfile);
3285 return generateLigands(ff,n,sizemin,logfilename,rmols,rmax,ecut,osccount,tottries,tries_per_lig,temp,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,contbox,initmol,prune,prunedepth);
3286 }
3287 #endif
3332 #ifndef FRAGGROW
3333 std::vector<System> generateLigands(const ForceField& ff,int n,int sizemin,const std::string& logfilename="dnv_protgen.log",std::vector<Molecule*> rootmols=std::vector<Molecule*>(),double rmax=2,double ecut=1,int osccount=5,int tottries=250,int tries_per_lig=45,double temp=298,bool restr=false,bool superseed=false,bool reseed=false,bool deseed=false,const quickgeom::Container* contbox=nullptr,Molecule* initmol=nullptr,bool prune=false,int prunedepth=3)
3334 #else
3335 std::vector<System> generateLigands(const ForceField& ff,const FragmentSet& frags,int n,int sizemin,const std::string& logfilename="dnv_protgen.log",std::vector<Molecule*> rootmols=std::vector<Molecule*>(),double rmax=2,double ecut=1,int osccount=5,int tottries=250,int tries_per_lig=45,double temp=298,bool restr=false,bool superseed=false,bool reseed=false,bool deseed=false,const quickgeom::Container* contbox=nullptr,Molecule* initmol=nullptr,bool prune=false)
3336 #endif
3337 {
3338 //Setup
3339 envprot=this;
3340 RNG::init();
3341 #ifndef SERIAL
3342 int K[omp_get_max_threads()+1]; for(int i=0;i<=omp_get_max_threads();i++) K[i]=0;
3343 #else
3344 int K[2]; K[0]=0; K[1]=0;
3345 #endif
3346 #ifndef FFCHARGES
3347 netcomm::genff=&ff;
3348 netcomm::badsmileslog.open("badsmiles.log");
3349 netcomm::failures=&K[0];
3350 #ifndef NOZMQ
3351 #ifndef SERIAL
3352 zmqio::initThreads(cout,omp_get_max_threads());
3353 #else
3354 zmqio::initThreads(cout);
3355 #endif
3356 #endif
3357 #endif
3358 /*#ifndef FFCHARGES //FFCHARGES = 1 -> Use only ForceField charges
3359 cout << "Opening socket to "<<IPADDR<<" on port "<<PORT<<" ... ";
3360 #ifndef NOZMQ
3361 cout << "ZMQIO ... ";
3362 zmqio::init();
3363 #else
3364 cout << "NetIO ... ";
3365 netio::init();
3366 #endif
3367 cout << "done!\n";
3368 #endif*/
3369 int tvar,maxsize=90,rootsize=-1;
3370 std::vector<System> ret;
3371 std::ofstream& commonlogfile=fileExists(logfilename);
3372 System main(ff); main.temp=temp; main.addMolecule(this); if(contbox) main.setContainer(contbox);
3373 std::vector<System> coll;
3374
3375 int osc=0;
3376 volatile bool lock=false,lockcoll=false;
3377
3378 commonlogfile << "Seeds\n";
3379 for(int i=0;i<rootmols.size();i++) {rootmols[i]->describeStructure(commonlogfile); commonlogfile <<"\twith energy: "<<rootmols[i]->myBE<<"("<<rootmols[i]->myHBE<<")\n";}
3380 //int rv;
3381 if(initmol)
3382 {
3383 System initsys=main;
3384 this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(initmol);
3385 initsys.addMolecule(initmol);
3386 initmol->type=0;
3387 initmol->dumpMol("inital_template.pdb");
3388 coll.push_back(initsys);
3389 if(prune) {rootmols=std::vector<Molecule*>(1,initmol); rootsize=initmol->getEffectiveSize(); maxsize=rootsize+sizemin+3;}
3390 }
3391 if(prune && !initmol) prune=false;
3392 bool smilehandle=true;
3393 bool generate=true;
3394 #ifndef SERIAL
3395 if(!USE_PHYSICS) commonlogfile << "Primary Optimzation: On \n";
3396 else commonlogfile << "Primary Optimzation: Off \n";
3397
3398 if(FORCE_CHARGES) commonlogfile << "Using uniform charge balancing to get integer net charges. \n";
3399 else commonlogfile << "WARN: Net charges per molecule may not be integers \n";
3400
3401 #ifndef FFCHARGES
3402 commonlogfile << "Default FF Charges: Off (using external charges) \n";
3403 #else
3404 commonlogfile << "Default FF Charges: On \n";
3405 #endif
3406 commonlogfile.flush();
3407 std::vector<Molecule*> threadseeds[omp_get_max_threads()];
3408 for(int i=0;i<omp_get_max_threads();i++) threadseeds[i]=std::vector<Molecule*>();
3409 for(int i=0;i<rootmols.size();i++) threadseeds[i%omp_get_max_threads()].push_back(rootmols[i]);
3410 for(int i=0;i<omp_get_max_threads();i++) {if(!threadseeds[i].size()) threadseeds[i].push_back(randomSelect(rootmols));}
3411 commonlogfile << "Parallelized run begins with CPU count: "<<omp_get_num_procs()<<"\n";
3412 cout << "Parallelized run begins with CPU count: "<<omp_get_num_procs()<<", and ~"<<threadseeds[0].size()<<" seeds per core, with trial limit="<<tottries<<" per core\n";
3413 #ifndef NOINTERFACE
3414 cin >> tvar;
3415 #endif
3416 #pragma omp parallel
3417 {
3418 int id=omp_get_thread_num();
3419 cout << "Thread no "+to_string(id)+"\thas "+to_string(threadseeds[id].size())+" seeds\n";
3420 #ifndef FFCHARGES
3421 //bool smilehandle=(id==0); //The thread with ID=0 will handle SMILES
3422 //bool generate=(id!=0);
3423 cout << "Using external charges for thread "+to_string(id)+" "+to_string(generate)+" "+to_string(smilehandle)+"\n";
3424 #else
3425 cout << "Using forcefield charges\n";
3426 #endif
3427 #else
3428 int id=0;
3429 cout << "Serial Job\n";
3430 #endif
3431
3432 int F=0,L=0,common_seedlength=0;
3433 bool dels;
3434 Molecule* testm;
3435 System s1=System(ForceField());
3436 Molecule *chosenroot,*common_newroot=nullptr;
3437 double e1,e2,P,common_avgenergy;
3438 #ifndef SERIAL
3439 cout << "Starting on processor: "+to_string(id)+"\n";
3440 std::ofstream& logfile=fileExists(logfilename+"__"+to_string(id));
3441 logfile << "Starting on processor/thread: "+to_string(id)+" generation: "+to_string(generate)+", smiles: "+to_string(smilehandle)+"\n";
3442 logfile << "Using seeds: ";
3443 for(int i=0;i<threadseeds[id].size();i++) {threadseeds[id][i]->describeStructure(logfile); logfile <<"\twith energy: "<<threadseeds[id][i]->myBE<<"("<<threadseeds[id][i]->myHBE<<")\n";}
3444 logfile.flush();
3445 #else
3446 std::ofstream& logfile=commonlogfile;
3447 #endif
3448
3449 while(ret.size()<n)
3450 {
3451 if(generate)
3452 {
3453 dels=false;
3454 if(K[id]>tottries) {logfile << "All tries over. Quitting with results uptil now!\n"; commonlogfile <<id<<": All tries over. Quitting with results uptil now!\n"; logfile.close(); break;}
3455 if(F>25) //Rejected 25 molecules in a row
3456 {
3457 //main.temp+=1;
3458 commonlogfile << "25 Rejections (by energy) in a row. Heating system by 1K. Current temperature: "+to_string(main.temp)+"\n";
3459 F=0;
3460 }
3461 s1=main;
3462 #ifndef SERIAL
3463 chosenroot=randomSelect(threadseeds[id]);
3464 #else
3465 chosenroot=randomSelect(rootmols);
3466 #endif
3467 testm=new Molecule(chosenroot);
3468 testm->type=0;
3469 #ifndef FRAGGROW
3470 if(prune)
3471 testm->makePruneFragment((int)RNG::throwarandompoint(id,0,prunedepth)+1);
3472 #endif
3473 //logfile << "Loaded seed: "<<rootmols[rv]->toString()<<" with energy: "<<seeds[rv]->getEnergyContribution()<<"\n";
3474 //testm->set_binding_energy(startbes[rv]);
3475 //testm->myBE=startbes[rv];
3476 //testm->set_hotspot_binding_energy(starthbes[rv]);
3477 //testm->myHBE=starthbes[rv];
3478 //cout << "Success\n";
3479 s1.addMolecule(testm);
3480 if(superseed || reseed)
3481 {
3482 common_seedlength=testm->getSize();
3483 common_avgenergy=testm->myBE/common_seedlength;
3484 }
3485 if(!QUIET) cout << testm->getEffectiveSize() << " is effective size of testm to begin with\n";
3486 logfile << testm->getEffectiveSize() << " is effective size of testm to begin with\n";
3487 #ifndef FRAGGROW
3488 if(prune) testm->samplegrow(logfile,s1,sizemin+rootsize,tries_per_lig,maxsize,LEVELLIMIT,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,common_newroot,common_seedlength,id);
3489 else testm->samplegrow(logfile,s1,sizemin,tries_per_lig,maxsize,LEVELLIMIT,restr,superseed,reseed,deseed,common_newroot,common_seedlength,id);
3490 #else
3491 testm->fragmentgrow(logfile,s1,frags,sizemin,tries_per_lig,maxsize,LEVELLIMIT,restr,id);
3492 #endif
3493 logfile << testm->getEffectiveSize() << " is effective size of testm after generation\n";
3494 #ifndef NOSEEDCHECK
3495 if(!prune && !main.ff->isSatisfied(testm->getAtom(0),testm->getBondedAtoms(testm->getAtom(0)))) {logfile << "Rejecting molecule due to unsatisfied seed atom\n"; delete testm; continue;}
3496 #endif
3497 if(!QUIET) cout << testm->getEffectiveSize() << " is effective size of testm after generation\n";
3498
3499 if(superseed && common_newroot && testm->getSize()>common_seedlength)
3500 {
3501 if(!QUIET) cout << "Superseed: ";
3502 if(testm->getRandomBondableAtom() && testm->getAtom(common_seedlength)->getEnergyContribution()<common_avgenergy)
3503 {
3504 #ifndef SERIAL
3505 threadseeds[id].push_back(new Molecule(common_newroot));
3506 if(deseed) dels=true;
3507 if(!QUIET) cout << "Added new molecule of size = "<<common_newroot->getSize()<<"\n";
3508 common_newroot->dumpMol("newseed_"+to_string(id)+"_"+to_string(threadseeds[id].size())+".pdb");
3509 #else
3510 rootmols.push_back(new Molecule(common_newroot)); if(deseed) dels=true;
3511 if(!QUIET) cout << "Added new molecule of size = "<<common_newroot->getSize()<<"\n";
3512 common_newroot->dumpMol("newseed_serial_"+to_string(rootmols.size())+".pdb");
3513 #endif
3514 }
3515 else if(!QUIET) cout << "No change\n";
3516 delete common_newroot;
3517 common_newroot=nullptr;
3518 }
3519 if(reseed)
3520 {
3521 Atom *tatm,*fatm=nullptr;
3522 for(int i=common_seedlength;i<testm->getSize();i++)
3523 {
3524 tatm=testm->getAtom(i);
3525 if(tatm->isHydrogen()) continue;
3526 if(tatm->getEnergyContribution()<common_avgenergy) {if(!fatm || tatm->getEnergyContribution()<fatm->getEnergyContribution()) fatm=tatm;}
3527 }
3528 if(fatm) {rootmols.push_back(new Molecule(new Atom(*fatm))); commonlogfile << "Seed added: " << fatm->toString() << "\tTotal seeds: "<<rootmols.size()<<"\n";}
3529 if(deseed && fatm) dels=true;
3530 }
3531 if(dels)
3532 {
3533 int delind=::indexOf(chosenroot,rootmols);
3534 delete rootmols[delind];
3535 //delete chosenroot;
3536 rootmols.erase(rootmols.begin()+delind);
3537 commonlogfile << "Seed erased.\n";
3538 }
3539
3540 if(testm->getEffectiveSize()<=0) logfile << "It (testm) had negative size with "<<testm->HC<<" hydrogens\n"; //Check may be removed soon
3541 if(testm->getEffectiveSize()<sizemin)
3542 {
3543 cout << "Deleteing molecule\n"; logfile << "Deleteing molecule for short size: "<<testm->getEffectiveSize()<<"(H:"<<(testm->HC)<<") described by: ";
3544 testm->describeStructure(logfile);
3545 logfile<<", over required"<<sizemin<<"\n";
3546 delete testm; K[id]++;
3547 continue;
3548 //if(!smilehandle) continue;
3549 }
3550 K[id]=0;
3551 /*for(Atom* temp : testm->getAtoms())
3552 {
3553 switch(temp->toString()[0])
3554 {
3555 case 'H': case 'C': break;
3556 case 'N': testm->pE+=4.5; break;
3557 case 'O': testm->pE+=6; break;
3558 default: testm->pE+=10; break;
3559 }
3560 if(main.ff.getCategory("aromatic").contains(temp)) {testm->pE-=22;}
3561 else if(main.ff.getCategory("alkene").contains(temp)) {testm->pE-=5;}
3562 else if(temp->isCyclized()) {testm->pE-=12;}
3563 }*/ //Uncomment to penalize/reward by entropy (and polarity)
3564 #ifndef FFCHARGES
3565 ForceField nff(*main.ff);
3566 testm->calculateBondOrders2(nff);
3567 netcomm::processRequest(logfile,testm,id);
3568 //cout << "Completed generation of a molecule by: "+to_string(id)+"\n";
3569 logfile << "Completed generation of a molecule by: "+to_string(id)+"\n";
3570 //logfile << "Added request. Size now: "+to_string(netcomm::queueSize())+"\n";
3571 //while(testm!=netcomm::processRequest()) {}
3572 #endif
3573 }
3574 if(smilehandle)
3575 {
3576 //if(!testm) {lockcoll=false; continue;}
3577 if(!testm) continue;
3578 if(USE_PHYSICS)
3579 {
3580 /*cout << "Completed rigid-body gradient descent\n";*/
3581 testm->dumpMol("GENERATING_mol_preopt."+to_string(id)+"_"+to_string(L)+".pdb",&ff);
3582 physics::gradientDescentPhysics(main,testm,RBDESCSTEPS);
3583 physics::atomisticGradientDescentPhysics(main,testm,FULLDESCSTEPS);
3584 logfile << "Minimized molecule by: "<<id<<"\n";
3585 logfile.flush();
3586 }
3587 if(FORCE_CHARGES) this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(testm);
3588 e1=testm->binding_energy()+testm->pE;
3589 //if(e1!=e1 || e1==0.0000) {logfile << "Rejecting unstable molecule.\n"; delete testm; lockcoll=false; continue;}
3590 if(e1!=e1 || e1==0.0000) {logfile << "Rejecting unstable molecule.\n"; delete testm; continue;}
3591 while(lockcoll) {}
3592 lockcoll=true;
3593 if(coll.size())
3594 {
3595 e2=coll[coll.size()-1].getDrugMolecule()->binding_energy()+coll[coll.size()-1].getDrugMolecule()->pE;
3596 if(abs(e1-e2)<ecut) {coll.push_back(s1); logfile << "Similar energies ("<<e1<<","<<e2<<") encountered\n. "<<coll.size()<<" molecules collected.\n"; commonlogfile << to_string(id)+": Similar energies ("+to_string(e1)+","+to_string(e2)+") encountered\n. "+to_string(coll.size())+" molecules collected.\n"; lockcoll=false; continue;}
3597 P=RNG::throwarandompoint(id,0,1);
3598 if(P>boltzmannFactor(e1-e2,s1.temp)) {logfile << "Rejecting molecule of energy "<<e1<<" over more stable "<<e2<<" with P="<<boltzmannFactor(e1-e2,s1.temp)<<", throwing value in (0,1): "<<P<<"\n"; F++; delete testm; lockcoll=false; continue;}
3599 else
3600 {
3601 F=0;
3602 coll.push_back(s1);
3603 lockcoll=false;
3604 //coll=std::vector<System>(1,s1);
3605 if(e1>e2) osc++;
3606 commonlogfile << "Accepting (possibly lower) energy molecule: "+to_string(e1)+" over "+to_string(e2)+"\n"; testm->describeStructure(commonlogfile);
3607 commonlogfile << "Oscillations upto now: "+to_string(osc)+"\nCommits upto now: "+to_string(ret.size())+"/"+to_string(n)+"\n";
3608 commonlogfile.flush();
3609 testm->dumpMol("GENERATING_mol."+to_string(id)+"_"+to_string(++L)+".pdb",&ff);
3610 }
3611 //if(coll.size()>=n) {logfile << "Accumulated sufficient ligands: "<<n<<"\n"; return coll;}
3612 if(osc>=osccount)
3613 {
3614 while(lock) {}
3615 lock=true;
3616 cout << "Oscillations reached cutoff="<<osccount<<". Will commit some molecules\n";
3617 commonlogfile << "Oscillations reached cutoff. Will commit some molecules\n";
3618 e1=0; double ex; int nc=0;
3619 for(System& s : coll)
3620 {
3621 ex=required_energy(s.getDrugMolecule());
3622 if(ex>0) continue;
3623 e1+=ex;
3624 nc++;
3625 }
3626 e1/=nc;
3627 logfile << "Committing some molecules: Average binding energy (hotspot) = "+to_string(e1)+"\n";
3628 std::vector<int> delinds;
3629 for(int i=0;i<coll.size();i++)
3630 {
3631 if(i==0) continue;
3632 //if(prune) {if(initmol->myBE<coll[i].getDrugMolecule()->myBE) continue;}
3633 if(required_energy(coll[i].getDrugMolecule())>e1 || (initmol && initmol->myBE<coll[i].getDrugMolecule()->myBE))
3634 {
3635 commonlogfile << "Deleteing collected molecule\n";
3636 coll[i].getDrugMolecule()->describeStructure();
3637 delinds.push_back(i);
3638 continue;
3639 }
3640 ret.push_back(coll[i]);
3641 //commonlogfile << "Committing with binding energy(array index: "<<i<<"): "<<required_energy(coll[i].getDrugMolecule())<<"\n";
3642 cout << "Committing with binding energy(array index: "<<i<<"): "<<required_energy(coll[i].getDrugMolecule())<<"\n";
3643 }
3644 for(int& i : delinds)
3645 {
3646 coll[i].getDrugMolecule()->describeStructure();
3647 delete coll[i].getDrugMolecule();
3648 }
3649 cout << "Current commit size: "<<ret.size()<<"\n";
3650 if(ret.size()) coll=std::vector<System>(1,ret[ret.size()-1]);
3651 else coll=std::vector<System>();
3652 osc=0;
3653 lock=false;
3654 }
3655 }
3656 else {coll.push_back(s1);}
3657 lockcoll=false;
3658 }
3659 }
3660 #ifndef SERIAL
3661 } //End the OMP parallel pragma
3662 #pragma omp barrier
3663 #ifndef NOZMQ
3664 zmqio::stopThreads(cout);
3665 #endif
3666 #endif
3667 if(!ret.size())
3668 {
3669 commonlogfile<<"ERR: Nothing was generated\n";
3670 cout << "WARN: No molecules could be generated.\n";
3671 }
3672 commonlogfile.close();
3673 return ret;
3674 }
3686 Molecule* quickPrune(const ForceField& ff,Molecule* p,std::string logfilename="dnv_prune.log",int iters=100,int expand=0,int tries_per_lig=45,double temp=298,int prunedepth=3,bool restr=false,bool forceexp=false)
3687 {
3688 envprot=this;
3689 int id=0;
3690 if(!p) return p;
3691 p->type=0;
3692 int tsize=p->getEffectiveSize()+expand;
3693 Molecule* curmol=p;
3694 this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(curmol);
3695 System main(ff); main.temp=temp; main.addMolecule(this);
3696 volatile bool lock=false;
3697 volatile int K=0;
3698 volatile int i=0;
3699 #ifndef SERIAL
3700 #pragma omp parallel private(id)
3701 {
3702 id=omp_get_thread_num();
3703 std::ofstream logfile; logfile.open(logfilename+"__"+to_string(id));
3704 //for(int i=0;i<iters/omp_get_max_threads()+1;i++)
3705 #else
3706 std::ofstream& logfile=fileExists(logfilename);
3707 #endif
3708 for(;i<iters;i++)
3709 {
3710 Molecule* tempm=new Molecule(curmol);
3711 tempm->makePruneFragment(prunedepth);
3712 //tempm->dumpMol("prunefrag.pdb");
3713 System s1=main;
3714 s1.addMolecule(tempm);
3715 tempm->samplegrow(logfile,s1,tsize,tries_per_lig,tsize+5,LEVELLIMIT,restr,false,false,false,NULLMOL,0,id);
3716 if(forceexp && tempm->getEffectiveSize()<tsize)
3717 {
3718 logfile << "Deleteing molecule due to small size "<<tempm->getEffectiveSize()<<" over "<<tsize<<"\n"; logfile.flush();
3719 delete tempm;
3720 continue;
3721 }
3722 #ifndef FFCHARGES
3723 ForceField nff=ff;
3724 tempm->calculateBondOrders2(nff);
3725 netcomm::processRequest(logfile,tempm,id);
3726 #endif
3727 //if(forceexp && tempm->getEffectiveSize()<p->getEffectiveSize()+expand) {delete testm; continue;}
3728 if(USE_PHYSICS)
3729 {
3730 physics::gradientDescentPhysics(main,tempm,RBDESCSTEPS);
3731 physics::atomisticGradientDescentPhysics(main,tempm,FULLDESCSTEPS);
3732 this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(tempm);
3733 }
3734 if(tempm->myBE<curmol->myBE)
3735 {
3736 while(lock) {}
3737 lock=true;
3738 if(tempm->myBE>curmol->myBE) {lock=false; delete tempm; continue;} //It is possible that while waiting, another thread commits a more stable molecule which may (unfortunately) be overwritten by this thread
3739 logfile << "Accepting molecule with energy: "+to_string(tempm->myBE)+" over less stable "+to_string(curmol->myBE)+"\n";
3740 curmol=tempm;
3741 tempm->dumpMol(logfile);
3742 lock=false;
3743 logfile.flush();
3744 }
3745 else
3746 {
3747 logfile << "Rejecting molecule with energy: "+to_string(tempm->myBE)+" over more stable "+to_string(curmol->myBE)+"\n";
3748 delete tempm;
3749 }
3750 }
3751 #ifndef SERIAL
3752 cout << "Process "+to_string(id)+" hit loop end\n";
3753 }
3754 #pragma omp barrier
3755 #endif
3756 return curmol;
3757 }
3758 #ifndef FRAGGROW
3759 std::vector<std::vector<System>> trajectoryWiseLigandGeneration(const ForceField& ff,const std::string& genname="dnv_trjgen",int trajcount=80,int base=10,int step=2,int maxsize=50,const std::vector<System>& chkpt=std::vector<System>(),std::vector<Atom*> defseeds=std::vector<Atom*>(),int defseednum=40,bool defdense=false,double defrmax=2,double defecut=1,int defosccount=5,int deftottries=250,int deftries_per_lig=45,double temp=298,int defpruneiters=150,int defprunedepth=-1,double prunescaleperstep=1/3.0)
3760 {
3761 if(defprunedepth==-1) defprunedepth=min(base/2,step*3);
3762 int prunedepth=defprunedepth;
3763 RNG::init();
3764 std::vector<std::vector<System>> trajes; //for(int i=0;i<trajcount;i++) trajes.push_back(std::vector<System>());
3765 std::ofstream logfile; logfile.open(genname+"_trj.log");
3766 std::vector<System> basemols;
3767 if(!chkpt.size())
3768 {
3769 basemols=generateLigands(ff,trajcount,base,genname+"_basegen.log",defseeds,defseednum,defdense,defrmax,defecut,defosccount,deftottries,deftries_per_lig,temp,genname+"_initseeds.pdb");
3770 molfx::makeCheckpoint(genname+"_base.cpt",basemols);
3771 logfile << "Baseline generation completed!\n";
3772 }
3773 else
3774 {
3775 basemols=chkpt;
3776 logfile << "Using provided checkpoint file as baseline generation with checkpoint base size:"+to_string(base)+"\n";
3777 int K=0;
3778 for(const System& s : chkpt)
3779 {
3780 s.getMolecules()[0]->type=0;
3781 this->calculateNonBondingEnergy(s.getDrugMolecule());
3782 //s.getDrugMolecule()->dumpMolAsTxt("startmol_"+to_string(K++)+".txt",true);
3783 s.getDrugMolecule()->dumpMol("startmol_"+to_string(K++)+".pdb",&ff);
3784 }
3785 //for(Atom* ap : basemols[0].getDrugMolecule()->getAtoms()) cout << ap->toString()<<"\t"<<ap->isHydrogen()<<" "<<basemols[0].getDrugMolecule()->indexOf(ap)<<"\t"<<basemols[0].getDrugMolecule()->getBonds()[basemols[0].getDrugMolecule()->indexOf(ap)]<<"\n";
3786 }
3787 logfile.flush();
3788
3789 for(int i=0;i<basemols.size();i++) trajes.push_back(std::vector<System>(1,basemols[i]));
3790 int totsteps=(maxsize-base)/step;
3791 double prunedepthinc=0;
3792 System main(ff); main.addMolecule(this);
3793 for(int I=base+step;I<maxsize;I+=step)
3794 {
3795 logfile << "For step: "<<((I-base)/step)<<" of "<<totsteps<<" steps\n"; logfile.flush();
3796 for(int i=0;i<trajes.size();i++)
3797 {
3798 logfile <<"Beginning "<< (i+1) << " trajectory of "<<trajes.size()<<" total trajectories: "<<((double)(i*100)/trajes.size())<<"% complete\n";
3799 Molecule* curmol=trajes[i][trajes[i].size()-1].getDrugMolecule(); //Get last generated molecule
3800 if(!curmol) {logfile << "WARN: System "<<(i+1)<<" did not have (valid) base generation result at size: "<<I<<"\n"; logfile.flush(); continue;}
3801 curmol=this->quickPrune(ff,curmol,genname+"_prune_"+to_string(I)+".log__"+to_string(i),defpruneiters,step,deftries_per_lig,temp,prunedepth,false,true);
3802 System nsys=main.clone(); nsys.addMolecule(curmol);
3803 trajes[i].push_back(nsys);
3804 }
3805 logfile << "Completed step: "<<((I-base)/step)<<" of "<<totsteps<<" steps\n"; logfile.flush();
3806 std::vector<System> mid; for(int i=0;i<trajes.size();i++) mid.push_back(trajes[i][trajes[i].size()-1]);
3807 molfx::makeCheckpoint(genname+"_stage_"+to_string(I)+".cpt",mid);
3808 prunedepthinc+=prunescaleperstep*step;
3809 prunedepth=defprunedepth+prunedepthinc;
3810 }
3811 logfile.close();
3812 return trajes;
3813 }
3814 #endif
3815
3823 std::vector<std::pair<double,double>> getRadialChargeDistribution(const Eigen::Vector3d& centre,double resol=0.01,double maxr=15,bool onlyhspt=false) //resol := resolution in nm
3824 {
3825 std::vector<std::pair<double,double>> ret;
3826 for(double i=resol;i<maxr;i+=resol) ret.push_back(make_pair(i,0));
3827 double d;
3828 int ind;
3829 std::vector<Atom*>& atlist=(onlyhspt)?hotspotatoms:atoms;
3830 for(Atom* a : atlist)
3831 {
3832 d=a->distanceFrom(centre);
3833 ind=(int)(d/resol);
3834 if(ind>ret.size())
3835 {
3836 cout << "Large protein: \n";
3837 return getRadialChargeDistribution(centre,resol,maxr+10);
3838 }
3839 get<1>(ret[ind])+=a->seek_charge();
3840 }
3841 return ret;
3842 }
3843};
3844
3845//System class Methods
3846/*std::pair<double,double> System::calculateDeltaEnergy(Atom* dummy,Atom* src,const Bond& b,Molecule* srcM) const
3847{
3848 double dEB=srcM->calculateBondingEnergy(dummy,src,b);
3849 double dENB=calculateTotalNonBondingEnergy(dummy);
3850 cout << "Delta Energy Calculations complete\n";
3851 return make_pair(dEB,dENB);
3852}*/
3853/*double System::calculateTotalNonBondingEnergy(Molecule* srcM) const
3854{
3855 assert(srcM);
3856 double e=0;
3857 for(int i=0;i<srcM->getSize();i++) e+=calculateTotalNonBondingEnergy(srcM->getAtom(i),srcM);
3858 return e;
3859}
3860double System::calculateTotalNonBondingEnergy(Atom* dummy,Molecule* srcM=nullptr) const
3861{
3862 short int p;
3863 //cout << "Calculating NB energy of dummy atom: "<<dummy->toString()<<"\n";
3864 double dE=0,nbe=0,hsnbe=0;
3865 for(Molecule* m :mols)
3866 {
3867 nbe=m->calculateNonBondingEnergy(dummy);
3868 if(srcM)
3869 {
3870 if(m->type==1) //Protein
3871 {
3872 srcM->addBE(nbe); dummy->setEnergyContribution(nbe);
3873 hsnbe=((Protein*)m)->getHotspotBindingEnergy();
3874 srcM->addHBE(hsnbe); dummy->setHotspotEnergyContribution(nbe);
3875 }
3876 }
3877 dE+=nbe;
3878 }
3879 //cout << "Done\n";
3880 return dE;
3881}*/
3882void System::generateGrid(int marX=DEFAULT_MARX,int marY=5,int marZ=5,double res=10) //res is the resolution (10x resolution => 1nm has 10 lattice points)
3883{
3884 cout << "Begin grid construction\n";
3885 std::vector<double> xvals,yvals,zvals;
3886 for(Molecule* m : mols)
3887 {
3888 for(int i=0;i<m->getSize();i++)
3889 {
3890 xvals.push_back(m->getAtom(i)->seek_x());
3891 yvals.push_back(m->getAtom(i)->seek_y());
3892 zvals.push_back(m->getAtom(i)->seek_z());
3893 }
3894 }
3895 double mX,MX,mY,MY,mZ,MZ,wX,wY,wZ;
3896 mX=maths::min(xvals); MX=maths::max(xvals);
3897 mY=maths::min(yvals); MY=maths::max(yvals);
3898 mZ=maths::min(zvals); MZ=maths::max(zvals);
3899 cout <<"Will generate grid: xrange["<<mX<<":"<<MX<<"],yrange["<<mY<<":"<<MY<<"],zrange["<<mZ<<":"<<MZ<<"]\n";
3900 wX=(MX-mX)+2*marX; wY=(MY-mY)+2*marY; wZ=(MZ-mZ)+2*marZ;
3901 gridOffset=Eigen::Vector3d(mX-marX,mY-marY,mZ-marZ);
3902 int wid=(int)(wX*res+1),hei=(int)(wY*res+1),dep=(int)(wZ*res+1);
3903 myGrid=new tensor3D_int(wid,hei,dep);
3904 grid_width=wid; grid_height=hei; grid_depth=dep;
3905 grid_resolution=res;
3906 myGrid->fill_with_zero();
3907 cout << "Empty grid created.\n";
3908 for(Molecule* m : mols)
3909 m->loadGrid(*this);
3910 cout << "Grid filled with data\n";
3911}
3912inline System System::clone() const {return *this;}
3913System System::clone(std::vector<Molecule*> omit) const
3914{
3915 System ret=this->clone();
3916 ret.mols=std::vector<Molecule*>();
3917 for(int i=0;i<mols.size();i++)
3918 {
3919 if(contains(omit,mols[i]))
3920 ret.mols.push_back(new Molecule(mols[i]));
3921 else
3922 ret.mols.push_back(mols[i]);
3923 }
3924 return ret;
3925}
3926Eigen::Vector3i System::getClosestFreeSpace(int x,int y,int z,int maxtries=1e4)
3927{
3928 if(!occupied(x,y,z))
3929 {
3930 if(!occupied(x+1,y,z) && !occupied(x-1,y,z) && !occupied(x,y+1,z) && !occupied(x,y-1,z) && !occupied(x,y,z+1) && !occupied(x,y,z-1))
3931 return Eigen::Vector3i(x,y,z);
3932 }
3933 if(!maxtries) {cout <<"Sorry maxtries are up\n."; return Eigen::Vector3i(x,y,z);}
3934 int rd=throwarandompoint(0,6);
3935 switch(rd)
3936 {
3937 case 0:
3938 return getClosestFreeSpace(x-1,y,z,maxtries-1);
3939 case 1:
3940 return getClosestFreeSpace(x,y-1,z,maxtries-1);
3941 case 2:
3942 return getClosestFreeSpace(x,y,z-1,maxtries-1);
3943 case 3:
3944 return getClosestFreeSpace(x+1,y,z,maxtries-1);
3945 case 4:
3946 return getClosestFreeSpace(x,y+1,z,maxtries-1);
3947 case 5:
3948 return getClosestFreeSpace(x,y,z+1,maxtries-1);
3949 default:
3950 cout << "Warning: failed random int\n";
3951 return Eigen::Vector3i(x,y,z);
3952 }
3953}
3954void System::dumpSystem(const std::string& of) const
3955{
3956 ofstream f; f.open(of);
3957 for(Molecule* m : mols)
3958 {
3959 if(m->type==1) continue;
3960 m->dumpMol(f);
3961 }
3962 f.close();
3963 cout << "Dumped system to: "<<of<<"\n";
3964}
3965void System::dumpSystem(const std::string& of,const std::string& tf) const
3966{
3967 dumpSystem(of);
3968 ofstream f; f.open(tf,fstream::out);
3969 for(Molecule* m : mols)
3970 {
3971 if(m->type==1) continue;
3972 m->dumpMolAsTxt(f);
3973 }
3974 f.close();
3975 cout << "Dumped system(cpt) to: "<<tf<<"\n";
3976}
3977Molecule* System::getDrugMolecule() const
3978{
3979 for(Molecule* m : mols) {if(m->type!=1) return m;}
3980 return nullptr;
3981}
3982Molecule* System::popDrugMolecule()
3983{
3984 int ind=-1;
3985 for(int i=0;i<mols.size();i++)
3986 {
3987 if(mols[i]->type!=1)
3988 {
3989 ind=i;
3990 break;
3991 }
3992 }
3993 if(ind==-1) return nullptr;
3994 Molecule* ret=mols[ind];
3995 mols.erase(mols.begin()+ind);
3996 return ret;
3997}
3998Protein* System::getProteinMolecule() const
3999{
4000 for(Molecule* m : mols) {if(m->type==1) return (Protein*)m;}
4001 return nullptr;
4002}
4003bool System::strongWVCheck(Molecule* exm) const
4004{
4005 for(Molecule* m : mols)
4006 {
4007 if(m==exm) continue;
4008 for(int i=0;i<m->getSize();i++)
4009 {
4010 for(int j=0;j<exm->getSize();j++)
4011 {
4012 if(m->getAtom(i)->distanceFrom(exm->getAtom(j))<(m->getAtom(i)->seek_sigma()+exm->getAtom(j)->seek_sigma())/2) return false; //check fails: Atom clashes with protein
4013 //if(m->return_atom(i)->distanceFrom(exm->return_atom(j))<0.24) return false; //check fails: Atom clashes with protein
4014 }
4015 }
4016 }
4017 return true;
4018}
4019bool System::strongWVCheck(Atom* exa) const
4020{
4021 for(Molecule* m : mols)
4022 {
4023 //if(m==exm) continue;
4024 for(int i=0;i<m->getSize();i++)
4025 {
4026 if(m->getAtom(i)->isHydrogen()) continue;
4027 if(m->getAtom(i)->distanceFrom(exa)<(m->getAtom(i)->seek_sigma()+exa->seek_sigma())/2) return false; //check fails: Atom clashes with protein
4028 //if(m->return_atom(i)->distanceFrom(exa)<0.24) return false; //check fails: Atom clashes with protein
4029 }
4030 }
4031 return true;
4032}
4033void Molecule::dumpMol(ofstream& f,const ForceField* ff) const
4034{
4035 //if(type==1) return;
4036 Atom* a; double rnc;
4037 if(binding_energy()) f << "REMARK "<<binding_energy()<<"\t"<<hotspot_binding_energy()<<"\t"<<errBE<<"\t"<<errHBE<<"(error not impletemented yet -- Last two columns)\n";
4038 f << "REMARK VERSION "<<VERSION<<"\n";
4039 if(ff && (rnc=getNetCharge(*ff))) f << "REMARK Net charge: "<<rnc<<"\n";
4040 if(VARIEDCOUNT) f << "REMARK "<<HAC<<" 'heavy' atoms counted while running with varied counting scheme\n";
4041 #ifdef FRAGGROW
4042 for(MolecularFragment* mfg : componentFrags) f << "REMARK FRAGMENT FILE: "<<mfg->getLabel()<<"\n";
4043 #endif
4044 for(const auto& ring : cycles)
4045 {
4046 f << "REMARK CYCLE "<<ring.size()<<" with atoms: ";
4047 for(Atom* a : ring) f << indexOf(a) <<" ";
4048 f<< "\n";
4049 }
4050 const Category* halo=(ff && ff->hasCategory("halogen"))?&(ff->getCategory("halogen")):nullptr;
4051 //cout <<atoms.size()<<" atoms in molecule\n";
4052 //cout << (long)halo<<" as halogen category.\n";
4053 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
4054 {
4055 a=atoms[i];
4056 if(!a) continue;
4057 //std::string tstr;
4058 char xc[10],yc[10],zc[10],tstr[100],ener[10],atind[20],resnum[10];
4059 std::string nform="%3.3f";
4060 sprintf(atind,"%5d",i+1); sprintf(resnum,"%4d",a->getResidueNumber()); sprintf(xc,nform.c_str(),a->seek_x()*10); sprintf(yc,nform.c_str(),a->seek_y()*10); sprintf(zc,nform.c_str(),a->seek_z()*10); if(atoms[i]->getEnergyContribution()<1e3) sprintf(ener,"%3.1f",atoms[i]->getEnergyContribution()); else sprintf(ener,"inf");
4061 //if(halo && halo->contains(a) && (a->toString()[0]=='C' || a->toString()[0]=='B')) sprintf(tstr,"ATOM%c %4d %4s%4s A%4d %8s%8s%8s %5s %c%c\n",((a->mustCycl)?' ':' '),i+1,a->toString().c_str(),a->getResidue().c_str(),a->getResidueNumber(),xc,yc,zc,ener,a->toString()[0],a->toString()[1]);
4062 //else sprintf(tstr,"ATOM%c %5d %4s%4s A%4d %8s%8s%8s %5s %c\n",((a->mustCycl)?' ':' '),i+1,a->toString().c_str(),a->getResidue().c_str(),a->getResidueNumber(),xc,yc,zc,ener,a->toString()[0]);
4063 if(halo && halo->contains(a) && (a->toString()[0]=='C' || a->toString()[0]=='B')) sprintf(tstr,"ATOM%c %5s %4s%4s A%4s %8s%8s%8s %5s %c%c\n",((a->mustCycl)?' ':' '),atind,a->toString().c_str(),a->getResidue().c_str(),resnum,xc,yc,zc,ener,a->toString()[0],a->toString()[1]);
4064 //sprintf(tstr,"ATOM%c %5s %4s%4s A%4s %8s%8s%8s %5s %c%c\n",((a->mustCycl)?' ':' '),atind,a->toString().c_str(),a->getResidue().c_str(),a->getResidueNumber(),xc,yc,zc,ener,a->toString()[0],a->toString()[1]);
4065 else sprintf(tstr,"ATOM%c %5s %4s%4s A%4s %8s%8s%8s %5s %c\n",((a->mustCycl)?' ':' '),atind,a->toString().c_str(),a->getResidue().c_str(),resnum,xc,yc,zc,ener,a->toString()[0]);
4066 if(!QUIET) cout << tstr;
4067 f << tstr;
4068 //f <<(a->toString())[0]<<" "<<a->seek_x()*10<<" "<<a->seek_y()*10<<" "<<a->seek_z()*10<<"\n";
4069 }
4070 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
4071 {
4072 //auto v=atoms[i]->getBondedAtoms();
4073 if(!bonds[i].size()) continue;
4074 char anum[6];
4075 if(!QUIET) cout << "CONECT ";
4076 f << "CONECT ";
4077 sprintf(anum,"%4d",i+1);
4078 if(!QUIET) cout << anum;
4079 f << anum;
4080 for(int j=0;j<bonds[i].size();j++)
4081 {
4082 char conrec[20];
4083 sprintf(conrec," %4d",bonds[i][j]+1);
4084 if(!QUIET) cout << conrec;
4085 f << conrec;
4086 }
4087 if(!QUIET) cout << "\n";
4088 f<< "\n";
4089 }
4090}
4091
4092void Molecule::rollback(const System& s)
4093{
4094 for(Atom* a : atoms)
4095 {
4096 if(!contains(oldatoms,a))
4097 {
4098 if(!QUIET) cout << "Deleting: "<<a->toString()<<"\n";
4099 delete a;
4100 }
4101 } //Freeing memory
4102 atoms=oldatoms;
4103 bonds=oldbonds;
4104 freeatoms=oldfreeatoms;
4105 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) atoms[i]->setValency(valencies[i]);
4106 myBE=oldbe; myHBE=oldhbe;
4107 errBE=olderrbe; errHBE=olderrhbe;
4108 HC=oldHC;
4109 if(VARIEDCOUNT) HAC=oldHAC;
4110 cycles=oldcycles;
4111 for(Atom* a : atoms)
4112 {
4113 if(!a->isCyclized() || a->isCycleStatic()) continue;
4114 bool fnd=false;
4115 for(const auto& cyc : cycles) {if(contains(cyc,a)) {fnd=true; break;}}
4116 if(!fnd) a->setCyclized(false);
4117 }
4118 /*double hse=0;
4119 for(Molecule* m : s.getMolecules())
4120 {
4121 if(m->type!=1) continue; //If not protein, ignore
4122 myBE=((Protein*)m)->calculateNonBondingEnergy(this);
4123 hse+=((Protein*)m)->getHotspotBindingEnergy();
4124 }
4125 myHBE=hse;*/
4126 trialmode=false;
4127}
4128inline double Molecule::getHotspotEnergy(const System& s,double v)
4129{
4130 if(v!=0) return v;
4131 for(Molecule* m : s.getMolecules())
4132 {
4133 v+=get<1>(((Protein*)m)->calculateNonBondingEnergy(this));
4134 //v+=((Protein*)m)->getHotspotBindingEnergy();
4135 }
4136 return v;
4137}
4138bool Molecule::attempt(const System& s,Atom* gP,Atom* nat,Atom*& nxt,int trials,bool restr,int nps,int devid)
4139{
4140 if(!QUIET) cout << trials << " ";
4141 bool acc=true;
4142 nxt=nullptr;
4143 Eigen::Vector3d pos;
4144 std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,double>> penv;
4145 try
4146 {
4147 if(s.ff->hasCategory("aromatic")) penv=chemtools::getAllowedPositions(gP,this,nat,s,20,10,restr,&(s.ff->getCategory("aromatic")),devid);
4148 else penv=chemtools::getAllowedPositions(gP,this,nat,s,20,10,restr,nullptr,devid);
4149 pos=get<0>(penv); nat->setPosition(pos);
4150 }
4151 catch(NoPositionAvailableException ex) {acc=false; nps++;}
4152 if(!nat->isHydrogen() && acc) //If selected atom is accepted and not a hydrogen atom, trial to see if it is close enough for cyclization (Note that if it is, acceptance checks themselves ensure that it can cyclize)
4153 {
4154 for(Atom* ca : atoms)
4155 {
4156 if(ca==gP || ca==nat) continue;
4157 if(ca->isHydrogen()) continue;
4158 if(ca->distanceFrom(nat)<CYCCUT)
4159 {
4160 if(!nxt && ca->canBond() && nat->seek_valency()>1) nxt=ca;
4161 else {acc=false; break;}
4162 }
4163 }
4164 //if(!acc) break;
4165 }
4166 if(acc)
4167 {
4168 if(get<0>(get<1>(penv)))
4169 {
4170 const auto& p=nat->setEnergyContribution(get<1>(penv));
4171 myBE+=get<0>(p); //nat->setEnergyContribution(get<0>(get<1>(penv)));
4172 myHBE+=get<1>(p); //nat->setHotspotEnergyContribution(get<1>(get<1>(penv)));
4173 /*if(nxt && s.getProteinMolecule()!=nullptr)
4174 {
4175 myBE+=nxt->setEnergyContribution(s.getProteinMolecule()->calculateNonBondingEnergy(nxt));
4176 myHBE+=nxt->setHotspotEnergyContribution(s.getProteinMolecule()->getHotspotBindingEnergy());
4177 }*/
4178 //myHBE+=getHotspotEnergy(s,get<1>(penv));
4179 }
4180 return true;
4181 }
4182 else
4183 {
4184 if(!QUIET && nps>=4) cout << "Trials found no acceptable position thrice. Exiting loop...\n";
4185 if(trials>0 && nps<4) {return attempt(s,gP,nat,nxt,trials-1,restr,nps+1,devid);} //Trial 'trial' number of times, but don't waste time if No position is available (thrice)
4186 else return false;
4187 }
4188}
4189
4190static Molecule* merge(const Molecule* m1,const Molecule* m2)
4191{
4192 if(!m1) return new Molecule(m2);
4193 if(!m2) return new Molecule(m1);
4194 return new Molecule(m1);
4195}
4196
4197//Completing chemtools
4198static std::vector<std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,std::pair<double,double>>>> chemtools::getAllAllowedPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,Atom* natom,const System& sys,int num,int tries,bool restr,const Category* aromcat,int devid)
4199{
4200 //if(!mol) cout << "Null molecule pointer\n";
4201 //cout << "Failing at: "<<src->toString()<<"\n";
4202 mol->describeStructure();
4203 std::vector<Atom*> bondcol=mol->getBondedAtoms(src); //,angcol;
4204 double length=0,ang,tempen,proten=0;
4205 std::vector<double> dih;
4206 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> temp;
4207 bool angex=true;
4208 try {length=get<0>(sys.ff->getLengthParameters(src->toString(),natom->toString()));}
4209 catch(DataNotAvailableException ex)
4210 {
4211 std::cout << "No data for bond "<<src->toString()<<"-"<<natom->toString()<<"\n";
4212 throw NoPositionAvailableException();
4213 }
4214 //if(!bondcol.size()) return make_pair(randomSelect(quickgeom::getRandomVectorsInShell(src->getPosition(),length,num*100)),make_pair(0.0,0.0));
4215 if(!bondcol.size()) {angex=false; temp=quickgeom::getRandomVectorsInShell(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0),length,num*20,devid);}
4216 std::vector<std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,std::pair<double,double>>>> ret;
4217 //std::vector<double> diheners;
4218 bool acc,ign=false,cyc,dihexist=false;
4219 double dihe,intlje=0,hsben=0;
4220 double vdis,ct,md=100;
4221 std::vector<std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> atgeom;
4222 std::vector<Atom*> ignore;
4223 for(Atom* a : bondcol)
4224 {
4225 ignore.push_back(a);
4226 std::vector<Atom*> gats;
4227 for(Atom* a2 : mol->getBondedAtoms(a))
4228 {
4229 if(a2==src) continue;
4230 gats.push_back(a2); ignore.push_back(a2);
4231 }
4232 atgeom.push_back(make_pair(a,gats));
4233 }
4234 std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> rs;
4235 Eigen::Vector3d fixedbond,defbond;
4236 if(angex)
4237 {
4238 rs=randomSelect(atgeom);
4239 fixedbond=src->bondVectorTo(get<0>(rs));
4240 ang=sys.ff->getAngleParamtersFailsafe(get<0>(rs)->toString(),src->toString(),natom->toString())[0];
4241 if(!(get<1>(rs).size())) {dihexist=false;}
4242 else
4243 {
4244 Atom* rs2=randomSelect(get<1>(rs));
4245 //dih.push_back(sys.ff->getDihedralParametersFailsafe(rs2->toString(),get<0>(rs)->toString(),src->toString(),natom->toString())[0]);
4246
4247 //if(!natom->isHydrogen() && aromcat && aromcat->contains(src) && !src->isCyclized())
4248 if(!natom->isHydrogen() && aromcat && aromcat->contains(src) && !src->isCyclized() && (!ALLOW_BIPHENYL || !rs2->isCyclized()))
4249 {
4250 if(aromcat->contains(rs2)) {cout << "Forcing 0 dihedral for aromatic atom\n"; dih=std::vector<double>(1,0.0);}
4251 else {cout << "Forcing 180 (degree) dihedral for aromatic atom wrt to non-aromatic atom\n"; dih=std::vector<double>(1,PI);}
4252 }
4253 else
4254 {
4255 auto pars=sys.ff->getDihedralParametersFailsafe(rs2->toString(),get<0>(rs)->toString(),src->toString(),natom->toString());
4256 //dih=std::vector<double>(1,pars[0]*pars[2]);
4257 //cout<<"\t"<<dih[0]<<"\t"<< rs2->toString()<<","<<get<0>(rs)->toString()<<","<<src->toString()<<","<<natom->toString()<<"\n";
4258 dih=ForceField::expandMultiplicity(pars[0],pars[2]);
4259 }
4260 //cout << dih <<":\tchosen for "<<rs2->toString()<<","<<get<0>(rs)->toString()<<","<<src->toString()<<","<<natom->toString()<<"\n";
4261 defbond=get<0>(rs)->bondVectorTo(rs2);
4262 dihexist=true;
4263 }
4264 }
4265 //cout << "Found parameters: Length="<<length<<", Angle="<<(ang*57.28)<<", Dihedral="<<dih<<"\n";
4266 //cout << "Required angle: "<<ang<<"\n";
4267 while(ret.size()<num)
4268 {
4269 //ang=rule->predictAngle(randomSelect(bondcol),src,natom);
4270 if(angex)
4271 {
4272 if(!dihexist) {/*cout << "No dihedral constraints\n";*/ temp=quickgeom::getConePositions(fixedbond,length,ang,num*10,devid);} //Checked that angle is in radians.
4273 else
4274 {
4275 //cout << "\ttemp = "<<"quickgeom::getArcPositions("<<fixedbond.transpose()<<","<<defbond.transpose()<<","<<length<<","<<ang<<","<<dih<<","<<num<<");\n";
4276 temp=quickgeom::getArcPositions(fixedbond,defbond,length,ang,dih,num,devid);
4277 }
4278 }
4279 for(auto& v : temp)
4280 {
4281 acc=true;
4282 cyc=false;
4283 dihe=0; intlje=0; hsben=0;
4284 natom->setPosition(v+src->getPosition());
4285 //cout << "Position: "<<natom->getPosition().transpose()<<"\n";
4286 if(angex && abs(chemtools::getAngle(natom,src,get<0>(rs))-ang)>THETACUT) {acc=false; break;} //The positions are very closely clustered so don't even try the rest.
4287 intlje=0;
4288 hsben=0;
4289 if(!natom->isHydrogen())
4290 {
4291 for(Molecule* m : sys.getMolecules())
4292 {
4293 if(m->type==1) continue; //calculated below
4294 for(Atom* c : m->getAtoms())
4295 {
4296 if(c==src) continue;
4297 vdis=c->distanceFrom(natom);
4298 if(vdis<RCUT) {acc=false; break;}
4299 //if(vdis<md) md=vdis;
4300 if(c->isHydrogen()) {if(!ign) intlje+=getNonbondingPotential(c,natom); continue;}
4301 try {ct=sys.ff->getBondLength(c,natom,true);} catch(DataNotAvailableException ex) {ct=0;}
4302 //if(vdis<md) {acc=false; break;}
4303 ign=contains(ignore,c);
4304 if(vdis<CYCCUT) //How about replacing with energy criteria?
4305 {
4306 //cout << "Too close\n";
4307 if(cyc)
4308 {
4309 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGREJ\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<": Clashing Rings\n";
4310 acc=false; break;
4311 }
4312 if(!ct)
4313 {
4314 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGREJ\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<": No bond defined\n";
4315 acc=false; break;
4316 }
4317 if(!sys.ff->acceptNewBond(src,bondcol,natom) && !ign) {acc=false; break;}
4318 if((!c->canBond() && !ign) || natom->seek_valency()<2) {acc=false; break;}
4319
4320 if(!ign && abs(vdis-ct)>CYCLENVAR)
4321 {
4322 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGREJ\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<": Bad bond-length\n";
4323 acc=false; break;
4324 }
4325 auto bats=mol->getBondedAtoms(c);
4326 if(!ign && (!sys.ff->isSatisfied(c,natom,bats) || !sys.ff->isSatisfied(natom,c,std::vector<Atom*>(1,src))))
4327 {
4328 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGREJ\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<": Unsatisfied atom type\n";
4329 acc=false; break;
4330 }
4331 for(Atom* n : bats)
4332 {
4333 if(sys.ff->calculateAngleEnergy(n,c,natom,true,1.5*THETACUT)!=0)
4334 {
4335 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGREJ\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<": Bad angle\n";
4336 acc=false; break;
4337 }
4338 }
4339 if(!acc) break;
4340 cyc=ign=true;
4341 if(!QUIET) cout << "RINGACC\t"<<natom->toString()<<" with "<<c->toString()<<"\n";
4342 }
4343 if(!ign) intlje+=getNonbondingPotential(c,natom);
4344 }
4345 }
4346 }
4347 else
4348 {
4349 for(Molecule* m : sys.getMolecules())
4350 {
4351 if(m->type==1) continue;
4352 for(Atom* c : m->getAtoms())
4353 {
4354 if(c==src) continue;
4355 if(contains(ignore,c)) continue;
4356 vdis=c->distanceFrom(natom);
4357 if(vdis<RCUT*0.67) {acc=false; break;}
4358 }
4359 }
4360 }
4361 if(!acc) break;
4362 proten=0;
4363 for(Molecule* m : sys.getMolecules())
4364 {
4365 if(m->type==1)
4366 {
4367 for(Atom* pa : m->getAtoms()) //Can restrain atom selection here to ensure only nearby atoms are selected
4368 {
4369 if(!natom->isHydrogen() && !pa->isHydrogen() && pa->distanceFrom(natom)<PROTCUT) {acc=false; break;}
4370 tempen=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(pa,natom);
4371 //if(throwarandompoint(0,1)>boltzmannFactor(tempen,sys.temp)) {acc=false; break;}
4372 intlje+=tempen;
4373 proten+=tempen;
4374 }
4375 if(proten>SINGLEATOMENERLIM) acc=false;
4376 if(!acc) {break;}
4377 if(!natom->isHydrogen())
4378 {
4379 if(sys.getContainer()) acc=sys.getContainer()->contains(natom->getPosition());
4380 if(acc && restr)
4381 {
4382 acc=false;
4383 for(Atom* hsa : ((Protein*)m)->getHotspotAtoms()) {if(hsa->distanceFrom(natom)<RESTRAINDISTANCE) {acc=true; break;}}
4384 }
4385 if(!acc) {break;}
4386 }
4387 for(Atom* pa : ((Protein*)m)->getHotspotAtoms()) hsben+=chemtools::getNonbondingPotential(pa,natom);
4388 }
4389 }
4390 if(cyc) {dihe=0; intlje=0;}
4391 if(intlje>SINGLEATOMINTENERLIM) acc=false;
4392 if(!acc) continue;
4393 //dihe+=intlje;
4394 for(auto& p : atgeom)
4395 {
4396 Atom* a=get<0>(p);
4397 //cout << getAngle(a,src,natom) << "\t" << (sys.ff.getAngleParamtersFailsafe(a->toString(),src->toString(),natom->toString()))[0] << "\n";
4398 //if(abs(getAngle(a,src,natom)-(sys.ff.getAngleParamtersFailsafe(a->toString(),src->toString(),natom->toString()))[0])>(10*PI/180.0)) {cout << "R\\a-1,"; acc=false; break;}
4399 if(!dihexist || natom->isHydrogen()) if(sys.ff->calculateAngleEnergy(a,src,natom,true,THETACUT)!=0) {acc=false; break;}
4400 //angcol=mol->getBondedAtoms(a);
4401 /*for(Atom* a2 : get<1>(p))
4402 {
4403 if(a2==src) continue;
4404 //if(mol->calculateDihedralEnergy(a2,a,src,natom)<DIHEDENERCUT) {acc=false; break;}
4405 //if(ff.calculateDihedralEnergy(a2,a,src,natom,true,DIHEDTHETACUT)) {acc=false; break;}
4406 dihe+=sys.ff.calculateDihedralEnergy(a2,a,src,natom,false);
4407 }*/
4408 if(!acc) break;
4409 }
4410 //cout << "\n";
4411 if(acc) {/*if(cyc) return make_pair(v,make_pair(0,0));*/ ret.push_back(make_pair(v+src->getPosition(),make_pair(intlje,make_pair(proten,hsben))));}
4412 if(ret.size()>=num || cyc) break;
4413 }
4414 tries--;
4415 if(tries<=0) break; //{mol->dumpMolAsTxt("faileddrug.txt"); break;}
4416 }
4417 return ret;
4418}
4419static std::pair<Eigen::Vector3d,std::pair<double,double>> chemtools::getAllowedPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,Atom* natom,const System& sys,int num,int tries,bool restr,const Category* aromcat,int devid)
4420{
4421 auto ret=chemtools::getAllAllowedPositions(src,mol,natom,sys,num,tries,restr,aromcat,devid);
4422 if(ret.size())
4423 {
4424 auto& elr=weighedSelectBoltzmannFirst(ret,sys.temp,devid);
4425 if(!QUIET)
4426 {
4427 cout << "\nTrialled\n";
4428 cout << "Internal: "+to_string(get<0>(get<1>(elr)))<<"\n";
4429 }
4430 return make_pair(get<0>(elr),get<1>(get<1>(elr)));
4431 }
4432 //if(ret.size()) {cout << "\nTrialled\n"; return (randomSelect(ret));}
4433 else
4434 {
4435 if(!QUIET) cout << "#FAILED: No valid position available!!\n";
4436 /*Molecule* dmol=new Molecule(mol);
4437 for(Eigen::Vector3d& v : temp) {cout << v.norm() << "\n"; v+=src->getPosition(); dmol->addAtom(sys.ff->getAtom(natom->toString(),v(0),v(1),v(2)));}
4438 dmol->dumpMol("choke.pdb");
4439 delete dmol;*/
4440 //exit(1);
4441 throw NoPositionAvailableException();
4442 }
4443}
4444static std::vector<std::pair<Pose,double>> chemtools::getAllAllowedFragmentPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,MolecularFragment* frag,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> contri,const System& sys,int num,int tries,bool restr,const Category* aromcat,int devid) //num is num per each atom trialled.
