So num**3 trials per residue
4445{
4446 std::vector<std::pair<Pose,double>> ret;
4447 Molecule* core=mol;
4448 int srcInd=mol->indexOf(src);
4449 //std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>> contri=frag->getHandleAt(handle);
4450 Atom* trialler1=new Atom(*get<0>(contri));
4451 auto atposes1=getAllAllowedPositions(src,mol,trialler1,sys,num,tries,restr,aromcat,devid);
4452 for(auto& p1s : atposes1)
4453 {
4454 Molecule* temp=new Molecule(core);
4455 System ms1(*sys.ff);
4456 temp->bondAtom(new Atom(*trialler1),temp->getAtom(srcInd));
4457 Atom* src2=temp->getLastAtom();
4458 Atom* trialler2=new Atom(*(get<1>(contri)[0]));
4459 auto atposes2=getAllAllowedPositions(src2,temp,trialler2,sys,num,tries,restr,aromcat,devid);
4460 delete trialler2;
4461 delete temp;
4462 }
4463 delete trialler1;
4464 return ret;
4465}
4466static std::pair<Pose,std::pair<double,double>> chemtools::getAllowedFragmentPositions(Atom* src,Molecule* mol,std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> frag,const System& s,int num,int tries,bool restr,const Category* aromcat,int devid) // Complete rewrite of above function
4467{
4468 MolecularFragment* cfrag=get<0>(frag);
4469 Atom* trialler=new Atom(*(get<0>(get<1>(frag))));
4470 auto atposes1=getAllAllowedPositions(src,mol,trialler,s,num,tries,restr,aromcat,devid);
4471 delete trialler;
4472 std::vector<std::pair<Pose,std::pair<double,double>>> posens;
4473 Protein* sysprot=nullptr;
4474 Atom* anchor=get<0>(get<1>(frag));
4475 for(Molecule* m : s.getMolecules()) {if(m->type==1) {sysprot=(Protein*)m; break;}}
4476 //cout <<"\t *** "<< atposes1.size() << " trial atom positions available ***\n";
4477 for(auto& ps : atposes1)
4478 {
4479 Eigen::Vector3d fixV=get<0>(ps);
4480 std::vector<Pose> fposes=cfrag->produceRandomPoses(num*cfrag->getEffectiveSize(),get<0>(get<1>(frag)),fixV,devid); //(int num,Atom* cha,Eigen::Vector3d fixed,int devid=0)
4481 for(const Pose& pose : fposes)
4482 {
4483 bool accpose=true;
4484 double posener=0;
4485 cfrag->assignPose(pose);
4486 if(get<1>(get<1>(frag)).size())
4487 {
4488 double ang1=chemtools::getAngle(src,anchor,get<1>(get<1>(frag))[0]); //,dih1=chemtools::getDihedral(src,anchor,get<1>(get<1>(frag))[0],get<1>(get<1>(frag))[1]);
4489 double expang=s.ff->getAngleParamtersFailsafe(src,anchor,get<1>(get<1>(frag))[0])[0];
4490 if(::abs(ang1)<0.9 || abs(ang1-expang)>THETACUT) continue; //No sharp angles
4491 if(get<1>(get<1>(frag)).size()>1)
4492 {
4493 double dih1=chemtools::getDihedral(src,anchor,get<1>(get<1>(frag))[0],get<1>(get<1>(frag))[1]);
4494 auto expdihps=s.ff->getDihedralParametersFailsafe(src,anchor,get<1>(get<1>(frag))[0],get<1>(get<1>(frag))[1]);
4495 std::vector<double> expdihs=ForceField::expandMultiplicity(expdihps[0],expdihps[2]);
4496 bool pass=false;
4497 for(double expdih : expdihs)
4498 {
4499 if(abs(expdih-dih1)<DIHVAR)
4500 {
4501 pass=true;
4502 break;
4503 }
4504 }
4505 if(!pass) continue;
4506 }
4507 }
4508 std::vector<Atom*> immn=cfrag->getBondedAtoms(anchor);
4509 for(Atom* fat : immn)
4510 {
4511 double reqang=s.ff->getAngleParamtersFailsafe(src,anchor,fat)[0];
4512 if(::abs(chemtools::getAngle(src,anchor,fat)-reqang)>THETACUT*2) //Weaker constraints for fragments
4513 {
4514 accpose=false;
4515 break;
4516 }
4517 /*std::vector<Atom*> secn=cfrag->getBondedAtoms(fat);
4518 for(Atom* fat2 : secn)
4519 {
4520 if(fat2==anchor) continue;
4521 auto reqdihps=s.ff->getDihedralParametersFailsafe(src,anchor,fat,fat2);
4522 double calcdih=chemtools::getDihedral(src,anchor,fat,fat2);
4523 std::vector<double> reqdihs=ForceField::expandMultiplicity(reqdihps[0],reqdihps[1]);
4524 bool pass=false;
4525 for(double expdihv : reqdihs)
4526 {
4527 if(abs(expdihv-calcdih)<DIHVAR)
4528 {
4529 pass=true;
4530 break;
4531 }
4532 }
4533 if(!pass) {accpose=false; break;}
4534 }*/
4535 if(!accpose) break;
4536 }
4537 if(!accpose) continue;
4538 for(Atom* fat : cfrag->getAtoms())
4539 {
4540 for(Atom* mat : mol->getAtoms())
4541 {
4542 if(mat->distanceFrom(fat)<RCUT/1.333)
4543 {
4544 accpose=false;
4545 break;
4546 }
4547 }
4548 if(!accpose) break;
4549 }
4550 if(!accpose) continue;
4551 if(sysprot)
4552 {
4553 std::pair<double,double> enV=sysprot->calculateNonBondingEnergy(cfrag);
4554 if(get<0>(enV)>4) {accpose=false; continue;}
4555 else posens.push_back(make_pair(pose,enV));
4556 }
4557 else posens.push_back(make_pair(pose,make_pair(0,0)));
4558 }
4559 }
4560
4561 if(posens.size())
4562 {
4563 std::pair<Pose,std::pair<double,double>> finpos=weighedSelectBoltzmannFirst(posens,s.temp,devid);
4564 cfrag->assignPose(get<0>(finpos));
4565 if(sysprot) get<1>(finpos)=sysprot->calculateNonBondingEnergy(cfrag);
4566 return finpos;
4567 //return make_pair(get<0>(finpos),make_pair(get<1>(finpos),0));*/
4568 }
4569 else
4570 {
4571 if(!QUIET) cout << "#FAILED: No valid position available!!\n";
4572 throw NoPositionAvailableException();
4573 }
4574}
4575bool Molecule::reduce(const System& s,int trials,bool forced,int devid) //Perfect?
4576{
4577 cout << "Reduction begins: "<<((forced)?"forced":"unforced")<<"\n";
4578 Atom *ha=s.ff->getAtom("H"),*nxt,*tmp,*aa;
4579 double div,ebe,ehbe;
4580 int h=0;
4581 Molecule* p = s.getProteinMolecule();
4582 int sz=atoms.size(); if(sz<=2) return false;
4583 for(int I=0;I<sz;I++)
4584 {
4585 while(atoms[I] && atoms[I]->seek_valency())
4586 {
4587 //cout << atoms[I]->toString() << " to be reduced\t";
4588 double blen=0.09;
4589 Atom* ta=(forced)?s.ff->selectRandomBondableAtomTerminal(atoms[I],ha):s.ff->selectAtomByRule(atoms[I],this->getBondedAtoms(atoms[I]),ha);
4590 if(!ta || !ta->isHydrogen())
4591 {
4592 if(ta) {cout << "In reduce: No hydrogen atom to bond to: "<<atoms[I]->toString() << ". Will switch to other terminals\n"; blen=s.ff->getBondLength(atoms[I],ta,true);}
4593 else { cout << "In reduce: No terminal atom to bond to: "<<atoms[I]->toString() << "\n"; break;}
4594 }
4595 Atom *nha=nullptr,*eca1=nullptr,*eca2=nullptr,*dia=nullptr;
4596 int nhai=-1,eca1i=-1,eca2i=-1,diai=-1;
4597 for(int i=0;i<bonds[I].size();i++)
4598 {
4599 if(bonds[bonds[I][i]].size()<=1) continue;
4600 nha=atoms[bonds[I][i]]; nhai=bonds[I][i]; break;
4601 }
4602 if(!nha) //If there is no "heavy" atom connected (rare), choose a random hydrogen atom. If even that is not present, reject reduction altogether for this atom (Lone atom reduction is not allowed)
4603 {
4604 if(!bonds[I].size()) break;
4605 nha=atoms[bonds[I][0]];
4606 nhai=bonds[I][0];
4607 }
4608 //cout << "Using: "<<nha->toString()<<" as the first neighbour\n";
4609 Eigen::Vector3d base=atoms[I]->bondVectorTo(nha);
4610 for(int i=0;i<bonds[I].size();i++) //Find 2 more atoms which are bonded to reduction target
4611 {
4612 if(bonds[I][i]==nhai) continue;
4613 if(!eca1) {eca1i=bonds[I][i]; eca1=atoms[eca1i];}
4614 else {eca2i=bonds[I][i]; eca2=atoms[eca2i]; break;}
4615 }
4616 /*cout << "Looking for other neighbours: "<<(eca1!=nullptr)<<" and "<<(eca2!=nullptr);
4617 if(eca1) cout <<"\n"<< eca1->toString() << "\t";
4618 if(eca2) cout << eca2->toString();
4619 cout << "\n";*/
4620 Eigen::Vector3d ref; double dih=0;
4621 if(bonds[nhai].size()<=1) ref=Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,1);
4622 else
4623 {
4624 for(int i=0;i<bonds[nhai].size();i++)
4625 {
4626 if(bonds[nhai][i]==I) continue;
4627 diai=bonds[nhai][i];
4628 dia=atoms[diai];
4629 break;
4630 }
4631 ref=nha->bondVectorTo(dia);
4632 if(eca1 && dia) {dih=chemtools::getDihedral(eca1,atoms[I],nha,dia); } // cout << "Picked dih="<<dih<<" from calculation "<<eca1->getPosition().transpose()<<", "<<atoms[I]->getPosition().transpose()<<", "<<nha->getPosition().transpose()<<" and "<<dia->getPosition().transpose()<<"\n";}
4633 }
4634 int m=1;
4635 switch(atoms[I]->getStandardValency())
4636 {
4637 case 4:
4638 dih+=(2*PI)/3;
4639 m=3;
4640 break;
4641 case 3:
4642 dih+=PI;
4643 m=2;
4644 break;
4645 default:
4646 m=1;
4647 break;
4648 }
4649 //cout <<"Under dihedral data: "<<dih<<" with multiplicity "<<m<<"\n";
4650 //cout <<"Under getArcPositions: "<<base.transpose()<<"\t"<<ref.transpose()<<":\t"<<blen<<","<<((atoms[I]->getStandardValency()==4)?109.5:120)*(PI/180.0)<<","<<ForceField::expandMultiplicity(dih,m)<<"\n";
4651 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> tposes=quickgeom::getArcPositions(base,ref,blen,((atoms[I]->getStandardValency()==4)?109.5:120)*(PI/180.0),ForceField::expandMultiplicity(dih,m),32,devid);
4652 bool acc=true;
4653 Eigen::Vector3d fpos(0,0,0);
4654 double angs=0,nangs;
4655 for(Eigen::Vector3d& v : tposes)
4656 {
4657 ta->setPosition(atoms[I]->getPosition()+v);
4658 acc=true;
4659 nangs=0;
4660 for(int i=0;i<bonds[I].size();i++)
4661 {
4662 if(atoms[bonds[I][i]]->distanceFrom(ta)<RCUT/1.5) {acc=false; break;}
4663 nangs+=chemtools::getAngle(ta,atoms[I],atoms[bonds[I][i]]);
4664 //cout << chemtools::getAngle(ta,atoms[I],atoms[bonds[I][i]]) <<" for angle: "<<ta->toString()<<"*-"<<atoms[I]->toString()<<"-"<<atoms[bonds[I][i]]->toString()<<",\t";
4665 }
4666 //cout << " as nangs against "<<angs<<"\n";
4667 if(!acc || nangs<angs) continue;
4668 angs=nangs;
4669 fpos=ta->getPosition();
4670 }
4671 if(!angs) {cout << "Failed to reduce: "<<atoms[I]->toString()<<" with std. valency: "+to_string(atoms[I]->getStandardValency())+"\n"; break;}
4672 ta->setPosition(fpos);
4673 bondAtom(ta,atoms[I]);
4674 if(p)
4675 {
4676 const auto& ptr=((Protein*)p)->calculateNonBondingEnergy(ta);
4677 ebe=get<0>(ptr);
4678 ehbe=get<1>(ptr);
4679 myBE+=(ta->setEnergyContribution(ebe));
4680 myHBE+=(ta->setHotspotEnergyContribution(ehbe));
4681 }
4682 if(!QUIET) cout << "Added a hydrogen atom. Left: "<<atoms[I]->seek_valency()<<"\n";
4683 h++;
4684 }
4685 }
4686 if(!QUIET) cout << h << " hydrogen atoms added.\n";
4687 if(ha) delete ha;
4688 cout << "Reduction ends: "<<((forced)?"forced":"unforced")<<"\n";
4689 for(Atom* a : atoms)
4690 {
4691 if(a->getPosition()[0]!=a->getPosition()[0])
4692 {
4693 cout << "Bad Hydrogen Atom Placement\n";
4694 this->dumpMol("badred.pdb",s.ff);
4695 throw NoPositionAvailableException(); //Might remove this later on
4696 }
4697 }
4698 return true;
4699}
4700/*bool Molecule::reduce(const System& s,int trials,bool forced,int devid) //Improved
4701{
4702 cout << "Reduction begins: "<<((forced)?"forced":"unforced")<<"\n";
4703 Atom *ha=s.ff->getAtom("H"),*nxt,*tmp,*aa;
4704 int h=0;
4705 std::vector<Atom*> chn,chn2;
4706 double div,ebe,ehbe,angs=0;
4707 bool nx=true,fx=false,alx=false;
4708 int sz=atoms.size();
4709 Molecule* p = s.getProteinMolecule();
4710 for(int I=0;I<sz;I++)
4711 {
4712 fx=false;
4713 Atom* a=atoms[I];
4714 if(!a || !a->canBond()) continue;
4715 while(a->seek_valency())
4716 {
4717 chn=getBondedAtoms(a);
4718 if(!QUIET)
4719 {
4720 cout << a->toString() << ": checked.\n";
4721 cout << "Taken atom\n";
4722 }
4723 Eigen::Vector3d bnd(1,0,0),fixed(0,0,0);
4724 if(chn.size())
4725 {
4726 nxt=randomSelect(chn);
4727 bnd=nxt->bondVectorFrom(a);
4728 chn2=getBondedAtoms(nxt);
4729 if(chn2.size()>1) {tmp=a; while(tmp==a) tmp=randomSelect(chn2); fx=true; fixed=tmp->bondVectorFrom(nxt);}
4730 }
4731 if(!QUIET)
4732 {
4733 if(!s.ff->isSatisfied(a,chn))
4734 {
4735 cout << "Unsatisfied atom type: "<<a->toString()<<"\n";
4736 }
4737 cout << "Chosen: "<<a->toString()<<"\t";
4738 }
4739 Atom* ta=(forced)?s.ff->selectRandomBondableAtom(a,ha):s.ff->selectAtomByRule(a,getBondedAtoms(a),ha);
4740 if(!ta || !ta->isHydrogen())
4741 {
4742 if(!QUIET) cout << "!H\n";
4743 if(ta) delete ta; break;
4744 }
4745 int m=6;
4746 aa=nullptr;
4747 switch(a->getStandardValency())
4748 {
4749 case 4:
4750 for(Atom* taa : chn) {if(taa->isHydrogen()) {aa=taa; break;}}
4751 if(aa && tmp) {div=chemtools::getDihedral(aa,a,nxt,tmp)+(2*PI)/3; m=3;}
4752 else {div=PI/3; m=6;}
4753 break;
4754 case 3:
4755 div=0;
4756 m=2;
4757 break;
4758 default:
4759 div=0;
4760 m=1;
4761 }
4762 //div=(2*PI)/m;
4763 nx=true;
4764 alx=false;
4765 angs=0;
4766 double nangs=0;
4767 Eigen::Vector3d fpos(0,0,0);
4768 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> tposes=quickgeom::getArcPositions(bnd,(fx)?fixed:quickgeom::getRandomVectorInShell(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0),1,devid),0.09,((a->getStandardValency()==4)?109.5:120)*(PI/180.0),ForceField::expandMultiplicity(div,m),30,devid);
4769 for(Eigen::Vector3d& v : tposes)
4770 {
4771 nx=true;
4772 ta->setPosition(a->getPosition()+v);
4773 nangs=0;
4774 for(Atom* x : chn) {if(ta->distanceFrom(x)<RCUT/1.5) {nx=false; break;} nangs+=chemtools::getAngle(ta,a,x);}
4775 if(!nx || nangs<angs) continue;
4776 else {angs=nangs; fpos=ta->getPosition(); alx=true;}
4777 }
4778 if(!alx && forced && aa) {fpos=aa->getPosition()+quickgeom::getRandomVectorInShell(fpos,0.1,devid); alx=true;}
4779 if(alx)
4780 {
4781 ta->setPosition(fpos);
4782 bondAtom(ta,a);
4783 //if(ta->seek_x()!=ta->seek_x()) cout << "Failed to position hydrogen atom joining to: "<<a->toString()<<"("<<a->seek_valency()<<") using bond with "<<nxt->toString()<<"("<<nxt->seek_valency()<<") with dihedral from "<<tmp->toString()<<"\n";
4784 if(p)
4785 {
4786 const auto& ptr=((Protein*)p)->calculateNonBondingEnergy(ta);
4787 ebe=get<0>(ptr);
4788 ehbe=get<1>(ptr);
4789 myBE+=(ta->setEnergyContribution(ebe));
4790 myHBE+=(ta->setHotspotEnergyContribution(ehbe));
4791 }
4792 ta=(forced)?s.ff->selectRandomBondableAtom(a,ha):s.ff->selectAtomByRule(a,getBondedAtoms(a),ha);
4793 if(!QUIET) cout << "Added a hydrogen atom. Left: "<<a->seek_valency()<<"\n";
4794 h++; //break;
4795 }
4796 if(!alx)
4797 {
4798 if(!QUIET) cout << "Could not reduce with required dihedral:"<<div<<"\t: "<<a->toString()<<"\n";
4799 break;
4800 }
4801 if(ta) delete ta;
4802 tmp=nullptr;
4803 fixed=Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0);
4804 }
4805 }
4806 cout << "Reduced. "<<h<<" hydrogens added!\n";
4807 delete ha;
4808 return true;
4809}*/
4810
4811inline bool chemtools::Rule::satisfies(Atom* s,Atom* n,Molecule* src) const {return chemtools::Rule::satisfies(s,n,src->getBondedAtoms(s));}
4812inline bool chemtools::Rule::satisfies(Atom* s,Molecule* src,const ForceField* ff) const {return chemtools::Rule::satisfies(s,src->getBondedAtoms(s),ff);}
4813bool chemtools::Rule::satisfies(Atom* s,Atom* n,const std::vector<Atom*>& bnd) const
4814{
4815 if(group[0][0]=='@') return true;
4816 if(s->mustCycl && !s->isCyclized() && n->getStandardValency()<2)
4817 {
4818 if(!QUIET) cout <<"REJCYCAPP: Cycle formation impossible. Rejecting "<<n->toString()<<" as cyclizable atom type\n";
4819 return false;
4820 }
4821 //No ring check (New atom is being added - may form ring)
4822 if(!contains(group,n->toString())) return true;
4823 int c=0;
4824 for(Atom* a : bnd)
4825 {
4826 if(contains(group,a->toString())) c++;
4827 if(c>=max) return false;
4828 }
4829 return true;
4830}
4831bool chemtools::Rule::satisfies(Atom* s,const std::vector<Atom*>& bnd,const ForceField* ff) const
4832{
4833 /*cout << s->toString() << "\t";
4834 for(Atom* a : bnd) cout <<a->toString() << " ";
4835 cout << "\n";*/
4836 //if(ff) cout << s->toString()<<"\t"<<ff->getCategory("ring").contains(s) << "\n";
4837 /*try {if(ff && ff->getCategory("ring").contains(s) && !s->isCyclized()) return false;}
4838 catch(NoSuchCategoryException ex) {cout << "WARN: Category 'ring' not available!!!\n";}*/
4839 if(group[0][0]=='@') return true;
4840 int c=0;
4841 for(Atom* a : bnd)
4842 {
4843 if(contains(group,a->toString())) c++;
4844 if(c>max) return false;
4845 }
4846 return (c>=min);
4847}
4848inline bool chemtools::Rule::satisfiesStrong(Atom* s,Atom* n,Molecule* src) const {return chemtools::Rule::satisfiesStrong(s,n,src->getBondedAtoms(s));}
4849bool chemtools::Rule::satisfiesStrong(Atom* s,Atom* n,const std::vector<Atom*>& bnd) const
4850{
4851 if(group[0][0]=='@') return true;
4852 int c=0;
4853 for(Atom* a : bnd)
4854 {
4855 if(contains(group,a->toString())) c++;
4856 if(c>=max) return false;
4857 }
4858 if(contains(group,n->toString())) return true;
4859 else return (c>=min);
4860}
4861//Completing forcefield
4862inline Atom* ForceField::selectAtomByRule(Atom* a,Molecule* m,Atom* exa) const {return selectAtomByRule(a,m->getBondedAtoms(a),exa);}
4863inline std::vector<Atom*> ForceField::listAtomsByRule(Atom* a,Molecule* m,Atom* exa) const {return listAtomsByRule(a,m->getBondedAtoms(a),exa);}
4864inline std::vector<std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>>> ForceField::listFragmentsByRule(Atom* src,Molecule* m,const FragmentSet& frags,Atom* exa,int devid) const {return listFragmentsByRule(src,m->getBondedAtoms(src),frags,exa,devid);}
4865std::vector<std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>>> ForceField::listFragmentsByRule(Atom* src,const std::vector<Atom*>& bnd,const FragmentSet& frags,Atom* exa,int devid) const
4866{
4867 std::vector<Atom*> alats=listAtomsByRule(src,bnd,exa);
4868 std::vector<std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>>> ret;
4869 for(MolecularFragment* frag : frags)
4870 {
4871 std::vector<std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> possib;
4872 for(Atom* ta : alats)
4873 {
4874 auto pres=frag->getHandleAtom(ta);
4875 if(get<0>(pres)) possib.push_back(pres);
4876 }
4877 //cout << src->toString()<<" with choices in: {"; //<< possib.size()<< " as size\n";
4878 //for(Atom* a : alats) cout << a->toString()<< " ";
4879 //cout <<"} has "<<possib.size()<<" options for fragment with label '"<<frag->getLabel()<<"'\n";
4880 if(!possib.size()) continue;
4881 ret.push_back(make_pair(frag,randomSelect(possib,devid)));
4882 }
4883 cout <<" \t As selection: "<<ret.size()<<" \n";
4884 if(!ret.size()) {cerr << "No options to grow using fragments! Source atom: "<<src->toString()<<"\n";}
4885 return ret;
4886}
4887inline std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> ForceField::selectFragmentByRule(Atom* s,Molecule* m,const FragmentSet& fs,Atom* temp) const {return selectFragmentByRule(s,m->getBondedAtoms(s),fs,temp);}
4888
4889#ifdef FRAGGROW
4890std::vector<Atom*> Molecule::bondFragment(MolecularFragment* nfrag,int ind,Atom* src)
4891{
4892 //Atom* nacpy=natm;
4893 if(!nfrag->getAtom(ind)->canBond() || !src->canBond()) return std::vector<Atom*>();
4894 int cP=this->getSize(),K=0;
4895 std::vector<Atom*> ret;
4896 for(Atom* ea : nfrag->getAtoms())
4897 {
4898 if(ea->isHydrogen()) HC++;
4899 if(VARIEDCOUNT && VCLIST->contains(ea)) HAC++;
4900 this->addAtom(new Atom(*ea));
4901 for(int ae : nfrag->bonds[K]) bonds[K+cP].push_back(ae+cP);
4902 K++;
4903 }
4904 int sI=indexOf(src);
4905 bonds[sI].push_back(cP+ind); bonds[cP+ind].push_back(sI);
4906 src->addBond(); atoms[ind+cP]->addBond();
4907 for(int i=0;i<nfrag->getSize();i++)
4908 {
4909 ret.push_back(atoms[cP+i]);
4910 if(atoms[cP+i]->canBond()) freeatoms.push_back(atoms[cP+i]);
4911 }
4912 if(!src->canBond()) freeatoms.erase(std::remove(freeatoms.begin(), freeatoms.end(), src), freeatoms.end());
4913 return ret;
4914}
4915
4916bool Molecule::attemptFragment(const System& s,Atom* gP,std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> nfrag,Atom*& pivat,int trials,bool restr,int nps,int devid)
4917{
4918 if(!QUIET) cout << trials << " ";
4919 bool acc=true;
4920 pivat=get<0>(get<1>(nfrag));
4921 Pose pos;
4922 std::pair<Pose,std::pair<double,double>> penv;
4923 try
4924 {
4925 if(s.ff->hasCategory("aromatic")) penv=chemtools::getAllowedFragmentPositions(gP,this,nfrag,s,20,10,restr,&(s.ff->getCategory("aromatic")),devid);
4926 else penv=chemtools::getAllowedFragmentPositions(gP,this,nfrag,s,20,10,restr,nullptr,devid);
4927 pos=get<0>(penv); //nat->setPosition(pos);
4928 }
4929 catch(NoPositionAvailableException ex) {cout << "No position was found for: '"<<get<0>(nfrag)->getLabel()<<"'\n"; acc=false; nps++;}
4930 if(acc)
4931 {
4932 get<0>(nfrag)->assignPose(pos);
4933 if(get<0>(get<1>(penv)))
4934 {
4935 myBE+=get<0>(nfrag)->myBE;
4936 myHBE+=get<0>(nfrag)->myHBE; //nat->setHotspotEnergyContribution(get<1>(get<1>(penv)));
4937 //myHBE+=getHotspotEnergy(s,get<1>(penv));
4938 }
4939 return true;
4940 }
4941 else
4942 {
4943 if(!QUIET && nps>=8) cout << "Trials found no acceptable position 7 times. Exiting loop...\n";
4944 if(trials>0 && nps<8) {return attemptFragment(s,gP,nfrag,pivat,trials-1,restr,nps+1,devid);} //Trial 'trial' number of times, but don't waste time if No position is available (7 times)
4945 else return false;
4946 }
4947 return false;
4948}
4949
4950MolecularFragment* Molecule::completeAttemptFragment(ostream& logfile,const System& s,Atom* src,const FragmentSet& fs,int trials,int nupper,int level,int levellim,bool restr,int devid)
4951{
4952 if(getEffectiveSize()>nupper) return nullptr;
4953 if(level>levellim)
4954 {
4955 cout << "Size limit pre-trial reached\n";
4956 return nullptr;
4957 }
4958 //if(!trialmode) startTrials();
4959 cout <<"For(FRAG): "<< src->toString() << "\n";
4960 logfile <<"For(FRAG): "<< src->toString() << "\n";
4961 std::pair<MolecularFragment*,std::pair<Atom*,std::vector<Atom*>>> nfrag=make_pair(nullptr,make_pair(nullptr,std::vector<Atom*>()));
4962 try {nfrag=s.ff->selectFragmentByRule(src,getBondedAtoms(src),fs);}
4963 catch(RuleConstraintsPreventBondsException ex) {std::cout << "Rule constraints prevent bonding!\n"; get<0>(nfrag)=nullptr;}
4964 if(!get<0>(nfrag)) {std::cout << "Warning: no fragment found\n"; if(logfile) logfile << "No fragment to bond to: "<<src->toString()<<"\n"; return nullptr;}
4965 else {std::cout << "Chose fragment with label: '"<<get<0>(nfrag)->getLabel()<<"'\n";}
4966 //cout << "Trial: "<<nat->toString()<<"\t";
4967 logfile << "Trial: "; (get<0>(nfrag))->describeStructure(logfile); logfile<<"\t";
4968 Atom* pivat=nullptr;
4969 if(!attemptFragment(s,src,nfrag,pivat,trials,restr,0,devid)) return nullptr;
4970 std::vector<Atom*> added=bondFragment(get<0>(nfrag),get<0>(nfrag)->indexOf(pivat),src);
4971 assert(pivat);
4972 //std::vector<Atom*> added;
4973 cout << "\n";
4974 #ifdef REALTIME
4975 this->dumpMol("realtime.pdb",s.ff);
4976 usleep(REALTIME);
4977 #endif
4978 if(s.ff->hasCategory("completion"))
4979 {
4980 const Category* compcat=&(s.ff->getCategory("completion"));
4981 for(Atom* nat : added)
4982 {
4983 if(compcat->contains(nat)) while(nat->canBond()) {if(!completeAttemptFragment(logfile,s,nat,fs,trials,nupper,level+1,levellim,restr,devid)) return nullptr;}
4984 }
4985 }
4986 describeStructure(logfile);
4987 describeStructure();
4988 /*startTrials();
4989 commit();*/
4990 cout << "Allowing commit of: "<<src->toString()<<"\n";
4991 return get<0>(nfrag);
4992}
4993#endif
4994
4995namespace atomfx
4996{
4997 inline Atom* selectRandomAtom(Molecule* m) {return randomSelect(m->getAtoms());}
4998 Atom* selectRandomNonHydrogenAtom(Molecule* m) {Atom* a; while((a=selectRandomAtom(m))->isHydrogen()) continue; return a;}
4999 bool ALWAYSTRUE(Atom* a) {return true;}
5000 bool ISHYDROGEN(Atom* a) {return a->isHydrogen();}
5001 std::vector<Atom*> selectAtoms(Molecule* m,bool (*f)(Atom*),unsigned int lim=0,bool sfl=false,bool invcond=false)
5002 {
5003 std::vector<Atom*> ret;
5004 std::vector<Atom*> atlist=m->getAtoms();
5005 if(sfl) {atlist=schuffle(atlist);}
5006 for(Atom* ta : atlist)
5007 {
5008 if((invcond && !f(ta)) || (!invcond && f(ta))) ret.push_back(ta);
5009 if(lim && ret.size()>=lim) break;
5010 }
5011 return ret;
5012 }
5013
5014 inline std::vector<Atom*> selectRandomAtoms(Molecule* m,int n) {return selectAtoms(m,ALWAYSTRUE,n,true);}
5015 inline std::vector<Atom*> selectRandomNonHydrogenAtoms(Molecule* m,int n) {return selectAtoms(m,ISHYDROGEN,n,true,true);}
5016}
5017namespace molfx
5018{
5019 static void makeCheckpoint(std::ostream& os,const std::vector<System>& syses,bool includeprot)
5020 {
5021 os << "#DNV generated checkpoint file\n";
5022 std::vector<Molecule*> unmols; //Unique molecules (by pointers)
5023 std::vector<std::vector<int>> indexing;
5024 for(const System& s : syses)
5025 {
5026 std::vector<int> myind;
5027 for(Molecule* m : s.getMolecules())
5028 {
5029 if(!includeprot && m->type==1) continue;
5030 int ind=indexOf(m,unmols);
5031 if(ind==-1) {unmols.push_back(m); myind.push_back(unmols.size()-1);}
5032 else myind.push_back(ind);
5033 }
5034 indexing.push_back(myind);
5035 }
5036 os << unmols.size() << "\n";
5037 for(Molecule* m : unmols) m->dumpMolAsTxt(os,true);
5038 os << syses.size() << "\n";
5039 for(std::vector<int>& inds : indexing) {for(int& el : inds) os<<" "<< el; os << "\n";}
5040 os << "#Checkpoint ends\n";
5041 }
5042 static std::vector<System> loadFromCheckpoint(const std::string& cptfile,const ForceField& ff)
5043 {
5044 std::ifstream f; f.open(cptfile);
5045 std::vector<Molecule*> allmols;
5046 std::string line;
5047 int temp;
5048 while(!f.eof())
5049 {
5050 getline(f,line);
5051 cout << line << "\n";
5052 if(line[0]=='#') continue;
5053 else break;
5054 }
5055 std::stringstream ss(line);
5056 int nmol; ss >> nmol;
5057 cout << "Loading "<<nmol<<" molecules\n";
5058 while(allmols.size()<nmol) allmols.push_back(new Molecule(f,true,true,&ff));
5059 cout << "Molecules loaded\n";
5060 std::vector<System> syses;
5061 //while(!f.eof()){getline(f,line); cout << line << "\n";}
5062 getline(f,line);
5063 cout << line << "\n";
5064 ss=stringstream(line);
5065 int snum; ss >> snum;
5066 System s(ff);
5067 for(int i=0;i<snum;i++)
5068 {
5069 System t=s.clone();
5070 std::string ns="";
5071 getline(f,ns);
5072 cout <<i<<"\t'"<< ns << "'\n";
5073 ss=stringstream(ns);
5074 int ind;
5075 while(!ss.eof())
5076 {
5077 ss >> ind;
5078 cout << ind << " of "<<allmols.size()<<" molecules\n";
5079 t.addMolecule(allmols[ind]);
5080 }
5081 syses.push_back(t);
5082 }
5083 cout << syses.size() << " systems returned\n";
5084 return syses;
5085 }
5086 static std::vector<Molecule*> loadManyGROMolecules(std::istream& inf,const ForceField& ff,bool eval,bool warnf)
5087 {
5088 std::string fstr="",dump,temp;
5089 int s=0;
5090 std::vector<Molecule*> ret;
5091 while(!inf.eof())
5092 {
5093 getline(inf,dump);
5094 cout << dump << "\n";
5095 inf >> s; getline(inf,dump);
5096 //if(!s) break;
5097 for(int i=0;i<s;i++)
5098 {
5099 getline(inf,temp);
5100 fstr+=temp+"\n";
5101 }
5102 if(inf.eof()) break;
5103 getline(inf,dump); //Box vectors
5104 std::stringstream ss(fstr);
5105 ret.push_back(new Molecule(ss,ff,"gro",eval,warnf));
5106 fstr="";
5107 }
5108 return ret;
5109 }
5116 double RMSD(const Molecule* mol1,const Molecule* mol2,bool inch=false)
5117 {
5118 double sqdistsum=0,sqdist;
5119 int n=0,K=0;
5120 if(mol1->getEffectiveSize()!=mol2->getEffectiveSize()) {cout << "Not same number of heavy atoms for RMSD! Quitting...\n"; exit(1);}
5121 if(inch) {if(mol1->getSize()!=mol2->getSize()) {cout << "Not same number of atoms (hydrogen count doesn't match) for RMSD! Ignoring hydrogen atoms\n"; inch=false;}}
5122 for(int i=0;i<mol1->getSize();i++)
5123 {
5124 if(mol1->getAtom(i)->isHydrogen() && !inch) continue;
5125 sqdist=pow(mol1->getAtom(i)->distanceFrom(mol2->getAtom(K)),2);
5126 sqdistsum+=sqdist;
5127 //cout << sqdistsum << "\n";
5128 //cout << mol1->getAtom(i)->toString() <<" -> "<<mol2->getAtom(K)->toString()<<"\t"<<sqdist<<"\n";
5129 K++;
5130 //if(inch) while(K<mol2->getSize() && mol2->getAtom(K)->isHydrogen()) K++;
5131 if(K>=mol2->getSize()) {cout << "Molecule ended!\n"; break;}
5132 n++;
5133 }
5134 sqdistsum/=n;
5135 return sqrt(sqdistsum);
5136 }
5137 /*@brief Similar to RMSD(const Molecule*,const Molecule*,bool) but calculates the RMSD separately for each residue and returns an array of doubles with the RMSD of each residue by number
5138 @param[in] maxres: It specifies the largest possible residue number in the (macro)molecule. The array will have maxres elements with all indices which do not have a corresponding residue set to 0.
5139 */
5140 double* RMSDByResidue(const Molecule* mol1,const Molecule* mol2,int maxres=10000,bool inch=false)
5141 {
5142 if(mol1->getEffectiveSize()!=mol2->getEffectiveSize()) {cout << "Not same number of heavy atoms for RMSD! Quitting...\n"; exit(1);}
5143 if(inch) {if(mol1->getSize()!=mol2->getSize()) {cout << "Not same number of atoms (hydrogen count doesn't match) for RMSD! Ignoring hydrogen atoms\n"; inch=false;}}
5144 double* ret= new double[maxres]; for(int i=0;i<maxres;i++) ret[i]=0;
5145 int atcnt[maxres]; for(int i=0;i<maxres;i++) atcnt[i]=0;
5146 for(int i=0;i<mol1->getSize();i++)
5147 {
5148 if(mol1->getAtom(i)->isHydrogen() && !inch) continue;
5149 double sqdistsum=0,sqdist;
5150 ret[mol1->getAtom(i)->getResidueNumber()]+=pow(mol1->getAtom(i)->distanceFrom(mol2->getAtom(i)),2);
5151 atcnt[mol1->getAtom(i)->getResidueNumber()]++;
5152 }
5153 for(int i=0;i<maxres;i++)
5154 {
5155 if(ret[i]!=0) ret[i]=sqrt(ret[i]/atcnt[i]);
5156 }
5157 cout << maxres << " max residues used.\n";
5158 return ret;
5159 }
5160 static double closestApproach(const Molecule* m1, const Molecule* m2)
5161 {
5162 if(!m1->getSize() || m2->getSize()) throw EmptyMoleculeObjectException();
5163 double d=m1->getAtoms()[0]->distanceFrom(m2->getAtoms()[0]);
5164 if(!d) return 0;
5165 double r;
5166 for(Atom* a : m2->getAtoms())
5167 {
5168 for(Atom* b : m1->getAtoms())
5169 {
5170 r=a->distanceFrom(b);
5171 if(r<d) d=r;
5172 }
5173 }
5174 return d;
5175 }
5176 #ifndef NOJSON
5177 //void assignChargesFromJSON(Json::Value& data,std::vector<Atom*> atorder,Molecule* mptr,const Category* halogen=nullptr)
5179 void assignChargesFromJSON(Json::Value& data,std::vector<Atom*> atorder,Molecule* mptr,const Category* halogen)
5180 {
5181 cout << "Assign charges called (Json)\n";
5182 cout <<atorder.size() << " heavy atoms ordered\n";
5183 int myInd=0,hInd=atorder.size(); double chg=0; std::string temp,name;
5184 for(Atom* a : atorder)
5185 {
5186 if(halogen && halogen->contains(a)) name=(a->toString()[0]=='C')?"Cl":((a->toString()[0]=='B')?"Br":std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
5187 else name=std::string(1,a->toString()[0]);
5188 temp=data[name+to_string(myInd++)].asString();
5189 if(temp=="" || temp=="null") throw AtomNotInJSONException();
5190 a->setCharge(std::stod(temp.substr(0,7)));
5191 std::vector<Atom*> attbonds=mptr->getBondedAtoms(a);
5192 for(Atom* a2 : attbonds)
5193 {
5194 if(!a2->isHydrogen()) continue;
5195 temp=data["H"+to_string(hInd++)].asString();
5196 if(temp=="null" || temp=="") throw AtomNotInJSONException();
5197 a2->setCharge(std::stod(temp.substr(0,7)));
5198 cout << "Set charge of "<<a2->toString()<< " to "<<a2->seek_charge() << "\n";
5199 }
5200 if(a->getStandardValency()>attbonds.size()) hInd+=(a->getStandardValency()-attbonds.size());
5201 }
5202 }
5203 #endif
5204 //void assignChargesFromData(const std::vector<std::pair<std::string,double>>& data,std::vector<Atom*> atorder,Molecule* mptr,const Category* halogen=nullptr)
5212 void assignChargesFromData(const std::vector<std::pair<std::string,double>>& data,std::vector<Atom*> atorder,Molecule* mptr,const Category* halogen)
5213 {
5214 cout << "Assign charges called (data)\n";
5215 cout <<atorder.size() << " heavy atoms ordered\n";
5216 int myInd=0,hInd=atorder.size(); double chg=0; std::string temp,name;
5217 for(int i=0;i<atorder.size();i++)
5218 {
5219 /*if(halogen && halogen->contains(a)) name=(a->toString()[0]=='C')?"Cl":((a->toString()[0]=='B')?"Br":std::string(1,a->toString()[0]));
5220 else name=std::string(1,a->toString()[0]);*/
5221 //temp=data[name+to_string(myInd++)].asString();
5222 //if(temp=="" || temp=="null") throw AtomNotInJSONException();
5223 atorder[i]->setCharge(get<1>(data[i]));
5224 std::vector<Atom*> attbonds=mptr->getBondedAtoms(atorder[i]);
5225 for(Atom* a2 : attbonds)
5226 {
5227 if(!a2->isHydrogen()) continue;
5228 //temp=data["H"+to_string(hInd++)].asString();
5229 //if(temp=="null" || temp=="") throw AtomNotInJSONException();
5230 if(hInd>=data.size()) throw UnmatchingSMILESAndStructurePairException();
5231 a2->setCharge(get<1>(data[hInd++]));
5232 //cout << "Set charge of "<<a2->toString()<< " to "<<a2->seek_charge() << "\n";
5233 }
5234 if(atorder[i]->getStandardValency()>attbonds.size()) hInd+=(atorder[i]->getStandardValency()-attbonds.size());
5235 }
5236 }
5237}
5238namespace FFfx
5239{
5241 std::vector<std::string> filterByElement(const ForceField& ff,const std::vector<std::string>& in,const std::string& el)
5242 {
5243 std::vector<std::string> ret;
5244 for(const std::string& s : in)
5245 {
5246 if(ff.getElementName(s)==el) ret.push_back(s);
5247 }
5248 return ret;
5249 }
5250 bool iterativeAtomTypeAssignment(const ForceField& ff,Molecule* m,const std::vector<Atom*>& atl,const Category* halo=nullptr,Atom* src=nullptr,std::vector<Atom*> visited=std::vector<Atom*>())
5251 {
5252 if(!src) src=m->getAtom(0);
5253 //cout << "Iteration begins: "<<src->toString()<<"\n";
5254 //if(contains(visited,src)) return true;
5255 std::vector<Atom*> neigh=m->getBondedAtoms(src);
5256 std::vector<bool> vis;
5257 std::vector<Atom*> shortatl;
5258 visited.push_back(src);
5259 for(Atom* na : neigh)
5260 {
5261 if(contains(visited,na))
5262 {
5263 vis.push_back(true);
5264 if(!shortatl.size())
5265 {
5266 try{
5267 auto ab=ff.getAllowedBonds(na);
5268 for(const auto& aba : ab) shortatl.push_back(aba.getSecond(na,ff));
5269 /*cout << na->toString()<<" allows bonding to: ";
5270 for(Atom* ta : shortatl) cout << ta->toString()<<","; cout << "\n";*/
5271 }
5272 catch(NoBondsAvailableException) {continue;}
5273 }
5274 }
5275 else vis.push_back(false);
5276 }
5277 bool srcH=(halo)?halo->contains(src):false,satT=false,succ=false,stdata=false;
5278 if(!shortatl.size()) {shortatl=atl; stdata=true;}
5279 for(Atom* refa : shortatl)
5280 {
5281 //cout << src->toString()<<"\n";
5282 //cout << ((long)refa) << "\t" << ((long)src) << "\n";
5283 if(!refa) continue;
5284 if(refa->getStandardValency()!=src->getStandardValency()) continue;
5285 if(refa->toString()[0]!=src->toString()[0]) continue;
5286 else {if(halo && ((halo->contains(refa) && !srcH) || (!halo->contains(refa) && srcH))) continue;}
5287 src->assignAtom(refa,false);
5288 cout << "Assigned: "<<(m->indexOf(src)+1)<<": atom type: "<<src->toString()<<"="<<refa->toString()<<" with "<<refa->getStandardValency()<<" as required std. valency\n";
5289 satT=true;
5290 for(int t=0;t<neigh.size();t++)
5291 {
5292 if(vis[t])
5293 {
5294 try {ff.getLengthParameters(neigh[t]->toString(),src->toString(),true);}
5295 catch(DataNotAvailableException ex) {satT=false; break;}
5296 for(int u=t+1;u<neigh.size();u++)
5297 {
5298 if(!vis[u]) continue;
5299 if(ff.calculateAngleEnergy(neigh[t],src,neigh[u],true,THETACUT*2))
5300 {
5301 satT=false;
5302 if(!QUIET) cout << src->toString()<<":\t"<<neigh[t]->toString()<<"-"<<src->toString()<<"-"<<neigh[u]->toString()<<" with energy: "<<ff.calculateAngleEnergy(neigh[t],src,neigh[u],true,THETACUT*2)<<" => Geometry failure\n";
5303 break;
5304 }
5305 }
5306 }
5307 if(!satT) break;
5308 }
5309 if(!satT) continue;
5310 for(int ni=0;ni<neigh.size();ni++)
5311 {
5312 Atom* na=neigh[ni];
5313 if(!vis[ni])
5314 {
5315 if(!iterativeAtomTypeAssignment(ff,m,atl,halo,na,visited)) {satT=false; break;}
5316 }
5317 }
5318 if(!satT) continue;
5319 if(ff.isSatisfied(src,neigh)) {succ=true; break;}
5320 else {cout << "\tNOT satisfied: "<<src->toString()<<" at index "<<(m->indexOf(src)+1)<<"\n"; /*m->dumpMol("failed.pdb",&ff);*/}
5321 /*{
5322 bool geomsat=true;
5323 for(int ni1=0;ni1<neigh.size();ni1++)
5324 {
5325 for(int ni2=ni1+1;ni2<neigh.size();ni2++)
5326 {
5327 if(ff.calculateAngleEnergy(neigh[ni1],src,neigh[ni2],true,THETACUT*2))
5328 {
5329 geomsat=false;
5330 if(!QUIET) cout << src->toString()<<":\t"<<neigh[ni1]->toString()<<"-"<<src->toString()<<"-"<<neigh[ni2]->toString()<<" with energy: "<<ff.calculateAngleEnergy(neigh[ni1],src,neigh[ni2],true,THETACUT*2)<<" => Geometry failure\n";
5331 break;
5332 }
5333 }
5334 if(!geomsat) break;
5335 }
5336 if(geomsat) {succ=true; break;}
5337 }
5338 else continue;*/
5339 }
5340 if(!stdata) {for(Atom* ta : shortatl) delete ta;}
5341 return succ;
5342 }
5343 void assignAtomTypes(const ForceField& ff,Molecule* m,std::vector<Atom*> atypelist=std::vector<Atom*>(),const std::vector<std::pair<std::string,std::vector<std::string>>>& refinements=std::vector<std::pair<std::string,std::vector<std::string>>>())
5344 {
5345 const Category* halo=(ff.hasCategory("halogen"))?&(ff.getCategory("halogen")):nullptr;
5346 if(!halo) cerr << "assignAtomTypes (Molecule.hpp): WARN: No \"halogen\" category in supplied ForceField. Chlorine and Bromine will not be identified!!!\n";
5347 if(!atypelist.size()) atypelist=ff.getAtomTypes();
5348 std::vector<Atom*> initlist;
5349 for(Atom* ra : m->getAtoms()) ra->setStandardValency(m->getBondedAtoms(ra).size());
5350 if(iterativeAtomTypeAssignment(ff,m,atypelist,halo,m->getAtoms()[0],initlist)) cout <<"Assigned atom types successfully!\n";
5351 else cout << "Could not find suitable atom-type names\n";
5352 cout << "Refining atom types...\t";
5353 for(Atom* a : m->getAtoms())
5354 {
5355 std::string anam=a->toString();
5356 for(const auto& p : refinements)
5357 {
5358 if(anam==get<0>(p))
5359 {
5360 for(const auto& nn : get<1>(p))
5361 {
5362 cout << nn << "\n";
5363 Atom* na=ff.getAtom(nn);
5364 a->assignAtom(na,false);
5365 if(ff.isSatisfied(a,m->getBondedAtoms(a))) break;
5366 delete na;
5367 }
5368 break;
5369 }
5370 }
5371 }
5372 cout << "done\n";
5373 }
5374}
5375//Completing netcomm
5381namespace netcomm
5382{
5387 struct MolRequest
5388 {
5389 System mol;
5390 int src;
5391 MolRequest() : mol(ForceField()) {src=0;}
5393 MolRequest(System m,int s) : mol(m) {src=s;}
5394 };
5395 static volatile Queue<MolRequest> molq(QUEUE_LIMIT);
5398 inline int queueSize() {return molq.getSize();}
5400 inline void addRequest(System m,int id) {while(queueSize()>=QUEUE_LIMIT-1) {} molq.push(MolRequest(m,id)); cout << "Added request. Size now: "+to_string(queueSize())+"\n";}
5401 inline std::vector<MolRequest> drainQueue() {return molq.drain();}
5402
5403 inline void processRequest(std::ostream& logfile,Molecule*& testm,int src)
5404 {
5405 //if(molq.isEmpty()) {logfile << "No data\n"; usleep(10000); return System(*genff);}
5406 //MolRequest req=molq.next();
5407 //Molecule* testm=req.mol.getDrugMolecule();
5408 if(!testm) {cerr << "WARN: No molecule in system\n"; return;}
5409 auto res=testm->getSMILES2(genff,true);
5410 cout << "Ended getSMILES\n";
5411 logfile << "\n\n"<<RCOUNT<< ":\tReceived SMILES: "<<get<0>(res) << "\n";
5412 std::string synthdata;
5413 #ifndef NOZMQ
5414 cout <<"ZMQ Code\n";
5415 //zmqio::ZMQIOThread mythread(logfile);
5416 //zmq::socket_t& mysock=mythread.getSocket();
5417 zmq::socket_t& mysock=zmqio::getSocket(src);
5418 //zmqio::init(logfile);
5419 //zmq::socket_t& mysock=zmqio::getZMQSocket();
5420 std::string new_charges=zmqio::communicateWithSocket(mysock,get<0>(res),logfile);
5421 if(SYNTHGET && new_charges.find("Bad request! check valence")==std::string::npos) synthdata=zmqio::communicateWithSocket(mysock,"!"+get<0>(res),logfile);
5422 #else
5423 netio::init(logfile);
5424 int mysock = netio::getSocket();
5425 std::string new_charges = netio::communicateWithSocket(mysock,get<0>(res),logfile);
5426 if(SYNTHGET && new_charges.find("Bad request! check valence")==std::string::npos) synthdata=netio::communicateWithSocket(mysock,"!"+get<0>(res),logfile);
5427 #endif
5428 logfile.flush();
5429 if(new_charges.find("Bad request! check valence")!=std::string::npos)
5430 {
5431 #ifndef FFCHARGES
5432 badsmileslog << get<0>(res) << "\n";
5433 testm->dumpMol("badsmiles_dump_"+to_string(RCOUNT++)+".pdb",genff); badsmileslog.flush();
5434 #endif
5435 delete testm; failures[src]++; testm=nullptr;
5436 return;
5437 }
5438 else
5439 {
5440 /*auto splt=stringfx::split(new_charges,',');
5441 for(std::string& s : splt) cout << s << "\t"; cout << "\n";*/
5442 try{molfx::assignChargesFromData(txtio::loadChargesFromJSONString(new_charges),get<1>(res),testm,&(genff->getCategory("halogen")));}
5443 catch(UnmatchingSMILESAndStructurePairException ex)
5444 {
5445 cout << "Bad smiles. Data length is shorter than atom-count\n";
5446 #ifndef FFCHARGES
5447 badsmileslog << get<0>(res) << "\n";
5448 testm->dumpMol("badsmiles_dump_"+to_string(RCOUNT++)+".pdb",genff);
5449 badsmileslog.flush();
5450 #endif
5451 delete testm; failures[src]++; testm=nullptr;
5452 return;
5453 }
5454 testm->dumpMolAsTxt("with_charges_"+to_string(netcomm::RCOUNT++)+".txt");
5455 envprot->calculateNonBondingEnergy(testm);
5456 if(SYNTHGET)
5457 {
5458 int cls=std::stoi(synthdata);
5459 if(!cls) testm->pE=+SYNTHPENALTY;
5460 }
5461 }
5462 cout << "Request processed successfully\n";
5463 }
5464
5465}
5466//Completing the forces namespace
5467namespace forcefx
5468{
5469 static inline Eigen::Vector3d getLengthForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,const std::pair<double,double>& lp)
5470 {
5471 Eigen::Vector3d r=a1->bondVectorTo(a2);
5472 if(::abs(r.norm()-get<0>(lp))<0.01) return Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0);
5473 return get<1>(lp)*(get<0>(lp)-r.norm())*(r/r.norm());
5474 }
5475 static inline Eigen::Vector3d getAngleForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,Atom* a3,const std::vector<double>& ap)
5476 {
5477 double a=chemtools::getAngle(a1,a2,a3);
5478 //cout << "Angle: "<<a<<" for equil "<<ap[0]<<"; TOL = "<<(ANGVAR/2.5)<<"\n";
5479 //if(::abs(a-ap[0])<ANGVAR/5) return Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0);
5480 Eigen::Vector3d r=a1->bondVectorTo(a3),s=a2->bondVectorTo(a3); double sn=s.norm();
5481 Eigen::Vector3d f=r-(r.dot(s)/(sn*sn))*s; f/=f.norm();
5482 //cout << "Angmag: "<<Eigen::Vector3d((ap[1]/sn)*(ap[0]-a)*f+ap[3]*(ap[2]-r.norm())*(r/r.norm())).norm()<<"\n";
5483 return (ap[1]/sn)*(ap[0]-a)*f+ap[3]*(ap[2]-r.norm())*(r/r.norm());
5484 }
5485 static inline Eigen::Vector3d getDihedralForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,Atom* a3,Atom* a4,const std::vector<double>& dp)
5486 {
5487 double a=chemtools::getDihedral(a1,a2,a3,a4);
5488 //cout << "Dihedral: "<<a<<" for equil "<<dp[0]<<"with multiplicity: "<<dp[2]<<"\n";
5489 double minD=dp[0],ST=(2*PI)/dp[2]; while(minD>=ST-0.05) minD-=ST;
5490 double d=sin(dp[2]*a-minD); //if(d<1e-1 && cos(dp[2]*a-dp[0])<-0.1) d=throwarandompoint(0,1)<0.5?-1:1;
5491 Eigen::Vector3d r=a3->bondVectorTo(a4),b=a2->bondVectorTo(a3); double bn=b.norm(),rn;
5492 Eigen::Vector3d f=b.cross(r),c=a1->bondVectorTo(a2).cross(a2->bondVectorTo(a3));
5493 //if(quickgeom::angleBetween(f,c)<PI/2) d=-d;
5494 //cout << d << "\n";
5495 r=r-(r.dot(b)/(bn*bn))*b;
5496 rn=r.norm();
5497 f/=f.norm();
5498 //cout << ((d*dp[1])/rn) << "\n";
5499 return ((dp[1]*d)/rn)*f;
5500 }
5501 static inline std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> getImproperForce(Atom* a1,Atom* a2,Atom* a3,Atom* a4,const std::pair<double,double>& ip)
5502 {
5503 double a=chemtools::getImproper(a1,a2,a3,a4);
5504 if(::abs(get<0>(ip)-a)<DIHVAR/2.5 || PI-::abs(get<0>(ip)-a)<DIHVAR/2.5)
5505 {
5506 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> fc(1,Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0)); fc.push_back(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0)); fc.push_back(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0));
5507 return fc;
5508 }
5509 double f=1;
5510 if(a>PI/2) {a=PI-a; f=-1;}
5511 f*=get<1>(ip)*(get<0>(ip)-a);
5512 //double f=get<1>(ip)*(get<0>(ip)-a);
5513 Eigen::Vector3d b12=a1->bondVectorTo(a2),b13=a1->bondVectorTo(a3),b14=a1->bondVectorTo(a4); //,C=(a2->getPosition()+a3->getPosition()+a4->getPosition())/3;
5514 Eigen::Vector3d p123=b12.cross(b13),p134=b13.cross(b14),p142=b14.cross(b12); //,plane=a2->bondVectorTo(a3).cross(a3->bondVectorTo(a4)),perp=C-a1->getPosition();
5515 if(quickgeom::angleBetween(a1->bondVectorTo(a4),p123)>PI/2) p123=-p123;
5516 if(quickgeom::angleBetween(a1->bondVectorTo(a2),p134)>PI/2) p134=-p134;
5517 if(quickgeom::angleBetween(a1->bondVectorTo(a3),p142)>PI/2) p142=-p142;
5518 p123*=f/p123.norm(); p134*=f/p134.norm(); p142*=f/p142.norm();
5519 //if(quickgeom::angleBetween(plane,perp)>PI/2) plane=-plane;
5520 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> ret; ret.push_back((p123+p142)/(2*b12.norm())); ret.push_back((p123+p134)/(2*b13.norm())); ret.push_back((p134+p142)/(2*b14.norm()));
5521 return ret;
5522 }
5523}
5524//Completing the Topology class constructor
5525Topology::Topology(Molecule* m,const ForceField& inpff)
5526{
5527 ff=&inpff;
5528 std::vector<Atom*> atoms=m->getAtoms();
5529 std::vector<std::vector<int>> bonddata=m->getBonds();
5530 std::vector<Atom*> visited;
5531 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
5532 {
5533 visited.push_back(atoms[i]);
5534 for(int n1 : bonddata[i])
5535 {
5536 if(!contains(visited,atoms[n1]))
5537 {
5538 bonds.push_back(make_pair(i,n1));
5539 bondpars.push_back(ff->getLengthParameters(atoms[i]->toString(),atoms[n1]->toString()));
5540 }
5541 for(int n2 : bonddata[n1])
5542 {
5543 if(n2==i) continue;
5544 if(!contains(visited,atoms[n2]))
5545 {
5546 std::vector<int> ang(1,i); ang.push_back(n1); ang.push_back(n2);
5547 angles.push_back(ang);
5548 anglepars.push_back(ff->getAngleParamtersFailsafe(atoms[i],atoms[n1],atoms[n2]));
5549 }
5550 for(int n3 : bonddata[n2])
5551 {
5552 if(n3==n1) continue;
5553 if(contains(visited,atoms[n3])) continue;
5554 std::vector<int> dih(1,i); dih.push_back(n1); dih.push_back(n2); dih.push_back(n3);
5555 dihedrals.push_back(dih);
5556 dihpars.push_back(ff->getDihedralParametersFailsafe(atoms[i],atoms[n1],atoms[n2],atoms[n3]));
5557 }
5558 for(int n3 : bonddata[n1])
5559 {
5560 if(n3==n2 || n3==n1) continue;
5561 if(contains(visited,atoms[n3])) continue;
5562 std::vector<int> imp(1,n1); imp.push_back(i); imp.push_back(n2); imp.push_back(n3);
5563 impropers.push_back(imp);
5564 improppars.push_back(ff->getImproperParametersFailsafe(atoms[n1],atoms[i],atoms[n2],atoms[n3]));
5565 }
5566 }
5567 }
5568 this->atoms.push_back(atoms[i]);
5569 bool found=false; for(Atom* a : atomtypes) {if(a->toString()==atoms[i]->toString()) {found=true;break;}}
5570 if(!found) atomtypes.push_back(inpff.getAtom(atoms[i]));
5571 }
5572}
5573std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> Topology::calculateInternalForces(Molecule* m,bool takeimprop) const
5574{
5575 std::vector<Atom*> allats=(m)?m->getAtoms():this->atoms;
5576 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> forces; //,poses;
5577 //Eigen::Vector3d COM=m->getCentreOfMass();
5578 Eigen::Vector3d F;
5579 for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++) forces.push_back(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0));
5580 //poses.push_back(atoms[i]->getPosition()-COM);
5581 for(int i=0;i<bonds.size();i++)
5582 {
5583 int c1=get<0>(bonds[i]),c2=get<1>(bonds[i]);
5584 forces[c2]+=forcefx::getLengthForce(atoms[c1],atoms[c2],bondpars[i]);
5585 forces[c1]+=forcefx::getLengthForce(atoms[c2],atoms[c1],bondpars[i]);
5586 }
5587 for(int i=0;i<angles.size();i++)
5588 {
5589 int c1=angles[i][0],c2=angles[i][1],c3=angles[i][2];
5590 F=forcefx::getAngleForce(atoms[c1],atoms[c2],atoms[c3],anglepars[i]);
5591 forces[c3]+=F; //forces[c2]-=F;
5592 F=forcefx::getAngleForce(atoms[c3],atoms[c2],atoms[c1],anglepars[i]);
5593 forces[c1]+=F; //forces[c2]-=F;
5594 }
5595 for(int i=0;i<dihedrals.size();i++)
5596 {
5597 int c1=dihedrals[i][0],c2=dihedrals[i][1],c3=dihedrals[i][2],c4=dihedrals[i][3];
5598 F=forcefx::getDihedralForce(atoms[c1],atoms[c2],atoms[c3],atoms[c4],dihpars[i]);
5599 forces[c4]+=F; //forces[c1]-=F;
5600 F=forcefx::getDihedralForce(atoms[c4],atoms[c3],atoms[c2],atoms[c1],dihpars[i]);
5601 forces[c1]+=F; //forces[c4]-=F;
5602 }
5603 if(takeimprop)
5604 {
5605 for(int i=0;i<impropers.size();i++)
5606 {
5607 if(!get<1>(improppars[i])) continue;
5608 int c1=impropers[i][0],c2=impropers[i][1],c3=impropers[i][2],c4=impropers[i][3];
5609 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> foc=forcefx::getImproperForce(atoms[c1],atoms[c2],atoms[c3],atoms[c4],improppars[i]);
5610 forces[c2]+=foc[0]/3;
5611 forces[c3]+=foc[1]/3;
5612 forces[c4]+=foc[2]/3;
5613 forces[c1]-=(foc[0]+foc[1]+foc[2])/3;
5614 }
5615 }
5616 std::vector<std::pair<int,int>> ignore=bonds;
5617 for(int i=0;i<angles.size();i++) ignore.push_back(make_pair(angles[i][0],angles[i][2]));
5618 for(int i=0;i<dihedrals.size();i++) ignore.push_back(make_pair(dihedrals[i][0],dihedrals[i][3]));
5619 //Non-bonding part
5620 /*for(int i=0;i<atoms.size();i++)
5621 {
5622 for(int j=i+1;j<atoms.size();j++)
5623 {
5624 bool found=false; for(const auto& p : ignore) {if((get<0>(p)==i && get<1>(p)==j) || (get<0>(p)==j && get<1>(p)==i)) {found=true; break;}}
5625 if(found) continue;
5626 Eigen::Vector3d r=atoms[j]->bondVectorFrom(atoms[i]); double n=r.norm();
5627 if(n<0.25) continue;
5628 //cout << n << "\n";
5629 r=(chemtools::getLJForce(atoms[i],atoms[j],n)/n)*r+(chemtools::getElectrostaticForce(atoms[i],atoms[j],n)/n)*r;
5630 forces[i]+=r;
5631 forces[j]-=r;
5632 }
5633 }*/
5634 return forces;
5635}
5636double Topology::calculateTotalAngleEnergy(Molecule* src) const
5637{
5638 double E=0;
5639 std::vector<Atom*> ats=(src)?src->getAtoms():this->atoms;
5640 for(int i=0;i<anglepars.size();i++) E+=angleEnergyFunction(anglepars[i],chemtools::getAngle(ats[angles[i][0]],ats[angles[i][1]],ats[angles[i][2]]),ats[angles[i][0]]->distanceFrom(ats[angles[i][2]]));
5641 return E;
5642}
5643double Topology::calculateTotalDihedralEnergy(Molecule* src) const
5644{
5645 double E=0;
5646 std::vector<Atom*> ats=(src)?src->getAtoms():this->atoms;
5647 for(int i=0;i<dihpars.size();i++) E+=dihedralEnergyFunction(dihpars[i],chemtools::getDihedral(ats[dihedrals[i][0]],ats[dihedrals[i][1]],ats[dihedrals[i][2]],ats[dihedrals[i][2]]));
5648 return E;
5649}
5650
5651//Completing physics (namespace)
5652namespace physics
5653{
5654 void gradientDescentPhysics(const System& sys,Molecule* target,int nsteps,double D,double R,double L,double L2)
5655 {
5656 D/=target->getMass();
5657 double MOI=target->getMomentOfInertia();
5658 cout << "System has moment of inertia: "<<MOI<<"\n";
5659 if(MOI!=MOI) return;
5660 R/=MOI;
5661 std::vector<std::pair<std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>,std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>>> forces;
5662 double totbe=0;
5663 for(int stepcount=0;stepcount<nsteps;stepcount++)
5664 {
5665 target->myBE=0;
5666 for(Molecule* am : sys.getMolecules())
5667 {
5668 if(am==target) continue;
5669 forces.push_back(am->calculateActingForces(target));
5670 for(Atom* ta : target->getAtoms()) target->myBE+=get<0>(ta->setEnergyContribution(am->calculateNonBondingEnergy(ta)));
5671 }
5672 if(!forces.size()) {cerr << "WARN: No forces found! Are there no molecules other than target in the system for gradient descent?\n"; continue;}
5673 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> sumf=get<0>(forces[0]),atposes=get<1>(forces[0]);
5674 for(int i=1;i<forces.size();i++) {for(int j=0;j<sumf.size();i++) sumf[j]+=get<0>(forces[i])[j];}
5675 std::pair<std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>,std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>> totalforces=make_pair(sumf,atposes);
5676 Eigen::Vector3d COM=target->getCentreOfMass();
5677
5678 Eigen::Vector3d totf(0,0,0); for(const Eigen::Vector3d& v : get<0>(totalforces)) totf+=v;
5679 Eigen::Vector3d tott(0,0,0); for(const Eigen::Vector3d& v : get<1>(totalforces)) tott+=v;
5680 Eigen::Vector3d shift=totf*D; double mdist=shift.norm();
5681 Eigen::Vector3d rot=tott*R; double rn=rot.norm();
5682 if(mdist<L && rn<L2)
5683 {
5684 if(!QUIET) cout << "Step size small enough. Will stop gradient descent.\n";
5685 return;
5686 }
5687 if(!QUIET) cout << "Step: "+to_string(stepcount)+" with force "+to_string(totf.norm())+"*1e-9 kN/mol with shift: "+to_string(mdist)+" with potential energy: "+to_string(target->myBE)+" kJ/mol. Acting torque: "+to_string(tott.norm())+" with rot: "+to_string(rn)+"\n";
5688 for(Atom* a : target->getAtoms()) a->setPosition(a->getPosition()+shift);
5689 if(!QUIET) cout << "Moved!";
5690 //cout << shift.transpose() << "\n";
5691 target->rotateMolecule(rot,COM); //Magnitude of vector rot is used to calculate angle. The normal vector direction is the unit vector in this direction
5692 if(!QUIET) cout << "Rotated!";
5693 //cout << rot.transpose() << "\n";
5694 forces=std::vector<std::pair<std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>,std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d>>>();
5695 }
5696 if(!QUIET) cout << "Total number of steps required were completed. Stopping gradient descent.\n";
5697 }
5698 void atomisticGradientDescentPhysics(const System& sys,Molecule* target,int nsteps,double D,double DU,double DS,double R,double L)
5699 {
5700 Topology mytop(target,*sys.ff);
5701 std::vector<Atom*> atoms=target->getAtoms();
5702 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> forces; for(int i=0;i<target->getSize();i++) forces.push_back(Eigen::Vector3d(0,0,0));
5703 double molmass=target->getMass();
5704 for(int stepcount=0;stepcount<nsteps;stepcount++)
5705 {
5706 //if(stepcount==(nsteps*1)/5) target->dumpMol("inframe.pdb",sys.ff);
5707 for(Molecule* am : sys.getMolecules())
5708 {
5709 std::vector<Eigen::Vector3d> tf;
5710 if(am==target)
5711 {
5712 //if(stepcount>0.2*nsteps) { tf=mytop.calculateInternalForces(target,false); cout << "No impropers in step "<<stepcount<<"\n";}
5713 tf=mytop.calculateInternalForces(target,true);
5714 }
5715 else tf=get<0>(am->calculateActingForces(target));
5716 for(int i=0;i<tf.size();i++) forces[i]+=tf[i]*((am==target)?D:R);
5717 }
5718 if(!forces.size()) {cerr << "WARN: No forces found! Are there no molecules other than target in the system for gradient descent?\n"; continue;}
5719 double fM=0; int fI=-1;
5720 for(int i=0;i<forces.size();i++)
5721 {
5722 if(fM<forces[i].norm())
5723 {
5724 fM=forces[i].norm();
5725 fI=i;
5726 }
5727 }
5728 if(fI==-1) {cout << "Warn: Forces hit zero... Check the molecule for confirmation\n"; return;}
5729 if(!QUIET) cout << "Chose atom at index: "<<fI<<" for maximum force value: "<<fM<<" *1e-9 kN/mol\n";
5730 if(atoms[fI]->isHydrogen()) forces[fI]/=12; else forces[fI]/=atoms[fI]->seek_mass();
5731 double mdist=forces[fI].norm();
5732 //double mdist=fM/atoms[fI]->seek_mass();
5733 if(mdist<L)
5734 {
5735 if(!QUIET) cout << "Step size small enough("<<L<<"). ";
5736 if(D<DU) D+=DS;
5737 else
5738 {
5739 if(!QUIET) cout <<" Will stop gradient descent.\n";
5740 return;
5741 }
5742 }
5743 //else if(mdist>0.0015) {mdist=0.0015; forces[fI]*=(mdist/forces[fI].norm());}
5744 if(!QUIET) cout << "Step: "+to_string(stepcount)+" with force "+to_string(fM)+"*1e-9 kN/mol with shift: "+to_string(mdist)+"\n";
5745 Eigen::Vector3d oldpos=atoms[fI]->getPosition();
5746
5747 if(forces[fI].norm()>0.05)
5748 {
5749 forces[fI]*=atoms[fI]->seek_mass()/molmass;
5750 for(Atom* ia : target->getAtoms()) ia->setPosition(ia->getPosition()+forces[fI]);
5751 }
5752 else atoms[fI]->setPosition(atoms[fI]->getPosition()+forces[fI]);
5753
5754 if(!QUIET) cout << "Moved!";
5755 //if(stepcount%250==0) target->dumpMol("inprogress_mol_"+to_string(stepcount)+".pdb",sys.ff);
5756 }
5757 }
5758 void optimizeMolecule(Molecule* m,const ForceField& ff,int nsteps,double D)
5759 {
5760 System temp(ff); temp.addMolecule(m);
5761 atomisticGradientDescentPhysics(temp,m,nsteps,D);
5762 }
5763}
5764#endif
AlreadyInTrialModeException
Definition: Molecule.hpp:63
AtomNotInMoleculeException
Definition: Molecule.hpp:45
Atom
Definition: Atom.hpp:40
Atom::isCyclized
bool isCyclized() const
A wrapper for cylc. Checks is the atom has cyclized or not.

Atom::toString
const std::string & toString() const
Gives the atom name for this atom.
Definition: Atom.hpp:110
Atom::getStandardValency
int getStandardValency() const
Get the force-field (or otherwise loaded) maximum allowed valency for this atom.
Definition: Atom.hpp:120
Atom::getEnergyContribution
double getEnergyContribution() const
Get the interaction energy of this atom with the Protein (or other macromolecule in the System)
Definition: Atom.hpp:194
Atom::seek_charge
double seek_charge() const
Get the force-field (or otherwise loaded) charge parameter for this atom.
Definition: Atom.hpp:380
Atom::getHybridization
int getHybridization() const
Get the force-field (or otherwise loaded) hybridization of this atom.
Definition: Atom.hpp:155
Atom::setPosition
void setPosition(const Eigen::Vector3d &v)
Allows setting the position of the atom by providing an "Eigen::Vector3d" object.
Definition: Atom.hpp:386
Atom::bondVectorTo
Eigen::Vector3d bondVectorTo(Atom *a) const
Get a vector from this atom to 'a'.
Definition: Atom.hpp:390
Atom::assignAtom
void assignAtom(const Atom *to_copy, bool copypos=false)
Reassign basic parameters (including atom-type name) to match supplied atom.
Definition: Atom.hpp:240
Atom::posdev
double posdev
Definition: Atom.hpp:56
Atom::mustCycl
bool mustCycl
Definition: Atom.hpp:53
Atom::setEnergyContribution
double setEnergyContribution(double e)
Do NOT use this method directly. It manually sets the interaction energy of this atom to the Protein ...
Definition: Atom.hpp:189
